LevyMedical Director - Complementary Medicine, Clalit HMO Dear Haya, Thank you for visiting our center.As you realized we offer our Health Insurance members a variety of alternative (complimentary) healing methods, including the Ring Muscles techniques of Paula Garbourg, known here as the Paula MethodT. Most of the patients are referred to the Paula MethodT practitioners through our Physicians, as an "alternative remedy" to the conventional medical solutions (drugs). Patients with the following ailments are traditionally referred to Paula Method practitioners: Asthma, Headaches Backache, Urinary and fecal incontinence, Pregnancy and preparation for delivery, Prolapsed uterus, urinary bladder and others.We look forward your collaboration with our institute and look forward your next visit.PATIENT COMMENTSHaya changed my life.I felt the change immediately after the first treatment. I felt much better - I got my appetite back and I felt more energetic and vital. things got better from day to day. Haya was there for me for everything I needed. she was always looking for the right combination of exercises that would fit me the best. she taught me how to use the Paula Method technique and make it a part of my life. this is the best part about the technique - you can do it anytime anywhere.it's not only the technique but also Haya herself - she is so optimistic and full of life - she gives you the feeling that everything is going to be ok.I keep using the technique - even for a few minutes every day - and I can still feel the change. things are getting better and better. I know that I can call Haya any time - she is always there for me.Thank you so much Haya for everything !!!AdiHOW WILL YOUR FUNDING HELP US?1. spread the word.We are planning a massive internet campaign to reach those who seek natural healing solution,2. Open a studio in Tel Aviv and purchase broadcasting equipment 3. Obtain a quality secured video platformTHE TEAM              Haya Garbourg - head practitioner. Certified by the founder Paula         Garbourg to practice and teach the Paula Method with 30 years                     experiance, heading the Paula Garburg Institute.David Garbourg - CEO. Marketing and Management experiance spanning over 40 yars in Israel and the US.  Paioneer in online Marketing and familiar (first hand) with the Paula Method.Nir schwarz - Technology expert Hana Osherov - Customer ServiceSharon Zur - Media specialistWHY YOU CAN TRUST US TO DELIVERBooks and DVDs are already printed and will be shipped from FloridaHaya Garbourg and her team is ready to start multi-language serviceThe secured broadcasting technology is availableOnline advertising such as Google Adword will be used to spread the word... Our mission is to promote the Paula Method outside Israel and help those needing assistance anywhere in the world.FAQQ. Do I need instruments?A. No. no need for any instrumentQ. Do I need to lie in bed to do the exercises?A. You can exercise in bed, while sitting by the computer or TV. You can even do certain exercises while drivingQ. How often should I exercise?A. We recommend 30 minutes daily. Eventually your body will initiate certain moves / exercises on its own.Q. How long will it take for the body to heal?A. Time varies from one body to other and the frequency of doing the exercises. Also the type of ailment is a factor. Q. Are the exercise sessions done in groups?A. No, the exercises are done in person, one patient at the time, since each body reacts differently to any exercise.Q. Does the Paula Method involves stretching or massage?A. No. The exercises are done by the patient only! The practitioner will demonstrate the exercise, watch the patient and correct when necessary and observe the body' reaction, before turning to another exercise.Q. How come the Paula Method is known only in Israel?A. The founder Paula Garbourg lived in Israel where she trained and certified new practitioners. Patients were referred by physicians or by word of mouth. While many in Israel turns to the practitioner, there are no certified practitioners worldwide to turn to.Q. What is needed for a remote practitioner session?A. A computer (preferably laptop) viewable from bed wile laying and Web Camera pointing to the bed. That's all that is required. Your Practitioner will demonstrate the execises for you to follow, observed and guided by the PractitionerQ. Can the book and DVD be sufficient?A. The book is offering an in-depth explanation of the Paula Method and the right way to practice it. The DVD provide description of the right way to exercise. Some get results from exercising as described in the book, others prefers to get live guidance guidance, for faster results, short or long termSELECT A PERK$ 35 Get acquainted Book and DVD The Secret of the Ring Muscles by Paula Garbourgand DVD with Haya GarbourgFree US Shipping (International Shipping add $10)$119 Get the feelBook & DVD + a remote sessions The Secret of the Ring Muscles by Paula Garbourgand DVD with Haya Garbourg+ get a session with Haya and her team, 50 minutes.Free US Shipping (International Shipping add $10)$249 Gateway to healingBook & DVD + 3 remote sessions The Secret of the Ring Muscles by Paula Garbourg                                               and DVD with Haya Garbourg+ get 3 sessions with Haya and her team, 50 minutes each.Free US Shipping (International Shipping add $10)$4900 GO LIVE! We will fly you to our clinic in Tel Aviv, the city that never stops, for 5 personal healing sessions with Haya Garbourg. Treat will include return flight to Tel Aviv, 7 nights first class accommodation with breakfast and 2 day tours to Jerusalem and Galilee.

story:
Kangaroo bottle delivers a alkalized mineral water, which will aid in weight-loss.

What you are about to read may surprise you. In fact, you  will probably forward this article to both your friends and family. 

Hi, I’m Dr. David Haacke and I want to tell you that malnutrition may be a key reason for the USA Obesity epidemic

The Problem is Simply this: The foods we eat are empty! They may be green and really-healthy looking, however the truth is that most of the food we eat has been depleted of a large percentage of the minerals, vitamins and nutrients that our bodies need. This is serious.

Why is this important! Minerals are important cofactors the body needs to metabolize the food you eat. Without restoring these depleted minerals weight loss on any diet is difficult if not impossible.

Omergy Restorative Water will replenish these lost minerals in your body. Once restored, your body will begin to metabolize the food you eat, turning fat into energy. Drink the water, drink our fast weight-loss shot in the morning,for lunch, mix our protein shake mix into the water and nurse the water until your evening meal. I promise you, your weight-loss efforts will be successful 

First we start with our Omergy Mineral Water.

Our Omergy water has food sourced minerals added to every bottle so your body can readily absorb the minerals it is craving.  Minerals are also what give water its great refreshing flavor, and we include all the important trace minerals for your health.

Fast Weight-loss Shot, which is found inside a 2-ouncee shot in our Omergy Kangaroo Bottle is a proprietary blend of herbs, vitamins, and other nutrients to promote healthy metabolism, and weight loss.  This shot will help boost your metabolism, and speed weight loss. This is what I recommend that you consume at the start of each day.  Again, drink an Omergy protein shake for your mid-day meal.. Drink a shake in addition to the Omergy Fast Weight-loss product. 

We can place scores of different products in our shots: A nutritional supplement, An energy drink (5-Hour Omergy), melatonin, a sleep inducing supplement, DHEA, A testosterone or HGH simulator, a laxative, or cherry/lime flavored zinc cold fighter, a joint lubricant like our Ibuproflex glucosamine chondroitin supplement, an immune booster or  my wife's favorite, a protein shake mix (A protein power, which is mixed into the water, in three flavors vanilla, chocolate & strawberry), Different juices: Acai', Noni, Magosteen or a blend of super fruits like our Omergy Juice. The list can get extensive, We could easily take up a whole grocery store isle. 
There is a humanitarian aspect to our effort. We have committed to donate a bottle of Nurish or its equivalency for ever bottle of Omergy sold.  
Drop for Drop, Bite for Bite.
 I can't imagine a person who is in a crisis situation who is dying of thirst, who is not also hungry. Our product provides 150 minerals, vitamins, micro-nutrients, 13 grams of protein, you can see the whole list of ingredients on Omergy.com. It will do what it is supposed to do and that is to provide enough nourishment and hydration to keep a person alive for a few days up to a week. When you support this effort, you are also helping us alleviate some of the suffering that many are experiencing through the world. 

If we are successful in raising funds, we will use the funds to pay for the tooling for our bottle and cap, an office, warehouse and the equipment needed to make our own caps, bottles and equipment needed to bottle our product. This is neccesssary if we are going to be able to keep our profits high enough to cover the cost associated with donating product to those in need.
 


I will  Dr.Haacke explain why our fast weight-loss product is superior to any other now on the market. See above video clip. 

Hi I am Dr Haacke, I want to start out by explaining why unhealthy, undernourished people find it almost impossible to lose weight!

The simple answer is the foods we eat are empty! They may be green and really-healthy looking, however the truth is that almost all of the food we eat has been depleted of a large percentage of the minerals, vitamins and nutrients that our body’s need. This is serious.

Let me illustrate.  An apple grown in early 1900’s had the trace mineral content that would take 25 of today’s apples to equal.

Why is this important! Minerals are important co-factors the body needs to metabolize the food you eat. Without restoring these depleted minerals permanent weight loss on any diet is difficult if not impossible.

That is pretty much why it is so hard to permanently lose weight, and why yoyo diet trends are the norm.  Where 10 pounds is lost then gained again and again.

Two important minerals that are lost in the processesing of food, and depleted in conventionally grown agriculture are Magnesium and Chromium.  Both of these minerals are directly involved in healthy metabolic pathways, and when deficient lead to slower metabolism, and inefficient sugar metabolism.  Both of which cause fatigue, weight gain, and metabolic dysfunction.

Our Omergy water has food sourced minerals added to every bottle so your body can readily absorb the minerals it is craving.  Minerals are also what gives water its great refreshing flavor, and we include all the important trace minerals for your health.

In addition to our great Omergy mineral water comes a proprietary blend of herbs, vitamins, and other nutrients to promote healthy metabolism, and weight loss.  (Green Tea Extract, Chromium, Selenium, Magnesium, Hoodia extract, B-Vitamins, Bitter Orange Extract, Hesperidin, Naringin, Forskolin, 7-KetoDHEA, Garcinia Cambogia (See above video), Raspberry Ketone, Cinnamon, Velvet Bean, Cocoa Extract, Guarana, Vitamins A, C, D, E, K.) that come in a convenient Fast Weight-loss shot that accompanies our water.  This boost helps boost your metabolism, and speed weight loss. You can order a case of 12 bottles of Omergy Restorative Water, with our kangaroo Garcinia Cambogia Fast Weight-loss shots in our perk section.  

Omergy International is a start-up, which  once funded, will allow our team to produce these much needed water and supplement formulas and bottle them. 

It is important that we are able to do this in-house, so we can control the quality and cost of our product. Product, which when used will help you, our friends to enjoy health and fitness. 

Improving your health is the essence of Omergy. 

Let me share with you a little more of the Omergy philosophy. 

First and foremost, it is our stated goal to provide you, our friends, family and neighbors, products, which will help you obtain & enjoy long-lasting vibrant health. 


Here is another line of products, which we intend to create.

Omergy 5-days to total nutritional restoration regimen. 

 Monday Consume Omergy Restorative Water with the Green Shot.(See chart below)

Tuesday Consume Omergy Restorative Water with the Reds Shot.

Wednesday Consume Omergy Restorative Water with the Orange Shot.

Thursday Consume Omergy Restorative Water with the White Shot.

Friday Consume Omergy Restorative Water with the Purple Shot.

Saturday: Consume your choice of Omergy Restorative Water with either Omergy Fast Weight-Loss Shot, Omergy Juice Shot or Omergy Immune Boost Shot.  

The more you stick to this regimen the more energy you will enjoy and stronger your immune system will become. Choose the week supply of Omergy 5-days to Total Nutritional Restoration Regimen Perk, or the 4 week supply of Omergy 5-days to total nutritional restoration regimen and receive 4 FREE bottles of Omergy Restorative Water with Omergy Juice Shot. 

To this end we are developing formulas for some very exceptional products. Let me tell you about them: 


We start with our Omergy RestoreLife 7-Super Fruit Juice. Omergy Juice can be consumed alone, but more importantly, it is the nutritional soup which we use to fortify many of our  supplements, like 5-Hour Omergy. If you are going to consume a caffeinated supplements, I suggest that taking one that included a wide-spectrum nutritional supplement, packed full of vitamins, anti-oxidants, phytonutrients along with our mineral water, will help your body recover from the unhealthy aspects of why you need a caffeinated drink to begin with. Given the choice between 5-Hour Energy and 5-Hour Omergy we would hope you would choose 5-Hour Omergy. 

However, I don't want overlook our Omergy Restorative water. The truth is even our Omergy Juice is not going to have the positive intended impact on our health, unless we are able to re-infuse the minerals our body's need to metabolize the nutrients of Omergy's super fruits. 

The same with nearly all of the supplements that will be contained within the kangaroo shots in our Omergy Restorative Water. 

Unlike OTC (Over The Counter) supplements, which may have the necessary supplemental ingredients, our supplement formulas are created with both the highest quality ingredients, but just as importantly we create supplements, which are easily assimilated by our body's. 

The goal is to help you, our friends, neighbors and family return to and enjoy long-lasting vibrant health and concurrently help those throughout the world who are in so much distress and needless suffering. That is the true spirit of Omergy

When you visit any of our restaurants you will not find soft drinks. Instead we will provide inexpensive green smoothies and other healthy natural juices.  Our goal is to put a new face on fast food with eateries that stay away from unhealthy foods and sugars, and especially avoid preservatives, which can be more damaging then the product is healthy. 

Once launched, we will sell our product via the Internet, using social media, Google Ad Word, YouTube, and a radio, television performance-based direct-response advertising campaign.  

Hopefully, we will enjoy significant profits, which will let us build our Omergy restaurants and Omergy health restoring spa hotels. 

If you are concerned about your choices in a market place filled with unhealthy fast food giants, then I encourage to pre-order our health restoring products, or book a week stay at our St George health restoring retreat, where I will personally supervise your medical evaluation and put you on a regimen of exercise and diet that will get to the root of your health concerns. When it the last time you had vibrant energy?  Omergy Health Spas will help return to a vibrant health condition. When I work with my patients, it is my goal to teach them the tool needed so they can get and stay healthy. Where these retreats are not cheap, when you consider 

By combining Omergy’s Restorative Water & FAST Weight-loss  Shot™: The Water restores the depleted minerals and micro-nutirents and then the contained 2-ounce shot of Garcinia Cambogia, Fiber and 13 grams of protein helps us to control our appetite and lose the desired weight without feeling hungry.  The results can be fast, healthy weight-loss. 

Here is the best part, when you contribute $100 we will send you  a case of  12-bottles of Omergy Restorative Water with the contained FAST Weight-loss  Shots™.  (This amount includes S&H)

Omergy Restorative Water is sold with a variety of different supplements, as can be seen in our project image.

The Omergy Water & Hunger Project is dedicated to providing a bottle of water and a meal replacement shot for every bottle of Omergy Water sold. 

Everyday thousands of children die from malnutrition and unclean water.

We commit to either provide an aid organization, like the Red Cross, People Water or LDS Welfare services an actual bottle of water with a meal replacement shot or give the monetary equivalent, which will contribute to the providing food and water to those in need.

P&G is an organization who is providing safe drinking water to many in need. This is one of organizations that we will provide both Omergy Water and/or the equivalency in cash for every Bottle of any Omergy sold. 

Almost one billion people in the developing world do not have access to clean drinking water. As a result, thousands of children die every day. The P&G Children’s Safe Drinking Water (CSDW) Programme reaches these people through PUR packets, a water purifying technology developed by P&G, here in the UK at our Innovation Centre in Newcastle and in conjunction with the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

Most of the time when a person is in dire straights and in need water, they are also in need of nourishment. Above is a picture of Omergy Nurish™, which would be distributed to organizations like Red Cross, P&G, People Water, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints Welfare Square and when possible, directly to those in need. 

In order to make any impact on this problem, we must be able to be competitive in marketplace. As a start-up we would not be able to go to co-packers and bottlers simply due to the minimums orders most of these providers require. Also, and more importantly, we absolutely must control quality. By owning the equipment needed for a small bottle manufacturing and bottling we are able to do both. This of course will allow us to enjoy the type of profits needed to contribute to world's clean water and hunger problems. 

That means at a minimum, we have to our supplement production in house. This is why we are raising funds, so we can launch with the equipment needed to mold our bottles and to bring the filling of our products in-house. Without that ability, our cost to produce our product would not allow us the margins needed to contribute the equivalent of a bottle of water and nourishment (Nurish™ Meal Replacement Shot) for every bottle of water we sell. 

First, we are a for profit company, and intend to develop many different companies under the Omergy Brand, and if I am at the helm of these entities I promise you that we will contribute as much as we are able to alleviate these burdens, which many find themselves facing. Whether, due to famine, war, poverty or lack of education, we will do all we can to organize the resources to eradicate and correct the  problem. 

The first problem we are addressing is malnutrition and how it contributes to obesity. If you have ever unsuccessfully attempted to drop a few pounds by dieting you will will interested in our products and our approach to diet and nutrition.

Join us in our fight against obesity, dirty water and hunger by ordering the perks, which will best help you enjoy vibrant health & energy. Choose your favorite perks now.  

The below three have been nominated for the Omergy Spirit Medallion. 

1.

2.  

3.

Voting can be done on our website omergy.com (Under construction)  after it is completed in a couple of weeks.  Please send comments to ernie@omergy.com 

Choose you favorite today.

This is why we are raising funds, so we can launch with the equipment needed to mold our bottles and to bring the filling of our products in-house. Without that ability, our cost to produce our product would not allow us the margins needed to contribute the equivalent of a bottle of water and nourishment (Nurish™ Meal Replacement Shot) for every bottle of water we sell. 

First, we are a for profit company, and intend to develop many different companies under the Omergy Brand, and if I am at the helm of these entities I promise you that we will contribute as much as we are able to alleviate these burdens, which many find themselves facing. Whether, due to famine, war, poverty or lack of education, we will do all we can to organize the resources to eradicate and correct the  problem. 
The first problem we are addressing is malnutrition and how it contributes to obesity. If you have ever unsuccessfully attempted to drop a few pounds by dieting you will will interested in our products and our approach to diet and nutrition. 
Join us in our fight against obesity, dirty water and hunger by ordering the perks, which will best help you enjoy vibrant health & energy. Choose your favorite perks now.  
The below three have been nominated for the Omergy Spirit Medallion. 
1. 
2.  
3.
Voting can be done on our website omergy.com (Under construction)  after it is completed in a couple of weeks.  Please send comments to ernie@omergy.com 
Choose you favorite today.

story:
Short Summary

           The cause we are working for is a community of equality regardless of differences or restrictions infringed upon individuals. More specifically, we are working with high school aged students that have been limited in their school community due to special needs or disabilities. Students of general education and special education are separated by classes in school causing their interactions to be scarce.

          As high school student myself, I saw an obstacle that needed to be overcome. In this idea, the club Students for Students was created. This club gave special and general educations students the chance to come together and build friendships. After seeing the success created from this high school club, we wanted to find a way to help continue these friendships. Leading to the creation of Camp Connected.

          Camp Connected will be a week long summer camp from August 18th- August 22nd, taking place at the local recreational center. The camp will be from 9am until 1 pm on all of these days. Each day will have a combination of special and general education students whom will participate in various athletic and artistic activities together.


What We Need & What You Get

         Since we know how great of an opportunity this will be for all of the teens involved, our goal is to make this camp completely free so that there is no financial strain caused if anyone wishes to participate. In order to make this happen, we need help from ALL of you through donations.

         Donations given will cover the costs of water, snacks, lunches, and supplies for activities such as craft materials and sport gear. Donations of any shape and size are welcome! An alternative donation form is to sponsor a camper. By donating $20 you will be sponsoring a camper for one day. By donating $100 you will be sponsoring a camper for the entire week.

         As optimists and frugal spenders, we hope to have money left over after the camp is over. All money that remains will be donated to the local high schools special education budget. By pulling out a checkbook or even just rummaging through for some pocket change, your donation will impact multiple communities and numerous individuals.


The Impact

         Now on the outside it seems like we are just having teenagers hang out with one another, which essentially is true. However we are asking for funding to help teens of disabilities form those essential social skills that are needed by all people, give them a sense of belonging in a broader community then those constricted ones lacking variety, and let them build friendships with peers that’ll be able to care about them.

         Also it isn’t just the teens of special needs that benefit, but also the peers of general education that come as well. They get to spend time with the other students in school they don’t get to see as often, and learn to understand how few differences there really are between each other. When all of the teens are together the positivity and pure joy of one bounces to another until everyone there just feels welcome and happy. This has been seen in my high schools current club Students for Students and is bound to grow in this camp experience.


Risks & Challenges

         Our biggest obstacle for this camp is finances. Since this camp started as a simple idea, we also started with a budget of zero. I know that because of the hard work put in by myself and others who know this camp needs to happen; we will overcome this current struggle. We have volunteered tons and tons of our personal time solely because of our passion for this cause. All participants in this camp will also be volunteering purely to help their community.

         If for some reason we are unable to reach our needed amount of money, alterations may need to be made in order to salvage the idea, but none of us want to reach that position. Changing the plan could take away from the opportunities we hope to provide, and our team knows this cannot happen.


Other Ways You Can Help

            As much as we hope for donations, we understand that not everyone is able to contribute. However if you’re as passionate about this as we are, you can help spread the word about Camp Connected! Mention what Camp Connected is doing to a few friends and how their help can really impact this camp and the participants in it. Also by using the Indiegogo share tools, you can help spread the word virtually!

story:
FREEDOM LIFT and COACHLIFT SALES MISSION:

To give back to our Veterans in need. Wounded, disabled, and injured veterans that are having difficulty with their mobility should be provided their freedom again. Mobility lifts for vehicles are expensive to make, and expensive to install. Our goal is to give away as many lifts as we can to those in need! WE GET MANY REQUESTS FOR HELP FROM OUR MOST HONORABLE TROOPS. We would love to tour the country and give away one lift in each state - one in each city - one to every veteran who needs one! But we are limited by our funds. We need your help. Each time we receive enough money to give away a lift, we can provide it to a much needed veteran.

HELP AND HONOR OUR VETS, THEY DESERVE IT:

Customized Jeep presented to Retired Army Staff Sergeant - Video by ktnv.com:

http://ktnv.video.jrn.com?ndn.trackingGroup=90835&ndn.siteSection=ndn&ndn.videoId=25336694&freewheel=90835&sitesection=ndn&vid=25336694

IN NOVEMBER OF 2013 WE WERE ABLE TO PROVIDE JACE BADIA AN INJURED VETERAN A LIFT SO HE CAN EASILY GET BACK INTO HIS CAR AND DRIVE FOR THE FIRST TIME IN YEARS.

7 years ago, Jace Badia lost his left leg in an IED attack in Iraq. "Having a vehicle where you can go anywhere you want to in a disabled state, it's life altering" said Retired Staff Sgt. Badia.

Audi Angel - Sundance Channel's TV Series (Push Girls)

JACE BADIA HONORED BY PRESIDENT BUSH

Riviera Hotel & Casino To Honor Wounded Warrior

November 7, 2013

Auti Angel from the Sundance Channel's TV Series "Push Girls" to be guest speaker at event

LAS VEGAS - November 6, 2013 - Riviera Hotel & Casino, together with event partners CoachLift Sales and COP 4X4 School of Automotive Excellence, will honor wounded warrior Jace Badia and family on Thursday, November 7 at 1:00 p.m. The even will take place in the Riveria parking lot located at 2901 South Las Vegas Blvd. and will feature guest speaker Auti Angel from Sundance Channel's TV show "Push Girls", a reality show about four woman who have been paralyzed by illness or accident and are now wheelchair-bound. The Riviera and event partners have built a loaded Jeep for Badia and his family to drive home in.

Badia lost a leg and battled other injuries while in Afghanistan in 2006. He spent 29 months recuperating at Walter Reed Hospital before returning to active duty in Iraq and Kuwait. Badia has received two Purple Hearts, three Army Commendations and one Army Achievement, plus a host of other awards.

"Our nations heroes fight for our right to freedom every day of the week" says Ryan Wilson, CEO at CoachLift Sales. "It gives us great pleasure to be able to give back to the Badia Family for all of their sacrifices. Everybody is welcome to the Riviera Hotel and Casino to greet and congratulate the deserving recipient!"

Badia's application was selected by the event sponsors from a pool of submissions by soldiers also wounded in service to our country. The jeep will be specifically painted by Tom Prewitt from Department of Customz, retrofitted with appropriate hand controls, provided by The Ability Center and a CoachLift person lift provided by CoachLift Sales so Badia can once again experience the joys of mobility.

Rugged Ridge has customized the Jeep with a laundry list of after market features, including: Performance Vented Hood, Hood Catch Black, XDH Base Winch, XDH Short Caps, XDH Stinger, XDH Rear Bumper, XDH Tire Carrier, Tire Carrier Linkage, RRC Rock Sliders, 10,500 lbs Performance Winch, 30,000 lbs Recovery Kit, XHD Snorkel with Pre-Filter, Hurricane Fender Flares, 4" Lift Kit with Shocks, Drop Pitman Arm, Inverted Drag Link, Adjustable Track Bar, Extended Stainless Steel Braided Brake Hose, Drakon Wheels Gun Metal Gray, Exhaust System, Exhaust Spacer Kit, Floor Liner Front, Floor Liner Rear, Cargo Liner, A-Pillar 4 Switch Pod Kit, Rear Seat Organizer, Overhead Storage, Neoprene Grab Handles, Grab Handle 5 Piece Kit, Center Console Armrest Pad, Neoprene, Cargo Seat Covers, and a Windshield Decal.

The Riviera is providing lodging for Badia and his family during their stay. Other sponsors for the event include Vegas 4X4 and Offroad, Airlutions, GR8TOPS, COP 4X4 School of Automotive Excellence, CoachLift Sales and several others. For more information on CoachLift Sales visit www.coachliftsales.com.

http://www.vegas24seven.com/?p=27368

Our Veteran's mobility is important to us, we take pride in being able to help.

CoachLift has been used in all of the following applications:

RV's - Motorhomes - Swimming pools - Travel trailers - Fifth wheels
Manufactured housing - Second floor access - Vans - Suburbans
Pickups - Eighteen wheelers - Farm machinery - Shuttles - Buses - Boats
Boat interiors, for access to upper levels - Airplanes - Nursing homes
And Stairs

CoachLift staff enjoys helping people in need and will continue to introduce new ways to work with anyone or anything that is need of a lift We are offering new financing options and adding new accessories to make our lifts more comfortable, affordable and fun for everyone.

CoachLift has delivered well over 6,000 lifts in over 25 years of service. If a veteran or disabled individual has difficulty stepping up and down, CoachLift makes it possible to keep doing the things they love to do.

What are Handicapped Lifts from Coach Lift®?

Lifts from Coach Lift® are chairs that rise on a lift tube, and swing around to the door. The user sits comfortably, pushes the control button, rises slowly, and swivels the chair into the door opening, where he or she can transfer into the vehicle. It's a simple concept, but one that can change your life. A Handicapped Lift from Coach Lift® is engineered for durability and ease of use. Installation requires a minimum of modification to your vehicle, making it an extremely economical solution.

Real Life Examples:

Jean loves the RV lifestyle. She and her husband, Jim, have seen a lot of this beautiful country during the 10 years since his retirement. They have made lasting friendships with many other RV'ers along the way, and have no desire to settle down just yet. But Jean's arthritis is making it increasingly difficult for her to get into and out of the RV.

Robert depends on the income from his job as a long haul trucker. It's the only life he's known for the last 22 years. But when a stroke that severely weakened his left side left him unable to climb into the cab of his truck, he thought his days on the road were over. He started planning for a scaled-down future on the income his disability pension would provide.

Lifts from Coach Lift® have enabled both Jean and Robert and countless others to keep doing the things they love with dignity. The possible uses are limitless. You may need help getting into your van, farm equipment, boat, airplane, or home. We understand that your situation is unique. Please talk to us... it's part of our business to customize the Coach Lift® to meet your needs.

How Does a Coach Lift® Work?

The Coach Lift® is installed next to the door of your RV or inside the door of your van. Only minor modifications to your vehicle are required in most cases. It is operated by a 12 volt DC motor that is powered by the vehicle's battery. The chair and swing arm bracket are removed quickly and easily for storage during travel.

The double hinged design of the swing arm bracket allows the durable aluminum chair to turn to any angle for easy loading. The lift is operated with a hand held remote cable pendant switch. The chair rises gently to the desired level where it can be swiveled into the door. To exit the vehicle, the rider sits in the chair, the chair is swiveled away from the door, and the control switch is pushed causing the chair to descend.

Risks and challenges

Nobody has ever been injured using our lift and safety with easy mobility is our number one concern. Thank you so much for your support.

story:
I've been too sick to create a proper pitch video, I hope to add one later.

There's lots of content on this page, click here to jump to the index ➤

Greetings. My name is Raven, and this is my wonderful baby daughter, Malaika.  Thanks for checking out our campaign.  My daughter and I suffer from severe Environmental Sensitivities, which causes chronic illness.

The goal of this campaign is to enable my daughter and me to permanently break free of illness, allowing us to lead long, healthy, happy, and productive lives!

My adult life is defined by a constant struggle against mucous, infection, and serious digestive issues.  I have been too sick to work steadily since 2009.

The past four months have been the most difficult of my life — I am bedridden most of the day, can't take care of my daughter, and can't even take care of myself.  Without significant changes I am nearing the end of my life.

Several weeks ago Malaika went to the ER wheezing for breath, her lungs congested, still to this day.  I don't want her having permanent lung problems, but I am too sick to help her.

If you have any questions or comments, please let me know.  I promise to not simply disappear when the campaign is over!

August 8th, 2014

More photos below, and in the "Gallery" at the top of the page!

Overview

  • Goals of the campaign
     ‣  Goal 1 – “Immediate Surgery” (+$9,800)
     ‣  Goal 2 – “A Breath Of Fresh Air” (+$10,500)
     ‣  Goal 3 – “Regaining Health Fund” (+$5,000)
  • Why contribute?
     ‣  Join us on our adventures through life!
     ‣  Help me become part of my daughter's life again!
     ‣  Save a unique and creative mind
     ‣  End a decade of suffering
     ‣  Provide medical relief
     ‣  Enable me to break free from poverty
     ‣  Help me escape landlord abuse
  • Important note about the Perks
  • Connect with Raven!
  • Frequently Asked Questions
     ‣  Making a contribution
     ‣  Receiving Perks
     ‣  Background information
  • Ways you can help out!
     ‣  Record a brief video in support of the campaign!
     ‣  Help promote the campaign
     ‣  Join the campaign Team
     ‣  Help pick up some things for me
     ‣  Help drive me to appointments/errands
     ‣  Help me with moving preparations



Goals of the campaign



Goal 1 – “Immediate Surgery” (+$9,800)

While nose/sinus surgery is covered by Canadian medical, wait times for a public Operating Room are estimated at 1½ to 2 years.  My goal is to rent a private Operating Room to receive surgery before my body gives out.

I recently located the top sinus specialist in western Canada, Dr. Amin Javer, who does leading sinus research, training, and surgery.  During consultation with him, my CT scan revealed a badly broken nose from childhood that restricts airflow to my sinuses — surgery will likely help me break free from constant infection!

Dr. Javer's public practise is no longer taking patients because of a lack of public Operating Room time.  His wait list had reached five years.  I could get a referral to another public surgeon with a shorter wait list, but it would still take years, and things have become critically bad: I am currently bedridden, have worsening heat-stroke symptoms, and my throat is swelling shut.

Booking an Operating Room at the private False Creek Healthcare Centre will cost $8,500 for 2.5 hours.  This will allow immediate surgery by Dr. Javer, after the prerequisite week of taking antibiotics.  Surgery would be performed by a world-class sinus surgeon using state-of-the-art surgical equipment, offering me the best chance of making a full recovery from my illness.

I will also need to stay in a clean and very cold air conditioned hotel room before and after the surgery, to combat my infection, overheating, and Environmental Sensitivities.  It is pretty much impossible to overcome chronic infection in a home that is super humid and 24 to 30+ C (75 to 86+ F) for sixteen hours a day!

Back to index ⤴



Goal 2 – “A Breath Of Fresh Air” (+$10,500)

As a result of her Environmental Sensitivities, Malaika is currently suffering from lung problems.  We both need high-end air purifiers to avoid chronic illness.

After weeks researching air purifiers, I decided on a company called AllerAir which produces a line of air purifiers specifically designed for people with extreme Multiple Chemical Sensitivities (MCS).  The company was founded by someone with a close family member suffering from MCS.

The AllerAir AirMedic+ line of air purifiers are made entirely from inert materials that can not off-gas.  They use metal housing and contain no plastic or styrofoam, and the motor is fully sealed to prevent any odours from escaping.  They even provide several different carbon blends to test in advance, allowing you to choose the specific blend that bothers your sensitivities the least.  Their filters capture particles far tinier than a standard HEPA filter.

The goal is to purchase 2 air purifiers for my place and 2 for Malaika's mom's place, as well as a set of replacement filters and parts, assuring us both years of clean and breathable air!

Item needed
 Price (USD) Quantity
AllerAir AirMedic+ D MCS air purifier
 Visit web site ➤ 		$1,610 4
Spare MicroHEPA filter $72 4
Spare Carbon Cannister, 25 pounds $480 4
Spare Pre-Filters Value Pack (24 units) $480 1
Spare Carbon Canister Wrap Set (2 Pack) $120 2
Spare Sure Seal Gasket Set $60 4


Total cost is $9,608 USD which is a little over $10,300 CAD, plus shipping.

Back to index ⤴



Goal 3 – “Regaining Health Fund” (+$5,000)

A variety of purchases to help me fight infection and regain my health post-surgery, as well as expenses aimed at helping Malaika avoid a life of chronic illness.

After a decade fighting infection, I have discovered many things which boost my health, but unfortunately most of them are expensive, hard to find, or exhausting to prepare.  My illness leaves me underemployed, which means I can't buy the things I need to get better!

Health costs include purchases such as:

  • Health supplements (enzymes, colloidal silver, Himalayan rock salt, medical-grade Manuka honey, probiotics)
  • Health foods (local berries/fruits/vegetables, raw nuts, raw coconut oil, whole and fresh spices, some rare foods, seed sprouting kit, herb garden)
  • Medications (public medical doesn't always cover prescriptions, such as antibiotics)
  • Water delivery (I must drink 4 to 14 litres [1 to 3½ US gallons] of water daily when fighting infection, and can't stomach most tap water)
  • Bicycles and outdoor gear (second-hand bikes, bike repairs, child-carrier, helmets, lights, reflectors, footwear)
  • Taxi costs (when I'm too sick to bicycle or take public transit)
  • Kitchen supplies (basic kitchenware, food prep supplies, juicer, blender, storage jars)
  • Home cleaning supplies (mops, brushes, cloths, buckets, non-toxic cleaners)

Back to index ⤴



Why contribute?


Join us on our adventures through life!

If it weren't for my illness, I would be actively showing Malaika the world — going new places, trying new things, tasting new foods, adventuring in nature, and meeting new people!  I would love for you to share in our experiences!


Help me become part of my daughter's life again!

For over three months I have been too sick to see my daughter most days.  I am missing her terribly, and she misses me.  I need to break free from infection so I can have her back in my life!


Save a unique and creative mind

I was born with an unusual brain that lacks several basic abilities.  Many things that other people do automatically or easily, take me enormous conscious effort, if I can do them at all.  I have never allowed these limitations to define me, leading me to come up with very non-standard methods for problem solving and learning.

My mind is bursting with solutions to a wide variety of problems, but all my daily energy goes to fighting infection; I would love to be healthy enough to share my ideas with the world!


End a decade of suffering

Instead of working on my life goals, most of my daily energy goes into battling endless infection, struggling just to stay alive.

I wouldn't wish my condition on my worst enemy.  I don't think anyone deserves to spend thousands of hours enduring excruciating abdominal cramping and sinus pain, coughing up infected mucous, starving from long-term digestive issues, and pervasive fatigue that isn't helped with sleep.


Provide medical relief

I have sought medical help for my condition for more than a decade, but despite seeing an endless stream of doctors, ENTs, specialists, and Emergency Rooms, not one doctor ever looked at my sinuses with a camera scope, or suggested I try doing anything at all.  I have been left to solve my medical problems on my own, or die.

I recently had a private and rather expensive 30 minute consultation with a sinus expert, and finally received practical medical care!

I find it sad that the only way for many Canadians to receive decent medical care is by paying out-of-pocket.  There are more than just cracks in Canada's medical system that people slip through... there are giant gaping holes swallowing people alive!


Enable me to break free from poverty

My illness has kept me from steady employment for several years.  I first lived off savings, then government assistance.  In November 2013, I was deemed ineligible to receive further government assistance "because I live with someone who helps take care of my daughter", and was kicked off, left struggling to pay the rent and to afford food.

I have known for many years what medical equipment and health products I need, but poverty has kept them from me.

I am currently in the process of receiving money from a family land sale, but it won't be nearly enough to cover all costs related to recovering my health and protecting my daughter's health.  The land sale money will be spent on living expenses while recovering my health, and costs related to getting back to work (a computer, a printer, Internet, video editing equipment, work clothes, and so on).


Help me escape landlord abuse

After moving to my current rental suite a year ago with Malaika and her mom, our landlords began breaking every law in the book and making our lives hell.

They prevent us from doing our laundry; prevent our daughter from using the back yard; let their pitbull terrorise our guests and cat; no lock on one of our doors; no usable heating system during the winter; harassment and intimidation; and a lot more.

I have been far too sick to move or file a case against them.

Back to index ⤴



Important note about the Perks

I will do everything in my power to fulfill the Perks, but there is no guarantee I will overcome my chronic illness.  If I remain too sick to fulfil the Perks, I promise to at least provide regular updates about how me and Malaika are doing.

Please contact me if you have any questions about Perks!

Back to index ⤴




Connect with Raven!

If you are signed in to IndieGoGo, you can post a question or comment by cicking on "Comments" at the top of the page.

For other ways to contact me:

Visit my contact page ➤

Back to index ⤴



Frequently Asked Questions

If you have any questions not answered below, please contact me and I will get back to you as soon as I can!


Making a contribution

  • How do I make a contribution?
    1. Click on the box for the Perk level you want, found near the top of the page on the right side.
    2. On the next page, confirm how much you are contributing.  You can contribute more money than the Perk level costs, if you want.
    • 3. For Perk levels of $100 and above, enter your shipping information for the mailed-out Perks.
    4. On the next page, you can choose to pay directly through IndieGoGo, or through PayPal.  See the next question for more details.

  • What's the difference between paying with credit card or PayPal?
    To use PayPal, you will be taken to the PayPal web site where you can pay via credit card or PayPal balance, and I will receive your contribution immediately!  You do not need a PayPal account, just a credit card.
    To use IndieGoGo, enter your credit card info and IndieGoGo will bill you immediately, but I will only receive the funds once the campaign has finished.

  • Can I make a contribution on behalf of a friend?
    Yep!  More information.

  • Can I pool contributions with friends to get a better Perk?
    Sure!  You may divide Perks between one person for every $250 contributed.  For example, a contribution of $1,000 may be divided among 4 different people.  You must provide the names and contact info for each person, and let me know how you want the Perks to be divided.  Please contact me directly before making a pooled contribution.

  • I made a mistake, can I get my money back?
    Indiegogo Terms of Use state that all contributions are final and non-refundable (more information).  That said, I am personally willing to refund any contribution of $10 or more via PayPal, and any contribution of $100 or more via other means (money order, Western Union, wire transfer, etc.), minus any fees.  Refunds can be requested at latest 2 days after the campaign ends.

  • Can I contribute anonymously?
    Sort of.  You can withhold your name and/or the amount you contributed from the public, but I will still see your name and contribution amount.  This is necessary for Perks to be fulfilled. After clicking on your Perk, make sure to check the box that says "[x] Don't display my name on the campaign page" (more information).  If you want to remain completely anonymous, you could send me a donation via BitCoin or cash.  See next question.

  • Are there other ways I can send you funds?
    Sure!  If the campaign has already ended or you don't want to use IndieGoGo for any reason, you can use PayPal, BitCoin, postal mail (cash, money orders, treasure chests full of gold, ect.), or contact me directly to arrange anything else (Vancity transfer, Western Union, etc.).




Back to index ⤴


Receiving Perks

  • What are Perks?
    Perks are a way to reward you for your financial contribution.  My goal is to make this campaign more than just a fundraiser, I want you to be completely happy that you helped out!  I have tried to come up with some compelling Perks, and I hope you enjoy them.

  • Are there any additional shipping charges?
    No!  All Perks already include worldwide shipping.

Back to index ⤴


Background information

  • Where are you from?
    I was born near the village of Port Clements on the island chain of Haida Gwaii (also formerly known as the Queen Charlotte Islands), the ancestral home of the Haida people, located off the north-western coast of British Columbia, Canada.  I moved to Vancouver when I was seven years old, and have since lived in many places around BC.

  • Is "Raven" your real name?
    Yes!  My parents went with the name because there was an actual raven flying around the meadow outside the log cabin where I was born.  My birth name was Raven Morris, and I have been going by Raven Singularity for the past couple years.  I want to legally change my name, but have been too sick to obtain the required documentation.

  • What medical conditions are you dealing with?
    My medical condition is complex, with many interrelated issues and symptoms.  I have been formerly diagnosed as having Chronic Rhinosinusitis (sinus infection) and Environmental Sensitivities (ES), but despite this I have been unable to find any public medical help for years on end.  I am no longer strong enough to keep seeking public medical help at this point, so I have turned to private medical help, which has been fast and effective.  My 30 minute private consultation with a sinus expert was more beneficial than the previous 15 years of seeking public medical help!  It was the best $500 I have ever spent.  The sinus expert reviewed my CT scan and did an examination and reported that I have a severely deviated septum (broken nose from early childhood that I didn't know about), major sinus blockage, sinus infection, presence of sticky mucous, sinus inflammation, and other sinus issues (read the medical details on my Facebook).

  • What is your current living arrangement and financial situation?
    Several months before our daughter was born, Haisla Collins (Malaika's mother) and I had already separated.  A couple months after Malaika's birth, we moved in together as roommates, so that we would both have access to our daughter.  In November 2013 I was cut off Income Assistance because of living with someone that helps care for my daughter.  We were not in a relationship and did not meet the government's criteria for marriage-like/commonlaw, it was strictly because I lived at the same address as someone assisting Malaika.  They would not even allow me to remove Malaika from my file and only receive assistance for myself.  For the next half-year the three of us continued to live together, with me sick and struggling to come up with monthly rent, and not having money to feed myself.  Haisla moved out a month ago, with Malaika.  The house I am renting from was sold shortly after Haisla moved out, and I must be out by the end of August 2014.

  • Can't you receive Income Assistance if you're living alone now?
    A couple months ago I received the first portion of money from a family land sale, and I am living off the final bit of this right now.  The money is not considered "income", however people are not eligible for Income Assistance if they have any savings.  People on disability assistance are permitted to have savings, but my application for disability was silently denied, despite including a documented diagnosis of Environmental Sensitivities, which is a recognised disability in Canada.  Filing for disability is a complex process, and I am currently far too sick to manage a second application.  I am in the process of filing my taxes in order to receive the final portion of land sale money, which I will use while recovering from my illness (for expenses related to rent, living, moving, medical needs, getting back to work, and paying off any income tax from this campaign).

  • If you have Environmental Sensitivities, why do you live with a long-haired cat?
    For most of my life I did not react to most things found in nature, including animal dander, trees, flowers, pollen, and even cut grass.  During the last year I have become steadily more sensitive, and now I react strongly to all of these things.  Sitsa is being cared for by someone else the past couple months, as I'm too sick right now.  I hope to recover from surgery, get the air purifiers, and get Sitsa back!

  • Wouldn't it be cheaper to buy an air conditioner than stay in a hotel?
    Air conditioners usually have poor air filters, or none at all, causing them to put out large amounts of particulate matter.  This burns my throat within minutes and quickly becomes unbearable.  Most hotels have air conditioners with decent air filters that are changed regularly, and I would be able to check this out before renting a room.

Back to index ⤴



Revisiting the cabin on Haida Gwaii where I was born, decades later.


Left: me and my sister playing on a windy beach with a Tonka truck.
Right: me and a cat friend outside the cabin.



Ways you can help out!

A contribution of even $1 helps a lot — it could help the campaign make it to the front page of IndieGoGo — but you don't need a credit card to help the campaign succeed!


Record a brief video in support of the campaign!

Campaigns succeed or fail based on how involved supporters are.  To that end, it would mean the world to me if you could record a video in support of this campaign – I would love to hear what you have to say!

  • Do you know me or Malaika and have a brief story to share?
  • Do you know what it's like living with Environmental Sensitivities or chronic sinus infection?
  • Have you slipped through the cracks of Canada's public healthcare system?
  • Anything else you would like to share?

How to share your video ➤


Help promote the campaign

I have made a list below of the most effective ways you can help this campaign, based on how much time you can volunteer!

Never underestimate how much power you have to grow an online campaign when making good use of your time and resources!

How much time can you spare?

1 - 2 minutes

  • Post a comment or question on this page
  • Share the campaign link on your Facebook, Google+, Twitter, or other social media

5 - 10 minutes

  • Send short personal e-mails, texts, or chat messages to the people you know who are most likely to help out!
  • Send me a friend request on Facebook and Like or Share my messages about the campaign
  • Write a personal message about the campaign and post it to your Facebook, Google+, Twitter, or other social media

20 - 30 minutes

  • Record a brief video in support of the campaign
  • Post about the campaign to your online communities (e.g. mailing lists, groups, message boards, blogs, private sites, Reddit, Digg)

    Please don't spam, keep posts relevant to the community!  Many forums have an "off-topic" section where you can post anything you like.  Personal posts are the most effective!

60 - 90 minutes

  • Pick the five most popular or famous people you know, and personally ask them if they would be willing to send a message out to their contacts about the campaign!
  • Submit the story to online news sites and blogs
  • Contact local media in Metro Vancouver or British Columbia about the campaign (print, radio, TV)

    Relevant news topics could include: disability, chronic illness, access to healthcare, social injustice, child poverty, access to Income Assistance and Disability, landlord issues; please post a message or contact me directly if you have any questions!

A whole afternoon

  • Personally tell everybody you know about the campaign — friends, family, people in your groups and clubs, distant relatives, co-workers, roommates, classmates, cellmates, your hair stylist, street mimes!

A longer time

  • Wow, contact me to coordinate something!


Join the campaign Team

If you know me or Malaika in real life, you can show your support by joining the campaign Team as a "Supporter", which means your name, photo, and Facebook icon will shown up at the bottom of the page.  Please contact me for instructions!


Help pick up some things for me

I don't usually have the energy to leave the house, so it would be greatly appreciated if anybody could pick up any of the items below, and drop them off for me in north Burnaby!

If you contact me before you buy something, I can take it off the list.  I can pay in cash ($20s) or Vancity transfer (if you have an account).

  • Pharmacy items: Epsom bathing salts, large cloth adhesive bandages, mouth thermometer, tape measure (this kind), nasal irrigation aid (neti-pot), Gaviscon mint flavoured antacid liquid
  • Roots/herbs: Oregon grape root, goldenseal root, Angelica root, licorice root, pleuisy root, lemongrass root, lemon verbena leaves, lemon balm leaves, mint leaves, euphrasia/eyebright leaves, stevia leaves, elder flower, chamomile flower, Echinacea, yarrow, catnip. (Note: looking for fresh or dried, minimally processed; do not want tinctures, extracts, pills, or oils please)
  • Spices/nutrition: Himalayan/pink rock salt (whole chunks or ground, no additives), whole nutmeg, whole cloves, green cardamom pods, black cardamom pods, ajwain/carom pods, coriander seeds, mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, dried bay leaves, dried curry leaves, dried fenugreek leaves, red chili powder, ground asafetida, ground ginger, ground paprika. (Note: looking for intensely flavoured spices, such as what you find at the Indian shops south of 41st and Fraser; do not want prepackaged)
  • Appliances/kitchen: Sprouter with bag of alfalfa or other mild sprouting seeds, dehumidifier (confirm price), NutriBullet or MagicBullet blender, juicer (confirm price), cheesecloth, kitchen scale, one or two 2nd-hand coffee grinders with low blades suitable for grinding spices, 6 to 12 regular-mouth 1-litre Mason jars with lids
  • Bicycle accessories: Blinking red light, large pack of AAA batteries, rear panniers with rack (confirm price first)


Help drive me to appointments/errands

I could use a lift to my appointments and running my errands.  I'm often too sick to take the bus, and taxis are not affordable.  Things like grocery shopping can leave me exhausted for days after.  I would be happy to pay for gas or buy you lunch as thanks!  Please contact me if you can help out.


Help me with moving preparations

The house where I'm staying has been sold, and I need to be moved out by the end of the month (August 2014).  I'm mostly bedridden and could greatly use a hand with finding a new place, packing, cleaning, recycling, garbage disposal, and moving.  If you might be able to help with any of these, please contact me directly!

Back to index ⤴

  • Raven's Facebook page Send me a friend request or message me; campaign updates will be posted here, please Like and Share
  • Campaign page on Facebook All campaign updates will be posted to this page, please Like and Share

story_txt:
I've been too sick to create a proper pitch video, I hope to add one later.
There's lots of content on this page, click here to jump to the index ➤


Greetings. My name is Raven, and this is my wonderful baby daughter, Malaika.  Thanks for checking out our campaign.  My daughter and I suffer from severe Environmental Sensitivities, which causes chronic illness.
The goal of this campaign is to enable my daughter and me to permanently break free of illness, allowing us to lead long, healthy, happy, and productive lives!
My adult life is defined by a constant struggle against mucous, infection, and serious digestive issues.  I have been too sick to work steadily since 2009.
The past four months have been the most difficult of my life — I am bedridden most of the day, can't take care of my daughter, and can't even take care of myself.  Without significant changes I am nearing the end of my life.
Several weeks ago Malaika went to the ER wheezing for breath, her lungs congested, still to this day.  I don't want her having permanent lung problems, but I am too sick to help her.
If you have any questions or comments, please let me know.  I promise to not simply disappear when the campaign is over!
August 8th, 2014

More photos below, and in the "Gallery" at the top of the page!

Overview


Goals of the campaign
       ‣  Goal 1 – “Immediate Surgery” (+$9,800)
       ‣  Goal 2 – “A Breath Of Fresh Air” (+$10,500)
       ‣  Goal 3 – “Regaining Health Fund” (+$5,000)


Why contribute?
       ‣  Join us on our adventures through life!
       ‣  Help me become part of my daughter's life again!
       ‣  Save a unique and creative mind
       ‣  End a decade of suffering
       ‣  Provide medical relief
       ‣  Enable me to break free from poverty
       ‣  Help me escape landlord abuse

Important note about the Perks

Connect with Raven!


Frequently Asked Questions
       ‣  Making a contribution
       ‣  Receiving Perks
       ‣  Background information


Ways you can help out!
       ‣  Record a brief video in support of the campaign!
       ‣  Help promote the campaign
       ‣  Join the campaign Team
       ‣  Help pick up some things for me
       ‣  Help drive me to appointments/errands
       ‣  Help me with moving preparations






Goals of the campaign



Goal 1 – “Immediate Surgery” (+$9,800)
While nose/sinus surgery is covered by Canadian medical, wait times for a public Operating Room are estimated at 1½ to 2 years.  My goal is to rent a private Operating Room to receive surgery before my body gives out.
I recently located the top sinus specialist in western Canada, Dr. Amin Javer, who does leading sinus research, training, and surgery.  During consultation with him, my CT scan revealed a badly broken nose from childhood that restricts airflow to my sinuses — surgery will likely help me break free from constant infection!
Dr. Javer's public practise is no longer taking patients because of a lack of public Operating Room time.  His wait list had reached five years.  I could get a referral to another public surgeon with a shorter wait list, but it would still take years, and things have become critically bad: I am currently bedridden, have worsening heat-stroke symptoms, and my throat is swelling shut.
Booking an Operating Room at the private False Creek Healthcare Centre will cost $8,500 for 2.5 hours.  This will allow immediate surgery by Dr. Javer, after the prerequisite week of taking antibiotics.  Surgery would be performed by a world-class sinus surgeon using state-of-the-art surgical equipment, offering me the best chance of making a full recovery from my illness.
I will also need to stay in a clean and very cold air conditioned hotel room before and after the surgery, to combat my infection, overheating, and Environmental Sensitivities.  It is pretty much impossible to overcome chronic infection in a home that is super humid and 24 to 30+ C (75 to 86+ F) for sixteen hours a day!
Back to index ⤴



Goal 2 – “A Breath Of Fresh Air” (+$10,500)
As a result of her Environmental Sensitivities, Malaika is currently suffering from lung problems.  We both need high-end air purifiers to avoid chronic illness.
After weeks researching air purifiers, I decided on a company called AllerAir which produces a line of air purifiers specifically designed for people with extreme Multiple Chemical Sensitivities (MCS).  The company was founded by someone with a close family member suffering from MCS.
The AllerAir AirMedic+ line of air purifiers are made entirely from inert materials that can not off-gas.  They use metal housing and contain no plastic or styrofoam, and the motor is fully sealed to prevent any odours from escaping.  They even provide several different carbon blends to test in advance, allowing you to choose the specific blend that bothers your sensitivities the least.  Their filters capture particles far tinier than a standard HEPA filter.
The goal is to purchase 2 air purifiers for my place and 2 for Malaika's mom's place, as well as a set of replacement filters and parts, assuring us both years of clean and breathable air!

Back to index ⤴



Goal 3 – “Regaining Health Fund” (+$5,000)
A variety of purchases to help me fight infection and regain my health post-surgery, as well as expenses aimed at helping Malaika avoid a life of chronic illness.
After a decade fighting infection, I have discovered many things which boost my health, but unfortunately most of them are expensive, hard to find, or exhausting to prepare.  My illness leaves me underemployed, which means I can't buy the things I need to get better!
Health costs include purchases such as:

Health supplements (enzymes, colloidal silver, Himalayan rock salt, medical-grade Manuka honey, probiotics)

Health foods (local berries/fruits/vegetables, raw nuts, raw coconut oil, whole and fresh spices, some rare foods, seed sprouting kit, herb garden)

Medications (public medical doesn't always cover prescriptions, such as antibiotics)

Water delivery (I must drink 4 to 14 litres [1 to 3½ US gallons] of water daily when fighting infection, and can't stomach most tap water)

Bicycles and outdoor gear (second-hand bikes, bike repairs, child-carrier, helmets, lights, reflectors, footwear)

Taxi costs (when I'm too sick to bicycle or take public transit)

Kitchen supplies (basic kitchenware, food prep supplies, juicer, blender, storage jars)

Home cleaning supplies (mops, brushes, cloths, buckets, non-toxic cleaners)
