story:
Who are Jasmin and Mat?

Jasmin Newman

Jasmin Newman was a child who carried the scars of physical, sexual and emotional trauma into her adult life and had a lifelong pursuit to finding internal peace and happiness. After many years of seeking answers through various counselling models, she came to the ultimate realization that she alone had the power to heal from within.

Jasmin brings great compassion to her work as a Male Performance Coach who specializes in helping men who are struggling to create deeper, richer and more intimate connections.

Mat Bodhi Bryan

Mat Bodhi Bryan has survived and healed after experiencing a childhood that was chock full of abuse. Many of the paths that he has taken throughout his life are a result of this history. 

His own path involved an education and understanding of Eastern philosophies. His path led him to Zen Buddhism, in an effort to enhance his growth and understanding, all to end his own pain and shame and guilt. He has developed programs based on his education and understanding for Men at various levels of healing.

Why are we doing this?

Due to the fact that we are both survivors; we are both Coaches who focus on Male specific factors; we both primarily work in an effort to create better lives.
The reality of male sexual abuse is that everyone who interacts with a survivor who is in fact suffering with a secret can become collateral damage. This does not have to happen. We as men deserve the possibility to show up in our daily lives as MEN... not the scared, defenseless little boy that is hiding in the shell of a man.

Where is it all going?

Mat and Jasmin are working diligently on changing the world one man at a time. The depth and breadth of what we are looking to impact is that all of the contributions will be shared with each survivor that we can help. It will also help progress and spread this message. What this money will allow us to do is to step away from our other projects and make this our main focus.

We have established the perks for this drive so that each contribution over $250 will be put directly into a scholarship for men that may not be able to afford to attend one of our workshops. Each 'gift of giving' will directly go to benefit someone else's growth and healing.

We would like the ability to help even the homeless man on the street work through his pain and suffering. Each of us has a reason to be on this Earth... Jasmin and Mat have discovered theirs. We want to help others find their reason for being here.

Here is what we are asking for.

Both Jasmin and Mat have stepped away from their own lives and businesses in an International collaborative effort to travel through the country and shed some light on an otherwise taboo subject. Everything that we are currently doing is creating awareness and conversations with the media, universities and private practitioners as well as community groups.

Here is what we are offering.

  • @ $1000 provides a scholarship for one man to attend one of our workshops and 3 months of coaching.
  • @ $500 provides a scholarship for one man to attend one of our workshops.
  • @ $250 building a scholarship for one man.
  • @ $10, $25, $50 and $100 will help build an infrastructure to create deepening awareness and understanding.

What happens if we do not reach our goal?

Every dollar will be spent to create the necessary infrastructure in an effort to create more awareness and impact as many lives as possible.

What will keep us from failing?

It is the men that we reach and the stories that they tell that will keep us from failing. Having lived the life of a survivor Jasmin and Mat know the pain that silence brings. 

The hurdles we will experience are the entrenched institutions that feel men are not victims of sexual abuse, but the perpetrators. Our voice is necessary in order to effect change regarding the perceptions and feelings around male sexual abuse and assault.

Many people believe that this is not an issue, when the numbers speak otherwise. At least 1 in 6 men suffer with the knowledge that they were sexually abused or assaulted. 

Every time someone listens to us, reads our emails, sees value in our message and reads our stories... we are raising awareness. The snowball may be tiny at the top of the mountain, but when it gets rolling downhill... nothing will stop the snowball until it has reached the end of its journey. 

Sincerely,

Jasmin and Mat

http://www.hurttohealing.com/

hurttohealing@yahoo.com

story:
THANK YOU TO ALL FOR HELPING US HIT OUR INITIAL GOAL OF $6000.  A year of travel is covered.  We have a few more years of travel ahead of us, it would be great to cover two years!!

News story about the awesome group of students raising money for Sam:

http://www.wbay.com/story/19610224/2012/09/21/students-raise-money-for-child-with-rare-disorder

See our gallery for more News coverage videos!!

Sam's Story

Our son, Sam, was born with a rare genetic disorder called Microvillus Inclusion Disease on March 7, 2008. The simplest explanation for what Microvillus Inclusion Disease means for Sam is that his intestines do not work properly. Because they do not absorb nutrients like most people, he has to be supplied with all of his nutrition through an IV. In Sam's case this is done through a central line that starts in the center of his chest, tunnels under his skin to a vein in his neck and then travels down that vein to a spot close to his heart.
We were able to take Sam home from the hospital on May 29th, 2008, but very shortly after Sam began to show signs of TPN associated liver disease.  We made plans to take Sam to Children's Hospital Boston for an experimental treatment to help reduce and prevent the liver damage he was experiencing.  
After working with the team at Children's Hospital Boston, Sam became their ninety-fourth baby to be treated with Omegaven, an investigational treatment of refined fish oil, for his TPN associated liver disease.
Sam is able to receive Omegaven as part of an investigational study at Children's Hospital Boston, but we must travel there every eight weeks in order to remain in the study.
 
We were hopeful when we started this journey that Omegaven would be approved for use in the U.S. by 2010.  Approval has been delayed and we will need to continue these trips for possibly another two to four years.  
 
We are not able to obtain Omegaven locally as our health insurance does not cover investigational treatments.  
 
More information available about Sam at www.samoconnor.com

What Your Donation Will Do

In order to continue these frequent trips to Boston, we need to raise fund to cover travel expenses for Sam and one parent until the drug is approved by the FDA and we can receive it locally. Raising our goal of $6000 will cover airfare to Boston for one year.  Any funds raised over the goal will be used for additional trips to Boston in the coming years and a portion will be donated to the Omegaven research program at Children's Hospital Boston.

The Impact

Without a doubt, receiving Omegaven has saved Sam's life.  Four years ago we were told he would not likely live to be two years old.  He has beaten the odds thanks to all of those that have continued to support him.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, and that's OK.  You can still help! Sharing Sam's story with your family and friends by word of mouth, email, facebook, or other social media will help get the word out and reach the biggest audience possible.

story:
Sonali Mukherjee Acid Attack Victim pleads “give me justice or let me die!”

Join our campaign to save Sonali before it’s too late.

What Happened:

You’ve probably seen CNN’s coverage about a beautiful young Indian girl who was the victim of a horrific acid attack while she was sleeping by three men who broke into her home and left her face permanently disfigured beyond recognition, blind and deaf. Her tormentors walked free after only 3 years.

Sonali Mukherjee was 17 at the time, and 9 years later, after receiving no money or assistance from the state, she may decide to end her life.
 

In her Own Words:

“All these years, I have been living only on assurances. If the government cannot help me then it should allow me to kill myself… I am tired now and I don't want to live half a life, with half a face."
Her family was forced to sell everything, is practically penniless and can no longer meet her medical costs after trying to fund several operations that have only helped give her disfigured face some shape.
She needs a substantial amount of financial help to look even remotely human and have her eyesight restored.

What Can You Do?

Just donate what you can.  Let’s all pull together and show her what Indiegogo’ers can do in our campaign to save Sonali and give her a reason to live - that's what will make a difference.  Please click the big pink button at the top or bottom of this page that says "Contribute Now."  Any amount you can contribute is a blessing and thank you in advance for supporting our campaign.

Spread the word.  Please share this with as many people as you can.

 
Where your money goes:
Your money will go to Sonali Mukherjee and her family to pay for treatments. Continual ongoing threats from the perpetrators that have been released from jail means it is imperative for the family to be able to move away to a new location and live in peace. Donations are not Tax –deductible.

http://www.indiegogo.com/newlife4sonali
#newlife4sonali
story_txt:
Sonali Mukherjee Acid Attack Victim pleads “give me justice or let me die!”
Join our campaign to save Sonali before it’s too late.

What Happened:
You’ve probably seen CNN’s coverage about a beautiful young Indian girl who was the victim of a horrific acid attack while she was sleeping by three men who broke into her home and left her face permanently disfigured beyond recognition, blind and deaf. Her tormentors walked free after only 3 years.Sonali Mukherjee was 17 at the time, and 9 years later, after receiving no money or assistance from the state, she may decide to end her life.
 
In her Own Words:
“All these years, I have been living only on assurances. If the government cannot help me then it should allow me to kill myself… I am tired now and I don't want to live half a life, with half a face."Her family was forced to sell everything, is practically penniless and can no longer meet her medical costs after trying to fund several operations that have only helped give her disfigured face some shape.She needs a substantial amount of financial help to look even remotely human and have her eyesight restored. 

What Can You Do?

Just donate what you can.  Let’s all pull together and show her what Indiegogo’ers can do in our campaign to save Sonali and give her a reason to live - that's what will make a difference.  Please click the big pink button at the top or bottom of this page that says "Contribute Now."  Any amount you can contribute is a blessing and thank you in advance for supporting our campaign.

Spread the word.  Please share this with as many people as you can. 

 
Where your money goes:
Your money will go to Sonali Mukherjee and her family to pay for treatments. Continual ongoing threats from the perpetrators that have been released from jail means it is imperative for the family to be able to move away to a new location and live in peace. Donations are not Tax –deductible. http://www.indiegogo.com/newlife4sonali #newlife4sonali

story:
About Us

The Pizza Luca team is a mobile wood fired oven on a classic 1952 Chevy truck (pizzaluca.com). We are capable of producing hot, fresh pizza on almost any outdoor site. We serve the tri-state area. 

What We Need

We need funds to provide meals to people who are still without power/heat/gas etc. At a cost of $6/per meal, we can provide pizza and hot coffee for individuals who are displaced, volunteers, elderly, and in need due to no refrigeration, stoves, homes, etc.

  • We can provide up to 1,000 meals and 1,000 hot beverages a day at a cost of $6. All the funds will go directly to the food and fuel for the Pizza Luca truck.

What You Get

  • Flexibilty- A mobile truck able to move where the need is greatest.
  • Immediate food to areas that have zero infrasturcture. 1,000 meals + 1,000 hot beverages are possible each day.

 The Impact

Without any means to provide food for themselves, a hot meal is a small way to help those who have lost power, water, telephone access, and possibly even their home.

  • We are available daily to give help to those who need it quickly
  • We have served the Breezy Point community and witnessed the damage. There is an immediate and positive impact in serving hot food and beverages.

story:
Summary

Hi, everyone. My name is Annie Belle, and I recently graduated from the University of Mary Washington Summa Cum Laude, with honors in sociology, and in the top 1% of my class. I have spent the past four years working extremely hard to achieve academic excellence, and while I have been successful in my scholarly pursuits, I have neglected my health, emotional happiness, and overall fitness. Over the course of the last year and a half, I have gained 60 pounds (that’s right – 60 POUNDS!) and starting now, I am taking control of my health. No more eating unhealthy snacks to mask my emotions, no more energy drinks at 2 am to help me stay up late and finish a paper, no more weekly trips to Cold Stone 'because I deserve it,' and no more more-cream-than-coffee in my coffee. The bottom line: I need your help to purchase this bicycle and get myself in gear (pun intended.)

What I Need & What You Get:

In order to achieve my fitness goals, I purchased a gym membership last month, but I am looking for something a little more dynamic to compliment my trips to the gym. I am currently unemployed (but searching diligently for a job), but I have a small amount of money set aside, and I need your help to purchase this bicycle. Having this bicycle will allow me to achieve my 10-year dream of joining a local cycling team, and spending more time outdoors, while lessening my impact on the environment. Anything you can afford to contribute helps, and I appreciate every penny.
 
For those who donate money, I am offering a few perks, which can be found listed to the right of this box (there are 11, and they increase in worth as the size of the donation increases.)

The Impact

By helping me afford this bicycle, you are helping me reach my fitness and health goals. I need to be healthier - for myself, for my future, for those around me, for my goals, for my happiness, for my heart.

I have created a fitness/food/health blog where you can follow my progress (click here), and I will post regular updates about how things are going. In just a few short days, I will begin The Flat Belly Diet, because after watching my mom and step-dad shed the pounds, the Flat Belly Diet seems too awesome to resist!

If you have any questions about this campaign, my health quest, or anything else, please feel free to shoot me an email. I cannot express how important this is to me, and how much I appreciate your contributions. Thank you, thank you, thank you. And wish me luck! :)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute by funding my campaign, please feel free to contribute by way of emotional support! I will need a lot of motivation and encouragement, because the task ahead of me will not be easy, but I recognize that it is necessary for my health and happiness. Cards, emails, facebook messages, etc. are always welcome!

story:
I am writing & self-publishing an Element Core Training guide book with a video for every body!

 I hope to inspire you to make health full choices to improve upon your general well being and quality of life.

This book/video project  has been fully inspired by the dedication  my  students have had in working from the core of themselves, not only in the exercises but from their center.   The Element Core Training book/video  is as much about connecting to the  physical core of the body as it is as about connecting to whole self,working within community.

I am raising funds for the actual printing /production cost  of my first book: Element Core Training as well as the creation of the Element Core Training video. A portion of the funds raised will go to contributing artists:  the graphic designer:Dave Snider and videographer: Genoa Faber. In addition, a portion of funds raised will pay the students/models in the video.

I am excited and honored to work/co-create with all these people.

10% of the sale of each book with be donated to the Africa Yoga Project Ambassador Program

The book is almost done! written, photographed and is in the layout production stage. The book, after an edit,  will go to print mid-September. The video is in the pre-produced stage.

I anticipate sending you Element Core Training guide book with a video in October!

 

 

THANK YOU!

 

Amy is versed in many disciplines with AcroYoga being her primary inspiration. After acquiring her BA in Dance from the University of Oregon, she taught dance and technical theatre skills in the department for seven years. Concurrently, Amy was performing and teaching in Oregon, Mexico, and Switzerland. Amy loves movement, received her AcroYoga certification in 2008. She lives in Santa Cruz, is writing a core conditioning book and teaches core conditioning and AcroYoga full-time.
My core conditioning training comes from dance, rock climbing, yoga, surfing, personal training, outside inspiration, scientific training, multiple certifications in core conditioning, AcroYoga training, and everyday life.

story:
4th July 2009 : Fourteen minutes after leaving home to meet friends, Nick Verron, a bright 25 year old with a great future, was found, bleeding and unconscious, in a Bournemouth alley.

(see video link in the gallery)


Nick had been stabbed through the brain with a 10 inch screwdriver for refusing to buy cigarettes for a group of kids. He was in a coma before he hit the floor. His attacker, a 17 year old, was picked up two days later, still wearing Nick’s blood, after his friends came forward to the police.
Nick had a depressed fracture of the left temple. He needed emergency surgery to remove shards of bone from his brain, and a deep penetration wound tracked through the left hemisphere towards the brain stem. He suffered elevated intracranial pressure, hypoxia, and massive subarachnoid haemorrhage. He was not expected to survive.


For weeks Nick’s family drove the 220 mile round trip daily to be with him while Nick himself remained in a deep coma with no signs of life. His body was not absorbing food, he had contracted pneumonia and his blood was being passed through a refrigeration unit to bring the fever down. It was also evident that his right side was completely paralysed. The doctors could do no more and the family were told that should his heart give out, they would not attempt to bring him back. If by some miracle he survived, the extent of the brain injury meant that he would be severely brain injured and have no quality of life.


But Nick chose to live. Slowly, month by month, in hospitals and rehab units in three counties, his family with him every day, Nick fought his way back. At first, unable to speak for weeks, he spelled out laboriously what he wanted to say, pointing with an uncertain left hand to letters on a board. It quickly became apparent that his personality remained, unbelievably, intact. So were his education, spelling and punctuation. Memories returned over the months and his mind cleared.


Yet he was still trapped in a body that would not function when he was finally discharged back to his mother’s care. He could not walk, wash or care for himself. His sight was irrevocably damaged, his vision double and constantly bouncing. He had no balance and suffered from profound ataxia.
Nick devised an exercise regime, spending ten to fourteen hours a day painfully encouraging his body to work again. Slowly he learned to sit unsupported, to stand, and even to walk a few steps with a walking frame. He even moved into his own home, where he lives alone with a little daily help. He had several further surgeries, but his sight has not improved.
The biggest problem Nick faces is his self-confidence, utterly shattered by both the attack itself and his altered physical appearance and abilities. He is ‘ashamed’ to go out in public and consequently seldom leaves his home. He is just 28.


The ocean voyages run by the Jubilee Sailing Trust, where disabled crew members sail a specially equipped tall ship on equal terms with able-bodied voyagers, would address this final and most insurmountable hurdle by encouraging Nick to stretch and surpass the limitations imposed by his disabilities and his own lack of self-confidence. Sailing without a carer, Nick would be able to face his fears, learn to interact with strangers again and make new friends. It could give Nick his life back.

The Jubilee Trust video can be viewed at http://www.jst.org.uk/jubilee-sailing-trust-video.aspx

story:
Sunscreenr Sees Unprotected Skin. Sunscreenr shows you where you've missed a spot when applying sunscreen AND where sunscreen has worn off your skin even after sweating, swimming, or toweling off. 

Footage shot with the Sunscreenr prototype

Sunscreenr is a special viewer that changes the way you protect yourself from sun damage. We've taken technology used by scientists and made it easy to see where your skin is covered by sunscreen and where it's not. 



As Seen On


How do you know if you're protected? There are 1 Million cases of skin cancer per year in the US alone, but sunscreen can significantly reduce your chances of getting cancer. Unfortunately, most people only apply 25% to 50% of the sunscreen they should. That's where Sunscreenr comes in.

 



Products and Pricing


All Sunscreenrs come with a micro USB charging cord and microfiber bag. The bag is for easy carrying and protection. It can also be used to clean the Sunscreenr lenses.

Shipping fees are $6 for US shipping and $16 for international shipping for one Sunscreenr. For international shipping, please note that you are responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.



1. Review the Products & Pricing section above.  

2. Determine which product you want.

3. Look for the product in the upper right of this page under Perks.

4. Click on the product that you want.

5. Enter your payment information.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We welcome your questions!




The Story

The idea of Sunscreenr was first born a few years ago after seeing a family member struggle with skin cancer. We came up with the idea of a simple device that would let anyone "see" if they had applied sunscreen properly, even after swimming, toweling off, playing outside all day, etc.





It took almost 2 years to build the right team who could turn the idea into reality. After several prototypes, we are now launching Sunscreenr to bring the idea to you.


Stencil was applied to her skin. Then sunscreen sprayed on her shoulder (plus a swipe of cream sunscreen on her cheek). Then removed the stencil.

Technology to see sunscreen. We humans are pretty amazing but actually our eyes are somewhat limited. Most of us see all the colors of the rainbow but that is just a tiny portion of the light that our Sun makes. UV rays coming from the Sun are invisible to us yet we know that those rays can do us serious damage which is why we wear sunscreen. We designed Sunscreenr specifically to show you the invisible - UV light.


Since sunscreen's job is to absorb UV light before it hits your skin it looks dark when you look at it through Sunscreenr. Unprotected skin appears light. Sunscreenr is made possible by the combination of several key components: a special filter that removes all light except the part of the spectrum that sunscreen absorbs, a completely custom lens made from special materials and a carefully selected sensor that can actually respond to UV light. We combined that hardware with our proprietary image processing algorithms to deliver an image to you that shows where sunscreen is on your skin.

For the geeky. Smartphones and digital cameras are designed to only capture visible light. In fact, they purposely filter-out the UV light that Sunscreenr uses to show you sunscreen. Here’s why:

  • The image sensors in color digital cameras and smartphone cameras have a special filter (Bayer filter) that let's them "see" regular colors (red, green, blue) and that filter just about eliminates the ability of the sensor to respond to the UV spectrum. 
  • Lenses in both regular cameras and smartphone cameras are made from materials and have antireflection coatings that actually block most of the UV spectrum. 
  • The job of a camera lens is to capture and focus light. Lenses that are made to work for visible light (like in your smartphone) do not focus UV rays properly.


See Sunscreenr work. Demonstration of our prototype in action.



The Team


Founded by CEO David Cohen and Jon Meyer, who have a combined forty years of management, design, and product development experience, Voxelight’s mission is create innovative, technology-based products that use underexplored properties of light to create meaningful products for consumers. Voxelight is based in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. 


The Timeline



Thanks to Our Partners & Supporters

Ginny Meyer, Lynne Yellin, Wolfgang Wagner, David Meyer, Kayla Krest, Gayle Krest, Lauren Krest,  Zoe Cohen, Andrew Meyer, Allan Cohen, Barbara Cohen, Hunter Pendleton, Joe Root and everyone who supported our Kickstarter campaign


Risks & Challenges

Our focus over the next 6 months is to get you the Sunscreenr(s) you ordered so that you can use them to be safer in the sun.

The working prototype was built with off-the-shelf components so its capabilities are limited and its cost was pretty high. By contrast, the Sunscreenr you will receive will have a completely custom camera and optics inside of a purpose-built rugged and functional shell. In the past we have completed similar product development projects for the defense, forensic and medical markets so we have a solid understanding of the challenges. Nevertheless, delays always happen. Parts get discontinued, governments put new restrictions on shipping lithium batteries, suppliers make errors or deliver late and then demand extra fees. 
We have built the production and fulfillment schedule conservatively using data from our suppliers. We have plans in place and have vendors ready to handle manufacturing at any scale.

We will be sending frequent updates to all of our backers to keep you informed of developments and progress. Although setbacks are inevitable, we are committed to getting Sunscreenr into your hands in a timely matter. We are committed to giving you a powerful new tool to protect yourself from sun damage. In a few short months you will be the first and only people on the planet to have this technology.


FAQs

What's special about Sunscreenr™?  Can't I just use my smartphone or digital camera?

Smartphones and digital cameras are designed to only capture visible light.  They purposely filter-out the spectrum of light used by Sunscreenr to "see" sunscreen.

For those those want to know the technicalities of why:

- The image sensors in color digital cameras and smartphone cameras have a special filter (Bayer filter) that let's them "see" regular colors (red, green, blue) and that filter just about eliminates the ability of the sensor to respond to the UV spectrum.

- Lens elements in regular cameras and smartphone cameras are made from materials that have antireflection coatings that actually block most of the UV spectrum.

- Camera lenses are designed to capture and focus light.  Lenses that are made to work for visible light (like in your smartphone) do not focus UV rays properly.

Isn't Sunscreenr™ just a fancy lens?

No.  Sunscreenr is made possible by the combination of several key components: a special filter that removes all light except the part of the spectrum that sunscreen absorbs, a completely custom lens made from special materials and a carefully selected sensor that can actually respond to UV light.  That hardware is combined with our proprietary image processing algorithms to deliver an image to you that shows where sunscreen is on your skin.  Protected areas appear dark and unprotected skin appears light.

Is Sunscreenr™ waterproof?  What about dust and dirt?

Sunscreenr™ is designed to an IP rating of 67 and will be tested to MIL STD 810g-516.6.  What does all of that mean? It means that no sand or dirt, even as fine as talcum powder can get into Sunscreenr.  It also means that Sunscreenr is not just splashproof but can withstand being underwater up to 3 feet for 30 min.  Sunscreenr is designed to handle your little one dropping it in the shallow end of the pool!  The MIL STD testing means that Sunscreenr passes the same ruggedness tests as the gear soldiers take into battle.  However, like any optical device care should be taken to prevent dirt, dust, and fingers from scratching the exterior lenses.  When not in use, Sunscreenr should be stored properly.

Can I use Sunscreenr™ with my eyeglasses or sunglasses on?

Yes, although some may find that the display inside of Sunscreenr appears sharper with glasses off.  It all depends on your eyes and what kind of prescription you have.  We have worked with an optical engineer and have consulted with several optometrists to make Sunscreenr as easy to use a possible for the broadest range of people.  If you use Sunscreenr with your sunglasses on you may find that the display looks slightly dimmer.

How long will the battery last?  How is it recharged?

Sunscreenr has been designed with a rechargable battery that should last for several days with normal usage.  An auto-off feature keeps the battery fresh in case you forget to turn it off.  Sunscreenr recharges using any micro USB charger (AC or car charger is fine).

Why the viewfinder instead of a screen?

Sunscreenr's viewfinder is designed to work on the brightest days, in the brightest places -- beaches, pools, ski slopes, etc. -- to let you see the images.  A regular screen can be very hard to see in bright sunlight and often appears washed-out.  An additional benefit of the viewfinder is that it allows us to more easily make Sunscreenr rugged and waterproof.

Will Sunscreenr™ work for people of all skin tones?

Yes! The contrast between unprotected skin and protected skin is less dramatic than for people of lighter skin color.  Unprotected areas will appear lighter and areas covered with sunscreen will still appear darker.  Sunscreenr's algorithms work to make this contrast as large as possible.

What if I get sunscreen all over Sunscreenr™?

No worries!  Wipe off the excess, wash Sunscreenr with soapy water then dry it off and you're good to go.

Does Sunscreenr™ see all types of sunscreen?

Any Broad Spectrum sunscreen (cream, spray or powder) that's at least SPF 15 will be visible through Sunscreenr™.

I hear that most people don't put on enough sunscreen.  Can Sunscreenr™ show me areas where my coverage is too thin?

Yes!  Areas of thin coverage will not appear as dark as areas that are well covered.

What if there's nobody around to check out my sunscreen coverage?

No worries!  Sunscreenr has been designed to be able to record and playback a short video.  Just hit the "record" button and point Sunscreenr at yourself (you can use a selfie stick, your hand or any standard camera tripod).  It will automatically record for 30 seconds and then stop.  To see your coverage, just hit the "play" button and look into the viewfinder.
story_txt:
Sunscreenr Sees Unprotected Skin. Sunscreenr shows you where you've missed a spot when applying sunscreen AND where sunscreen has worn off your skin even after sweating, swimming, or toweling off. 
Footage shot with the Sunscreenr prototype




Can You See Who Still Needs Sunscreen?  Mom did a great job with her kids but everybody needs protection.





Sunscreenr is a special viewer that changes the way you protect yourself from sun damage. We've taken technology used by scientists and made it easy to see where your skin is covered by sunscreen and where it's not. 






As Seen On








How do you know if you're protected? There are 1 Million cases of skin cancer per year in the US alone, but sunscreen can significantly reduce your chances of getting cancer. Unfortunately, most people only apply 25% to 50% of the sunscreen they should. That's where Sunscreenr comes in.




How To Use Sunscreenr. After applying sunscreen, look through Sunscreenr to see dark areas that are covered with sunscreen. See light areas that are not covered. The light areas are more vulnerable to sunburns, sunspots and other forms of sun damage.













  



Products and Pricing






All Sunscreenrs come with a micro USB charging cord and microfiber bag. The bag is for easy carrying and protection. It can also be used to clean the Sunscreenr lenses.

Shipping fees are $6 for US shipping and $16 for international shipping for one Sunscreenr. For international shipping, please note that you are responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.





1. Review the Products & Pricing section above.   
2. Determine which product you want.
3. Look for the product in the upper right of this page under Perks.
4. Click on the product that you want.
5. Enter your payment information.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We welcome your questions!







The Story
The idea of Sunscreenr was first born a few years ago after seeing a family member struggle with skin cancer. We came up with the idea of a simple device that would let anyone "see" if they had applied sunscreen properly, even after swimming, toweling off, playing outside all day, etc.









It took almost 2 years to build the right team who could turn the idea into reality. After several prototypes, we are now launching Sunscreenr to bring the idea to you.







Stencil was applied to her skin. Then sunscreen sprayed on her shoulder (plus a swipe of cream sunscreen on her cheek). Then removed the stencil.





Technology to see sunscreen. We humans are pretty amazing but actually our eyes are somewhat limited. Most of us see all the colors of the rainbow but that is just a tiny portion of the light that our Sun makes. UV rays coming from the Sun are invisible to us yet we know that those rays can do us serious damage which is why we wear sunscreen. We designed Sunscreenr specifically to show you the invisible - UV light.





Since sunscreen's job is to absorb UV light before it hits your skin it looks dark when you look at it through Sunscreenr. Unprotected skin appears light. Sunscreenr is made possible by the combination of several key components: a special filter that removes all light except the part of the spectrum that sunscreen absorbs, a completely custom lens made from special materials and a carefully selected sensor that can actually respond to UV light. We combined that hardware with our proprietary image processing algorithms to deliver an image to you that shows where sunscreen is on your skin.   
For the geeky. Smartphones and digital cameras are designed to only capture visible light. In fact, they purposely filter-out the UV light that Sunscreenr uses to show you sunscreen. Here’s why:

The image sensors in color digital cameras and smartphone cameras have a special filter (Bayer filter) that let's them "see" regular colors (red, green, blue) and that filter just about eliminates the ability of the sensor to respond to the UV spectrum. 
Lenses in both regular cameras and smartphone cameras are made from materials and have antireflection coatings that actually block most of the UV spectrum. 
The job of a camera lens is to capture and focus light. Lenses that are made to work for visible light (like in your smartphone) do not focus UV rays properly.


See Sunscreenr work. Demonstration of our prototype in action.


The Team





Founded by CEO David Cohen and Jon Meyer, who have a combined forty years of management, design, and product development experience, Voxelight’s mission is create innovative, technology-based products that use underexplored properties of light to create meaningful products for consumers. Voxelight is based in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. 

The Timeline







Thanks to Our Partners & Supporters


Ginny Meyer, Lynne Yellin, Wolfgang Wagner, David Meyer, Kayla Krest, Gayle Krest, Lauren Krest,  Zoe Cohen, Andrew Meyer, Allan Cohen, Barbara Cohen, Hunter Pendleton, Joe Root and everyone who supported our Kickstarter campaign

Risks & Challenges












Our focus over the next 6 months is to get you the Sunscreenr(s) you ordered so that you can use them to be safer in the sun.The working prototype was built with off-the-shelf components so its capabilities are limited and its cost was pretty high. By contrast, the Sunscreenr you will receive will have a completely custom camera and optics inside of a purpose-built rugged and functional shell. In the past we have completed similar product development projects for the defense, forensic and medical markets so we have a solid understanding of the challenges. Nevertheless, delays always happen. Parts get discontinued, governments put new restrictions on shipping lithium batteries, suppliers make errors or deliver late and then demand extra fees. We have built the production and fulfillment schedule conservatively using data from our suppliers. We have plans in place and have vendors ready to handle manufacturing at any scale.We will be sending frequent updates to all of our backers to keep you informed of developments and progress. Although setbacks are inevitable, we are committed to getting Sunscreenr into your hands in a timely matter. We are committed to giving you a powerful new tool to protect yourself from sun damage. In a few short months you will be the first and only people on the planet to have this technology.FAQsWhat's special about Sunscreenr™?  Can't I just use my smartphone or digital
camera?
Smartphones and digital cameras are designed to only capture
visible light.  They purposely filter-out
the spectrum of light used by Sunscreenr to "see" sunscreen.
For those those want to know the technicalities of why:
- The image sensors in color digital cameras and smartphone
cameras have a special filter (Bayer filter) that let's them "see"
regular colors (red, green, blue) and that filter just about eliminates the
ability of the sensor to respond to the UV spectrum.
- Lens elements in regular cameras and smartphone cameras
are made from materials that have antireflection coatings that actually block
most of the UV spectrum.
- Camera lenses are designed to capture and focus
light.  Lenses that are made to work for
visible light (like in your smartphone) do not focus UV rays properly.
Isn't Sunscreenr™ just a fancy lens?
No.  Sunscreenr is
made possible by the combination of several key components: a special filter
that removes all light except the part of the spectrum that sunscreen absorbs,
a completely custom lens made from special materials and a carefully selected
sensor that can actually respond to UV light. 
That hardware is combined with our proprietary image processing
algorithms to deliver an image to you that shows where sunscreen is on your
skin.  Protected areas appear dark and
unprotected skin appears light.
Is Sunscreenr™ waterproof? 
What about dust and dirt?
Sunscreenr™ is designed to an IP rating of 67 and will be
tested to MIL STD 810g-516.6.  What does
all of that mean? It means that no sand or dirt, even as fine as talcum powder
can get into Sunscreenr.  It also means
that Sunscreenr is not just splashproof but can withstand being underwater up
to 3 feet for 30 min.  Sunscreenr is
designed to handle your little one dropping it in the shallow end of the
pool!  The MIL STD testing means that
Sunscreenr passes the same ruggedness tests as the gear soldiers take into
battle.  However, like any optical device
care should be taken to prevent dirt, dust, and fingers from scratching the
exterior lenses.  When not in use,
Sunscreenr should be stored properly.
Can I use Sunscreenr™ with my eyeglasses or sunglasses on?
Yes, although some may find that the display inside of
Sunscreenr appears sharper with glasses off. 
It all depends on your eyes and what kind of prescription you have.  We have worked with an optical engineer and
have consulted with several optometrists to make Sunscreenr as easy to use a
possible for the broadest range of people. 
If you use Sunscreenr with your sunglasses on you may find that the
display looks slightly dimmer.
How long will the battery last?  How is it recharged?
Sunscreenr has been designed with a rechargable battery that
should last for several days with normal usage. 
An auto-off feature keeps the battery fresh in case you forget to turn
it off.  Sunscreenr recharges using any
micro USB charger (AC or car charger is fine).
Why the viewfinder instead of a screen?
Sunscreenr's viewfinder is designed to work on the brightest
days, in the brightest places -- beaches, pools, ski slopes, etc. -- to let you
see the images.  A regular screen can be
very hard to see in bright sunlight and often appears washed-out.  An additional benefit of the viewfinder is
that it allows us to more easily make Sunscreenr rugged and waterproof.
Will Sunscreenr™ work for people of all skin tones?
Yes! The contrast between unprotected skin and protected
skin is less dramatic than for people of lighter skin color.  Unprotected areas will appear lighter and
areas covered with sunscreen will still appear darker.  Sunscreenr's algorithms work to make this
contrast as large as possible.
What if I get sunscreen all over Sunscreenr™?
No worries!  Wipe off
the excess, wash Sunscreenr with soapy water then dry it off and you're good to
go.
Does Sunscreenr™ see all types of sunscreen?
Any Broad Spectrum sunscreen (cream, spray or powder) that's
at least SPF 15 will be visible through Sunscreenr™.
I hear that most people don't put on enough sunscreen.  Can Sunscreenr™ show me areas where my
coverage is too thin?
Yes!  Areas of thin
coverage will not appear as dark as areas that are well covered.
What if there's nobody around to check out my sunscreen
coverage?
No worries! 
Sunscreenr has been designed to be able to record and playback a short
video.  Just hit the "record"
button and point Sunscreenr at yourself (you can use a selfie stick, your hand
or any standard camera tripod).  It will
automatically record for 30 seconds and then stop.  To see your coverage, just hit the
"play" button and look into the viewfinder.

story:
Daily Bread, Inc

  •  By contributing any amount of money, you will be paying for the development of leavened AND gluten-free and yeast-free baking recipes, arranging baking supplies, investing n the machinery necessary to bake the gluten and yeast-free bread, and the assisting with the marketing supplies and advertising campaign to expand the reach of the Daily Bread's audience beyond the United States.

What Daily Bread Needs & What Contributors Get!

  • The machinery would cost $2,500.
  • Contributors of $20 or more can receive T-shirts advertising Daily Bread. Contributors of $50 or more can receive coffee cups displaying the Daily Bread logo.
  • If the funding goal is not reached, the funds shall be returned to each contributor.

Why Your Contribution Matters to Us!

  • Harvard Medical studies show that diets of gluten and yeast correlate with weight gain, weight retention and high-blood pressure. Many people can be classified as gluten-intolerant or yeast-intolerant and as science progresses, diets will tend to become healthier favoring breads of the world made free of gluten (rye, barley, wheat and barley) and yeast bacteria.

    Common Pitfalls in the Health Bread Industry

    • Researching strategies for developing tasty gluten-free, yeast-free breads will require a study of nutrition and consultation of experts in the gluten free bread industry.
    • I will personally meet and interview experts in the nutrition field for their advice on how to overcome the difficulty in producing a bread product that is cheap to make, buy and taste like the glutinous, yeast-containing counterpart.

    Other Ways You Can Help!

    • Please spread the word about Daily Bread! One day it will enter mid-to upscale grocery stores with your help!
    • Always remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
    Thank you very much for reading this campaign pitch! 

    Thank you,

    Jon
    Owner of Daily Bread, Inc.

story:
My mother is my rock, she always has been . As long as i can remember she has always put others a head of her own needs. Growing up she worked three jobs went to school full-time , raised 3 boys and dealt with an abusive alcoholic husband. She was able to finally find happiness when she married her current husband who is a wonderful guy that completes her. She hasn't really had time to enjoy her new marriage because of her medical conditions. my mother has had 3 ( as of yesterday) Heart attacks, this one about killing her. If that wasn't enough she has a bad case of diabetes which has led to neuropathy in her hands and feet. This leaves her in constant agonizing pain which breaks my heart. She is an extremely proud woman she would never ask for help but I feel that it is time for this amazing person to get the help that she has never received. Thank you so much for taking the time to read.


 *****PLEASE HELP US TO MEET AND SURPASS OUR GOAL******

story:
Halp plz!


Brizzlepuffs Quidditch Club have recently qualified for the European Quidditch Championships in Italy this April! We’d appreciate any help you can give us to get there! The more you donate, the more we promise to entertain you all! Thank you so much for all of your support so far, please help us get to Italy this April and be reunited with Johannes! All money donated will look at subsidizing players for transport to and from the tournament!

Milestones

£50 Egg and Pie Senior – To get things kicked off, Sam Senior has kindly volunteered to get a little bit messy. We will egg and pie Sam Senior and video it for your entertainment!

£ 100 Ower Cooks/Come Dine with me – Brizzlepuffs Captain Tom Ower has really made the most of his time spent at university in his journey to independence. His extensive cooking portfolio boasts slightly burnt cheese on toast, undercooked pancakes and luke warm rice pudding fresh from the tin. If we reach this milestone, we will force him to cook a very complex dish (e.g. Ratatouille) without any instructions/or help and film the entire thing for the crowds to enjoy!

£ 200 Brizzlepuffs Film a Lets Play – Some of our members hate scary things. We will film some of our scaredy cats play a scary game and post it EVERYWHERE.

£300 All the Puffs walk through Maccy D’s on a broomstick – Forget about Nandos for just a second (hard I know!) but the majority of Brizzlepuff meetings take place at Maccy D’s, where adequate banter can be had. If we reach this milestone, the entire team will go through the local McDonalds drive thru on broomsticks donning their Brizzlepuff kits and filmed for your entertainment!

£400 Wax Ower – Those who know Ower a little too well will also know that he’s one furry thing. His hair for starters looks like Sonic the Hedgehog meets Marge Simpson. If we reach this milestone we will wax Ower, and depending how nice we feel, perhaps with his favouritest thing in the world – duct tape. This of course will be filmed for your entertainment!

£500 Alistair will roast a target – On the outside, our Goldilocks beater Alistair Goodwin is a cool and collective guy. On the inside, Alistair is a man of deep thoughts and a lot of built up anger just waiting to boil out. Should we reach this milestone, we will let Alistair loose and let him completely roast a pre-decided team, a video will be uploaded for you to enjoy his sweet, soothing words.

£750 Film a parkour video with brooms – The Brizzlepuffs are known by some for their mad tekkers and sick skillz. Should we reach this milestone, a doss video shall magically appear of the Puffs taking on parkour on their broomsticks and challenging the dizzy heights of Bristol.

£1,000 Ower’s broom cupboard challenge – Fun fact about Puff HQ – before we moved in, we had two bathrooms. Now, one of those bathrooms is completely taken up to the brim with various bits of Quidditch equipment and Bluehawk supplies. In order to see it from Harry Potters shoes, Ower will see how long he can endure the tiny broom cupboard under the stairs and live in there until he cracks. This super edgy experience is bound to change him, and will be documented for you through video format!

£1,500 Shave Dom’s head – Dom Ayres rise through the Quidditch World is off the back of one thing, and one thing only. His uncanny resemblance to the legend David Goswell! Should we hit this milestone, Dom’s luscious locks that he has grown from the age of 3 will be shaved off, with all hair being donated to Heynes.

£2,000 Hot sauce/Vindaloo Puffs – At this milestone, you’ll get to see a video of some of our members ‘who are weaker to spice’ eating a Vindaloo from our favorite curry house! Tears will be had!

£2,000 King and Stevens tattoo each other - If we reach this glorious milestone, Jordan King and Luke Stevens will embark on the endeavor of life in second year inspired by the dirt and grime of Bristol, they will tattoo each other and film the results.

£5,000 Senior streaks at EQC final – Our resident ginger will go full out and streak at the EQC final! Senior will bare all! *terms and conditions apply*

£50,000 Liquidate the Club – Should we hit this figure, the Brizzlepuffs will literally shut up and take your money and liquidate the club immediately. *Note* you may never see us again – MAJOR SELLING POINT!

£1,000,000,000 Build the Deathstar out of duct tape and paper clips – As master architects, the Brizzlepuffs will create the Deathstar out of the only tools available to them. Paper clips and duct tape.

story:
During the juicing and blending process, fruits and vegetables oxidize, lose nutrients and go bad. We discovered a way to slow down this process to enjoy your juices and smoothies on your time. 


The SANS bottle is a reusable, 16 oz., glass travel bottle. The SANS lid includes an innovative vacuum pump mechanism designed to preserve the life of smoothies and juices. The vacuum pump mechanism acts as a preserver by removing the air from the bottle and maintaining a tight seal. This simple process helps keep your juices and smoothies fresher, longer.  



Simply pour your juice, smoothie or beverage of choice (even red wine!) into the glass bottle and attach the lid.

Twist to unlock, which simultaneously releases the pump. Using the palm of your hand, pump the preserver cap up and down to remove the air. The preserver will become more difficult to pump once you have achieved preservation and removed all the air.

Once complete, push the preserver cap down and twist 90 degrees to lock. Your beverage is now preserved and sealed. Take your beverage whenever or wherever you go. The silicone wrap makes the bottle easy to grip and keeps the bottle insulated, longer.

 








We developed the SANS Flip Top Lid for those who prefer to drink their favorite juice or smoothie through a straw. The Flip Top Lid is not just for juices and smoothies, you can also turn your SANS bottle into a water bottle. Great portable option for travel, hiking or the gym.

The protector case is interchangeable and can be used for your SANS lid or Flip Top lid. If you don't have time to clean your lid, use the protector case on the go.





We are a group of young designers and entrepreneurs based in New York and Taipei who are passionate about juicing, health, fitness and design. After experiencing our own frustrations from the lack of preservation options for juice and smoothie-making, we decided to do something about it. We have been working on this project for over a year to design, create and test to ensure this product is perfect to preserve juice and smoothies. Now, we are finally ready to share our patent pending design with the world. Because of expensive tooling, production and shipping costs, we need your help to make our dream project a reality!

Spencer and Tracy 

SANS Design Team


follow us at

Facebook   Instagram   Twitter


Risks and challenges

In order to lower the risk of production delays we have decided to move into the tooling phase. We anticipate receiving preproduction samples end of February to test the product and ensure it functions properly. We have been working hand in hand with our engineers and manufacturer throughout the product development lifecycle and will continue to monitor the progress into the final production and testing stage. We have a production schedule in place and anticipate shipping the goods from our U.S. warehouse in July. We are excited to share SANS with you and sincerly thank you for your support!

story:
Meet Ooly

Ooly is the first app-connected sleep companion that helps your child understand when it’s time to get up or go to bed. For more information or to buy Ooly, visit www.ooly123.com

  • Compatible with iOS (Apple) and Android phones or tablets. 
  • For children aged 2 to 8. 

 

Ooly Uses Colors to Represent Time

 

“Children need a time landmark that doesn’t harm the quality of their sleep; Ooly is really well adapted to help them understand when it’s time to start the day. This kind of time landmark does miracles in the families: children wake up rested and parents are happy.” – Brigitte Langevin, Sleep Education Specialist, Founder of De bonnes habitudes de sommeil, Ça s’apprend!

 

Associate a color of light with each event you create (nap, night, ok to get up, etc.).

 

Featured On:

 

       

 

                     

 

What Parents Think

 

What Child Sleep Experts Think

See Kim West's special perk to get Ooly AND her Gentle Sleep Solutions course at 25% off!

See Emma Pollard's special perk and get a chance to win a consultation with The Goodnight Nurse, worth 257 USD!

See Heidi Holvoet's personal perk and get one of her baby sleep books for free! 

 

Design Based on Science

 

You fully control the light's intensity.

 

     

       

The world is starting to take notice of the negative impact of blue light on sleep.

 

Why Ooly?

 

 

 

Use Cases

 

How does Ooly Work?

 

Ooly's Intuitive App

 

What's in the Box?

 

 

Package includes: Ooly, USB cable, and wall-plug USB charger.

 

Ooly, a Joy to Use

 

 

Team Ooly - You're in Good Hands

Ooly’s original idea comes from Marie-Eve and Martin, two parents from Quebec, Canada, who once dreamed of a solution so everyone in the family could sleep soundly at naptime and through the night, completely uninterrupted… and who are now getting ready to share their solution with parents around the world!

 

Our partners

And because we don't know everything, we brought on board a team of passionate individuals with backgrounds in consumer mechanical product design, electronic design, manufacturing, quality controls, business development and marketing.

 

“We contributed to Ooly by preparing the 3D CAD design for mass production using safe and reliable fabrication techniques. Your child will love the soft feel, snugly shape, and warm glow of Ooly.” - George Cook, Owner of 123Designs.

“The Ooly123 project is not a first in its class. Everything is in place to start production and deliver a quality product.” - Jean-François Binette, President of JECA Technology.

 

 

 

Why crowdfunding?

Manufacturing costs for the first production of a high-tech product like Ooly are very high, and the best way for us to absorb them is to make an initial production run of at least a thousand units. Crowdfunding allows us to do this. Crowdfunding also helps us keep the costs down as we can work together with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without having to deal with high storage costs and other related costs. This allows us, today, to offer you a high quality product for the lowest price possible.

 

Timeline

 

Buy Ooly

 

Got to Ooly website.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Q: Does it work? I'm far from certain that my kids will stay in bed just because an owl lights up a certain color.

A: Why drive a nail with your fist when it is so much easier to use a hammer ? Bedtime power struggles, nighttime awakenings, early morning wake-ups... parents waste a ton of energy trying to impose discipline simply because they lack the proper tool to do so.  We want you to be equipped with the best tool and we are confident in Ooly’s effectiveness for three main reasons:

1- Our prototype has been tested by local families  – here’s what one of them had to say: "I was skeptical that this sleepy little owl could help with my mornings. But then the very first day my three-year-old son came in at eight instead of his usual seven. He proudly told me, ‘Ooly is green and that means time to get up!’ He loves that Ooly turns into his favorite color and I love the extra sleep. I even recommended it to my colleague to use with her little girl." – Edith Martin, PH.D., Researcher, Topmed.ca.

2- Ooly is based on the scientific research of light and its impact on sleep carried out by NASA, Harvard Medical School, and National Institutes of Health. It is now proven that blue light inhibits the production of melatonin, delaying and disrupting sleep. Ooly is therefore equipped with a “blue blocker” mode.

3- Ooly has been designed together with five of the world’s top children sleep experts. 

 

Q: What makes Ooly different from the other products out there?

A: Three main aspects:

1- It is configured with an app (compatible with iOS/Apple and Android phones or tablets). Parents can effortlessly select Ooly’s color & intensity to create bedtime, morning, and naptime routines adapted to their child’s needs. They simply need to use the Ooly app to set and record the color they want for various times.

2- Ooly’s design is based on the scientific research of light and its impact on sleep. It is now proven that blue light inhibits the production of melatonin, delaying and disrupting sleep. Ooly is therefore equipped with a “Blue Blocker” mode. Ooly’s light intensity can also be reduced down to the slightest glow, preventing any disturbances to your child's sleep.

3- It is portable and battery operated, with a battery sufficient for seven days’ operation without electricity. There is also an embedded memory to ensure settings are never lost. This means Ooly follows your child wherever they go (a week at grandma’s, camping over the weekend, on the plane, etc.). Also, there’s no need to have your mobile device around because once set up, Ooly remembers its settings forever.

 

Q: I see that delivery will be in May 2017. This is quite far away, why is that?

A: The money raised during the crowdfunding campaign will be used to manufacture the first 1000 units of Ooly. This means that over the next months, our team will be busy performing the contract manufacturing setup, procurements of all the parts, self-tests validation, tooling, certifications, testing & quality insurance, etc. All in all, this process will require six months to complete, which means we will be ready to ship units by May 2017.

 

Q: How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

A: We are ready to start production as soon as the funds from our crowdfunding campaign are secured. JECA, our manufacturing partner, has over thirty years experience dealing directly with sourcing companies, factories and shipping companies. Because of our close relationships with our manufacturing partners and the extensive testing that has already been performed, we are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Everything has been studied in details. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to over-deliver on the expectations of our backers.

 

Q: Is the electromagnetic field (EMF) generated by Ooly safe?

A: Yes, we had that very same concern when we designed Ooly. We know Wi-Fi signals are quite strong and did not want these anywhere near our kids. For this reason, Ooly uses a technology well known for its low power emissions called "Bluetooth Low Energy" (or BLE).  BLE is used in many healthcare applications. Additionally, note that Ooly only uses its radio for the setup process with the Ooly app. Once done, Ooly operates by itself.

 

Q: Is Ooly BPA free?

A: Absolutely.

 

Q: Do I need to order a particular Ooly if I am using an iOS or Android phone/tablet?

A: No, Ooly works the same with both. Ooly’s mobile application will be available for download from both the Apple App Store or Google Play.

 

Q: Can I control more than one Ooly with the same iOS or Android phone/tablet?

A: Yes. Ooly’s mobile application can configure them one after the other. They can then operate by themselves with their respective schedules and settings. 

 

Q: Does Ooly necessarily require a mobile phone connection to turn its light on/off?

A: No, a mobile phone or tablet connection is only required to configure Ooly’s schedule and settings. Once done, the connection is no longer required and Ooly works by itself. It will control its light according to the time of the day, its schedule, and the settings downloaded and stored in its memory.

 

Q: Can you turn off Ooly’s light completely and have it 100% dark?

A: Absolutely, parents can choose to have the light turned completely off during the night, and until the morning wake up. Ooly will do whatever you tell it to do. For example, the light could be switched off during the night, then it could switch on, let's say at 7:00 a.m. The same way, it could be switched on during the evening, then start fading down 5 minutes before bedtime; then it would switch off.

 

Q: What if I want to turn off Ooly’s light even if it is on for that period?

A: You can always turn it off from Ooly’s app. Also, if the “Cancel Mode” was enabled for that particular period, you can turn the light off with a long press on Ooly’s head.

 

Q: Can the child change Ooly’s parameters playing with press buttons?

A: Ooly is 100% controlled by Ooly’s mobile application. We did this because one of the biggest pain out there is kid messing up settings by pressing buttons. In addition, if the parent disable the "Lantern" mode, the hidden button on Ooly’s head will not work.

 

Q: Why doesn't Ooly's price compare with that of most other options?

A: Ooly’s pricing is a perfect reflection of our design decisions and what we want Ooly to be known for in the market: a high-quality and elegant device in a sea of cheaper, mass-manufactured products. We want Ooly to be known for its sturdiness, effectiveness, and optimal user experience. Just as an example, we could have optimized the design for low cost by having a very small battery, but we went all-out with one of the biggest eco-friendly batteries we found on the market (this allows Ooly to last for 7 days rather than less than 24 hours!). We also spent countless hours optimizing the application to ensure Ooly’s setup is a breeze (our goal is for parents to set it up in under 3 minutes, without having to read any user manual). Those are just two quick examples; the list goes on and on...

In a sense, supporting our campaign goes beyond Ooly. It is a statement to an industry that has been neglecting quality in favor of low costs for decades. We believe that the time has come for a change, and we also believe the market is ready for it. We believe you deserve better.

Compatible with iOS (Apple) and Android phones or tablets. 
For children aged 2 to 8. 
 Ooly Uses Colors to Represent Time “Children need a time landmark that doesn’t harm the quality of their sleep; Ooly is really well adapted to help them understand when it’s time to start the day. This kind of time landmark does miracles in the families: children wake up rested and parents are happy.” – Brigitte Langevin, Sleep Education Specialist, Founder of De bonnes habitudes de sommeil, Ça s’apprend! Associate a color of light with each event you create (nap, night, ok to get up, etc.). Featured On:                                What Parents Think What Child Sleep Experts ThinkSee Kim West's special perk to get Ooly AND her Gentle Sleep Solutions course at 25% off!See Emma Pollard's special perk and get a chance to win a consultation with The Goodnight Nurse, worth 257 USD!See Heidi Holvoet's personal perk and get one of her baby sleep books for free!  Design Based on Science You fully control the light's intensity.               The world is starting to take notice of the negative impact of blue light on sleep. Why Ooly?   Use Cases How does Ooly Work? Ooly's Intuitive App
 What's in the Box?  Package includes: Ooly, USB cable, and wall-plug USB charger. Ooly, a Joy to Use  Team Ooly - You're in Good HandsOoly’s original idea comes from Marie-Eve and Martin, two parents from Quebec, Canada, who once dreamed of a solution so everyone in the family could sleep soundly at naptime and through the night, completely uninterrupted… and who are now getting ready to share their solution with parents around the world! Our partnersAnd because we don't know everything, we brought on board a team of passionate individuals with backgrounds in consumer mechanical product design, electronic design, manufacturing, quality controls, business development and marketing. “We contributed to Ooly by preparing the 3D CAD design for mass production using safe and reliable fabrication techniques. story:
Lifestyle Intervention with Natural Remedies Project:


My name is Dr. Ervin Davis. I am a Lifestyle Intervention Specialist that use reliable science-based Natural Remedies Therapies to prevent and reverse lifestyle induced disease before a higher level of acute care is needed. My background training has been in health education, medical research, and lifestyle intervention.

My passion is providing health education, disease prevention, lifestyle improvement strategies that are cost effective and available worldwide. If this approach is not used, billions of dollars are spent annually without seeing any appreciable benefits in health. Here is the global solution!


Disease Prevention:

“Prevention is better than Cure”. Worldwide many people die of lifestyle induced diseases that are wholly preventable (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, cardiovascular diseases, obesity, etc.). This situation is worst in second and third world countries where prevention education and/or medical care are limited or non-existent. A fundamental, simple and vital strategy has emerged for a better quality of life and a brighter future of healthcare!

Healthy Lifestyle Choices Global Institute, (HLCGI) will establish Health Education and Lifestyle Centers in three locations in Africa, Cape Verde, Malawi, and Zambia. The Health Education and Lifestyle Center model is unique in that it places an emphasis on the prevention of lifestyle induced diseases using natural remedies through a practical educational approach that demonstrates the principle, “Prevention is better than Cure”.  Our health teams’ effort is not simply to cure the immediate malady, but to instruct the individual/community in the basic principles of wellness and prevention and generate an enthusiasm to carry out these principles in future living. The spiritual dimension is designed to furnish the individual/community an incentive to live in harmony with health and physical laws, and find release from the tensions of life now and eternally. Our practical grassroots approach provides a framework that is essential before other resources are dispersed that provide limited benefits. I have spent time at the three locations mentioned and am aware of the fundamental needs and how simple the problem is to address.Below is what we need! 


One-Day Health Education and Lifestyle Center

We need $107,000! This amount will cover the cost to establish three Health Education and Lifestyle Center in the aforementioned locations. This includes assistance for the medical missionaries that provide the essential health education, disease prevention, lifestyle improvement training for each location.

The One-Day Health Education and Lifestyle Center building meets this challenge. These galvanized steel structures will be shipped to each location and assembled on site.They are specially designed and engineered to maximize ventilation and coated with an earth-tone paint to reflect heat.Workers can construct the building in a single day and ready to start training the next.


Lifestyle Intervention Training/Network

Health education and lifestyle intervention training for each site is accomplished by the HLCGI teams for a one/two year period of time. At the end of one year, local educators will continue to provide lifestyle intervention training for that location. HLCGI will continue its involvement as a permanent board member. Each site becomes an affiliated member of a continental/world network of affiliated Healthy Education and Lifestyle Center.


What Do You  Receive:

As a sponsor/contributor here’s what you receive: 

(1) A book entitled “Vaccine Alternatives”: How to Prevent and Treat Illness Using Natural Remedies, An Essential Guide for Patients, Parents, Travelers, and Healthcare Workers

(2) An International Mission Trip Experience for students and non-students in all disciplines and majors is made available.

(3) International Internships are available for students (6-10 academic hours) in College/University, Graduate/Professional Schools when possible.

(4) The satisfaction of knowing that your sponsorship/contribution is cost effective and makes a significant long-term impact in the lives of many.

(5) Sponsors/contributors will receive annual reports and may travel to your favorite sites.


The Impact

Over the past twenty years we have seen the benefits of lifestyle intervention training. This prevention first approach has had an impact upon the lives of many and upon healthcare cost globally and demonstrate a needed shift in health emphasis.
