story:
Video password = konjac

Summary

Hello and welcome to my Indiegogo campaign!  My name is Erica Berman and I live in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.  I have a master’s degree in counselling psychology and a PhD in exercise sciences.  By day I am a counsellor and therapist, supporting people through miscarriage, infertility, trauma, anxiety, and depression.  I am also a certified personal trainer and fitness instructor with a lifelong passion for nutrition and fitness.

I have been cooking and baking since I was 5 years old. I love finding ways to create recipes that are both healthy and delicious and can be enjoyed by myself and my family.  A few years ago I discovered shirataki noodles, a carbohydrate- and calorie-free noodle made from the konjac plant. I started learning about this plant and was amazed by the evidence supporting its many health benefits. 


It has been used in Traditional Chinese Medicine for centuries and has been proven to:

  • Help reduce cholesterol, control blood sugar, and lower the risk of diabetes. 

  • Function as a prebiotic that contributes to gut health and helps regulate bowel function. 

  • Act as a powerful soluble fibre that can absorb 10 times its weight in water, which means it is also very effective at creating a sensation of fullness and controlling appetite.  Research studies have shown that konjac can be very useful for weight-loss. 

  • Be a versatile cooking ingredient. Due to its unique chemical properties, konjac has many varied culinary uses and can be used to create a wide array of mouth-watering, healthy foods. 

For the last 4 years, I have been experimenting in my kitchen and developing all sorts of delicious, low calorie recipes for myself and my family.  Now I want to share all my knowledge with you!

How does low-carb, low calorie, Chicken Pad Thai sound, that tastes better than take-out and contains a fraction of the fat, carbs and calories? Konjac powder creates a silky smooth sauce that perfectly adheres to the noodles.

Or how about Vegan Sausage Patties made from lentils and mushrooms, free of any flour or grains?

You won't believe these Fudge-Topped Peanut Butter Crispy Rice Squares, free of marshmallows or an liquid sweeteners because konjac flour helps hold them together!

Although shirataki noodles are now widely available in North America, the flour of the konjac plant (konjac powder) is not, nor is there much awareness of its benefits, even among doctors, dieticians and health experts.  My goal with this campaign is to build a website that will foster an online community dedicated to increasing awareness of konjac, and its availability across the continent.  I also want to share the recipes I have developed that will have you eating delicious foods to your heart’s and stomach’s content while keeping you lean and healthy.

What I Need & What You Get

I need $10,000 to create this online community.  The money will support the construction and maintenance of the website, which will have commerce capabilities so you can purchase your own konjac powder I have sourced for you.  This site will also have all the information you need, including links to the original scientific data on all of konjac’s amazing health benefits, so you can see the evidence for yourself.  Some of my favorite recipes using konjac will be published on the website so once you get your hands on this super food, you will know the best ways to use it.  Eventually, several downloadable cookbooks will also be available on the site for purchase.

How the Funds Will Be used

45% - Building website with full e-commerce capabilities, searchable recipe index and e-cookbooks to download.

25% - Shipping/Co-Packing of Konjac for Life konjac Powder and shipping it out to you.

20% - Giving you a taste of all the benefits of konjac powder and my expertise.

10% - Marketing of Konjac for Life brand and spreading awareness of this amazing food and its culinary uses.

Every tiny contribution makes a difference, but if you contribute $25 or more, you will get a free recipe book sent to you with my top picks.  If you contribute $500 or more, you will get a box of 10 bags of konjac powder, enough to last you more than a year!

If I do not reach the goal, the funds raised will still go toward building the website; however, the cookbooks and any other additional features will be added later after we have begun to build awareness of our product and brand. I will also have to pass along shipping costs of the powder to customers until the business gets to the point where I can absorb this cost. I want to make konjac powder as accessible to you as possible!

The Impact

Along with the other ways I support my clients as a therapist, I also help many of them with their weight-loss efforts.  Losing weight is a difficult challenge and it can be near impossible if the lifestyle changes you have to make leave you feeling hungry and deprived. Konjac is a powerful appetite suppressant and the recipes I have developed with it are delicious and satisfying.  Even my friends and family are amazed by all the ways konjac can be used in cooking and baking to create fabulous foods.  I feed konjac powder to myself and my family, including my two young daughters, because I so passionately believe in its value for our health.  I am confident that konjac powder can make a significant impact on the health and quality of life of many North Americans.

Risks & Challenges

I speculate that the greatest obstacle involved in this campaign is a total lack of awareness of the konjac plant in North America, as well as the flood of so-called super foods to hit our market in recent years.  Unlike things like the goji berry, or the acai berry, which are – in my opinion – simply more expensive alternatives to something like a blueberry, which on its own provides incredible nutritional value, konjac is like no other plant on earth.  It provides both health benefits and culinary utility that are matched by no other food.

Other Ways to Help

If you cannot contribute even a small amount, don’t worry, I get it!  I am a working mom, which is why I need crowd-funding to help me build this dream.  But there are other important ways you can help, like simply spreading the word about this campaign.  Blast it out on social media and tell everyone you know and we will be eternally grateful.  And don’t forget to use all of Indiegogo’s awesome share tools!


References

Al‐Ghazzewi, F.H., Khanna, S., Tester, R.F., & Piggott, J. (2007). The potential use of hydrolysed konjac glucomannan as a prebiotic. Journal of the Science of Food and Agriculture, 87, (9), 1758-1766.

Chua, M., Baldwin, T.C., Hocking, T.J., & Chan, K. (2010).  Traditional uses and potential health benfits of amorphophallus konjac. Journal of Ethnopharmacology, 128, 268-278.

Elamir, A.A., Tester, R.F., Al-Ghazzewi, F.H., Kaal, H.Y., Ghalbon, A.A., Elmegrahai, N.A., & Piggott, J.R. (2008). Effects of konjac glucommanan hydrolysates on the gut microflora of mice, Nutrition and Food Science, 38, 422-429.

McCarty, M.F. (2002). Glucomannan minimizes the postprandial insulin surge: a potential adjuvant for hepatothermic therapy.  Medical Hypotheses, 58, 487-490.

Surina, B., Muschina, T., Kanamotob, T., Nakashimab, H., & Yoshidaa, H.  (2013). Sulfation and biological activities of konjac glucomannan. Carbohydrate Polymers, 94, 899-903.

Suwannaporn, P. et al. (2013). Tolerance and nutritional therapy of dietary fibre from konjac glucomannan hydrolysates for patients with inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Bioactive Carbohydrates and Dietary Fibre, 2 (2), 93-98.

Tester, R.F., & Al-Ghazzewi, F.H. (2013). Mannans and health, with a special focus on glucomannans. Food Research International, 50, 384-391.
story_txt:
Video password = konjac
Summary
Hello and welcome to my Indiegogo campaign!  My name is Erica Berman and I live in
Toronto, Ontario, Canada.  I have a master’s
degree in counselling psychology and a PhD in exercise sciences.  By day I am a counsellor and therapist,
supporting people through miscarriage, infertility, trauma, anxiety, and
depression.  I am also a certified
personal trainer and fitness instructor with a lifelong passion for nutrition
and fitness. 
I have been cooking and baking since I was 5 years old. I
love finding ways to create recipes that are both healthy and delicious and can
be enjoyed by myself and my family.  A
few years ago I discovered shirataki noodles, a carbohydrate- and calorie-free
noodle made from the konjac plant. I started learning about this plant and was
amazed by the evidence supporting its many health benefits.  



It has been used in Traditional Chinese Medicine
for centuries and has been proven to:

Help reduce cholesterol, control blood sugar,
and lower the risk of diabetes.  
Function as a prebiotic that contributes to
gut health and helps regulate bowel function. 

Act as a powerful soluble fibre that can absorb
10 times its weight in water, which means it is also very effective at creating
a sensation of fullness and controlling appetite.  Research studies have shown that konjac can
be very useful for weight-loss.  
Be a versatile cooking ingredient. Due to its
unique chemical properties, konjac has many varied culinary uses and can be
used to create a wide array of mouth-watering, healthy foods.  

For the last 4 years, I have been experimenting in my
kitchen and developing all sorts of delicious, low calorie recipes for myself
and my family.  Now I want to share all
my knowledge with you!
How does low-carb, low calorie, Chicken Pad Thai sound, that tastes better than take-out and contains a fraction of the fat, carbs and calories? Konjac powder creates a silky smooth sauce that perfectly adheres to the noodles.


Or how about Vegan Sausage Patties made from lentils and mushrooms, free of any flour or grains?


You won't believe these Fudge-Topped Peanut Butter Crispy Rice Squares, free of marshmallows or an liquid sweeteners because konjac flour helps hold them together!


Although shirataki noodles are now widely available in North
America, the flour of the konjac plant (konjac powder) is not, nor is there
much awareness of its benefits, even among doctors, dieticians and health
experts.  My goal with this campaign is
to build a website that will foster an online community dedicated to increasing
awareness of konjac, and its availability across the continent.  I also want to share the recipes I have
developed that will have you eating delicious foods to your heart’s and
stomach’s content while keeping you lean and healthy.
What I Need &
What You Get
I need $10,000 to create this online community.  The money will support the construction and
maintenance of the website, which will have commerce capabilities so you can
purchase your own konjac powder I have sourced for you.  This site will also have all the information
you need, including links to the original scientific data on all of konjac’s
amazing health benefits, so you can see the evidence for yourself.  Some of my favorite recipes using konjac will
be published on the website so once you get your hands on this super food, you will
know the best ways to use it. 
Eventually, several downloadable cookbooks will also be available on the
site for purchase.


How the Funds Will Be
used




45% - Building website with full e-commerce capabilities,
searchable recipe index and e-cookbooks to download.
25% - Shipping/Co-Packing of Konjac for Life konjac Powder and shipping it out to you.
20% - Giving you a taste of all the benefits of konjac
powder and my expertise.
10% - Marketing of Konjac for Life brand and spreading
awareness of this amazing food and its culinary uses.
Every tiny contribution makes a difference, but if you
contribute $25 or more, you will get a free recipe book sent to you with my top
picks.  If you contribute $500 or more,
you will get a box of 10 bags of konjac powder, enough to last you more than a
year!
If I do not reach the goal, the funds raised will still go
toward building the website; however, the cookbooks and any other additional
features will be added later after we have begun to build awareness of our
product and brand. I will also have to pass along shipping costs of the powder to customers until the business gets to the point where I can absorb this cost. I want to make konjac powder as accessible to you as possible!
The Impact
Along with the other ways I support my clients as a
therapist, I also help many of them with their weight-loss efforts.  Losing weight is a difficult challenge and it
can be near impossible if the lifestyle changes you have to make leave you
feeling hungry and deprived. Konjac is a powerful appetite suppressant and the
recipes I have developed with it are delicious and satisfying.  Even my friends and family are amazed by all
the ways konjac can be used in cooking and baking to create fabulous
foods.  I feed konjac powder to myself
and my family, including my two young daughters, because I so passionately believe
in its value for our health.  I am
confident that konjac powder can make a significant impact on the health and
quality of life of many North Americans.
Risks &
Challenges
I speculate that the greatest obstacle involved in this
campaign is a total lack of awareness of the konjac plant in North America, as
well as the flood of so-called super foods to hit our market
in recent years.  Unlike things like the
goji berry, or the acai berry, which are – in my opinion – simply more
expensive alternatives to something like a blueberry, which on its own provides
incredible nutritional value, konjac is like no other plant on earth.  It provides both health benefits and culinary
utility that are matched by no other food.
Other Ways to Help
If you cannot contribute even a small amount, don’t worry, I
get it!  I am a working mom, which is why
I need crowd-funding to help me build this dream.  But there are other important ways you can
help, like simply spreading the word about this campaign.  Blast it out on social media and tell
everyone you know and we will be eternally grateful.  And don’t forget to use all of Indiegogo’s awesome
share tools!

References


Al‐Ghazzewi, F.H., Khanna,
S., Tester, R.F., & Piggott, J. (2007). The potential use of hydrolysed konjac
glucomannan as a prebiotic. Journal of
the Science of Food and Agriculture, 87, (9), 1758-1766.
Chua,
M., Baldwin, T.C., Hocking, T.J., & Chan, K. (2010).  Traditional uses and potential health benfits
of amorphophallus konjac. Journal of Ethnopharmacology,
128, 268-278.
Elamir,
A.A., Tester, R.F., Al-Ghazzewi, F.H., Kaal, H.Y., Ghalbon, A.A., Elmegrahai,
N.A., & Piggott, J.R. (2008). Effects of konjac glucommanan hydrolysates on
the gut microflora of mice, Nutrition and
Food Science, 38, 422-429. 
McCarty,
M.F. (2002). Glucomannan minimizes the postprandial insulin surge: a potential
adjuvant for hepatothermic therapy.  Medical Hypotheses, 58, 487-490.
Surina,
B., Muschina, T., Kanamotob, T., Nakashimab, H., & Yoshidaa, H.  (2013).
Sulfation and biological activities of konjac glucomannan. Carbohydrate
Polymers, 94,
899-903.
Suwannaporn,
P. et al. (2013). Tolerance and nutritional therapy of dietary fibre from
konjac glucomannan hydrolysates for patients with inflammatory bowel disease
(IBD). Bioactive Carbohydrates and
Dietary Fibre, 2 (2), 93-98.
Tester,
R.F., & Al-Ghazzewi, F.H. (2013). Mannans and health, with a special focus
on glucomannans. Food Research
International, 50, 384-391.

story:
Introduction

The Keystone Cup is an eight-team competitive quidditch tournament taking place Saturday, October 18th, 2014 at Haverford College. Conceived by 15-year-old quidditch blogger Jack "ThePhan," the Keystone Cup aims to bring collegiate quidditch back to a broad audience in the Philadelphia area. In its inaugural year, the Keystone Cup is scheduled to feature teams from three US Quidditch regions and seven states.


Mission, Expenses and Perks

The Keystone Cup is determined to facilitate safe and standard gameplay, while presenting competitive quidditch to new spectators professionally. To put on the tournament, the Keystone Cup has to pay for an athletic trainer, field rentals, port-a-potties, lining the fields and more. 

  • Keystone Cup stickers, bumper stickers, stress balls and t-shirts are all available for purchase
  • Experienced quidditch analyst Jack "ThePhan" is offering scouting reports, conferences with team captains and consultation at World Cup VIII 

EDIT: Wristbands=2.5 x 4.5 stickers

story:
Did you know all it takes is one natural ingredient - like water - for brands to label their beauty product as natural?

 

 

 

Message from the Founder
 

We’ve heard this before: 1 in 3 women and 1 in 2 men will be diagnosed with cancer in their lifetime. But you never think this will apply to your family. 

When both my aunt and my brother were diagnosed with cancer, I set out to use my expertise as a Chemical Engineer to protect other families from tragedies like mine. 

The result? CertClean:  A certification that makes it easy for you to avoid carcinogens, neurotoxins and other chemicals that may affect our long term health. 

Now, we’re taking it one step further:  building a review site - like TripAdvisor for nontoxic beauty!  

Please support and enjoy the specially curated clean beauty boxes!

Sincerely,

Jenise Lee | Chemical Engineer, MBA | CEO & Founder of CertClean

 

 
Is this serum safe? Will this nontoxic lotion keep my skin hydrated? Will this clean mascara give me va-va-voom lashes? 
Combating the trend of misleading labels and buyer's hesitation is CertClean's website - a search engine full of user reviews of CertClean certified products.
 
This platform featuring authentic and unbiased CertClean certified product reviews will help you find products perfect for you.
 

 

 
Perks: Clean Beauty Beauty Boxes!

We need your help. In exchange for your support, pick from specially curated beauty boxes full of CertClean certified bestsellers from the hottest new indie brands!

Check out the "specialty" perks too - to meet with eco gurus!

 

 

               

           

Why support us?

  • You want to protect your long term health

  • You believe finding clean beauty must be effortless for everyone

  • You jump at the chance to reward responsible businesses

With your support, we can revolutionize the beauty industry together. Share this campaign with your family, friends and colleagues. Please share this on Facebook and Twitter. We can use your help.

FAQs

I have sensitive skin. Will these products cause skin reactions?

The CertClean certification designates that the product’s formulation is free from over 1400 chemicals known to cause harm to our health.  A natural, organic and or clean chemical does not necessarily mean it is non-irritating to your skin type. Skin irritations and allergies are a personal thing. So for any new beauty products, do a skin patch test to make sure your skin loves the ingredients you’re feeding it.

Should I get rid of all the conventional beauty products from my bathroom?

We are here to make safer choices obvious for you and available to you. Take it one step at a time - pick a box that best resonates with you, and go from there!

What are some challenges you see with this campaign?

As a company that certifies products, we do not manufacture products or typically manage inventory so dealing with logistics from multiple brands may have some hiccups which are beyond our control. 

How does a product get certified? 

Companies apply to go through a rigorous screening process. CertClean assesses the product ingredient list as well as supplier information and documentation to determine if the product is formulated without over 1400 harmful ingredients. If the product complies with the CertClean Standards, the brand is required to sign a Licensing Agreement which dictates their ongoing obligations - for example, if the product is reformulated, the brand needs to inform CertClean before the product is in the marketplace.  

I'm a green beauty blogger. I love what CertClean is all about - how can I help?

We would LOVE to collaborate. We're looking for bloggers to feature when the site goes live. Please get in touch and email: jenise@certclean.com.  And if you blog about this campaign, let us know as we would love to cross-promote!

What is the history behind CertClean?

Over the past 3 years, we've worked with industry experts who, like you and me, want to ensure the personal care products we use everyday are safe. For 2 years, CertClean was self-funded by the Founder. In September 2015, CertClean was recognized as one of Canada's top innovative businesses ready to disrupt the beauty industry and received financing from Futurpreneur's Spin Master Innovation Fund which supported the development of CertClean's evaluation system. Beyond this review site, CertClean is setting up CertClean sections in-stores. For the Founders' efforts to revolutionize the beauty sector, in September 2016, the Founder was awarded 2017 Canada's Clean 50 for exemplifying outstanding contributions to sustainability within the retail sector.

Imagine walking into a store and knowing which products are safer than the rest AND knowing which products are perfect for you.  Please help make this a reality. Get a box today!

Thank you for your support! Please share to everyone you know! <3

Tag us on Facebook: @CertClean | www.facebook.com/certclean

Tweet us on Twitter: @CertClean | www.twitter.com/certclean

story:
NeuroTherapeutic Yoga DVD

Hi Everyone,

My name is Colleen Carroll, and I am launching this campaign to complete production on my DVD NeuroTherapeutic Yoga. The yoga sequences in the DVD are tailored specifically for anyone who, because of age or particular condition, can benefit from a safe and appropriate yoga exercise routine. My production team and I are confident that this product, based on the evidence from classical yoga and my 20 years as a yoga teacher and yoga therapist, will improve quality of life for those who use it.

    Thank you, we can't wait to welcome you to the NeuroTherapeutic community!

    Colleen Carroll, Certified and Registered Yoga Therapist & SoundYogaStudio Productions

    This goal is achievable!

    The DVD is complete, and only needs funding for production costs, design and distribution. We are very proud of the project, and can't wait to be able to offer it to the many people who are otherwise unable to thrive from the healing modality of yoga.

    Your purchase is wide-reaching

    • You benefit by pre-ordering for yourself or a loved one.
    • You bring this DVD into the home of someone who needs it.
    • You broaden the scope of our project to include health care facilities, retirement communities and rehabilitation practices.

    What NTY students and supporters say:

    As a neurologist and yoga practitioner, I have been aware of the utility of yoga for my patients with Parkinson's disease (as well as other neurological disorders). Finally we have a local yoga expert that can provide this service to our community. I welcome Colleen whom I have had the pleasure to work with.
    Lorne S.Label, MD,MBA

    Your Yoga class stands shoulder to shoulder with my doctors and medications in my efforts to combat this disease.  Yoga can lift me up when I’m feeling down and I’m sure others before me feel the same. B.S.

    We leave each session feeling greatly relaxed and more optimistic, lasting even long after class. The three of us look forward to your yoga sessions and find that it benefits each of us tremendously. S.S.

    I credit my my balance, dexterity, strength, calm and endurance in my daily living to Ms. Carroll's inspiring, individualized teaching. D.S.

    I appreciate your  competence, dedication, and the "light" of yoga that inspired me and those of our community that have been supported by your teachings. J.G.

    Thank you for a lovely experience.  I didn’t expect so much Yoga sitting in a chair. S.C.

    When my doctor diagnosed my symptoms as early onset Parkinson's, one of the recommendations he made was YOGA.  I didn't know Yoga from yoghurt! Now yoga not only makes me feel better physically, it makes me feel better mentally, (and) has added value to the quality of our lives far beyond any expectation I had. M.R.

    (NeuroTherapeutic Yoga) is amazingly powerful, with such simple movements and breathing exercises. I get completely energized. Colleen is a gifted teacher and has made a tremendous difference in my life. L.S.

    The biggest impact has been on my breathing . . . my posture, expanding my range of motion and finding balance from the internal strengths yoga therapy has nurtured in me. L.M.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We appreciate your support far beyond monetary contribution, so thanks for helping spread the word. Please share our efforts person-to-person, via email or on social media. And please stay in touch!
    Colleen@SoundYogaStudio.com | www.colleencarrollyoga.com

story:
My name is Jessica, I am the founder of Faith Conquers.

Faith

After

Incest

The-Truth

Hurts


Courage

Over

Never

Questioning

Ur-self (your)

Eventually

Recognizing

Strength

This foundation is not just an ordinary non-profit. For some it will become their salvation and belief in a chance of change. For me it's therapy, it's my motivation and my passion. Faith Conquers is personal and intimate for me. I have gone through experiences and I understand the importance of having just 1 person believe you. Sometimes it can be as simple as just a listening ear without the shame or guilt.

There are many organizations and tons of issues and causes for help but for a minute I want you to think about this example;

First time mom Jenna sent her 3 year old set of twins to daycare while she went to work from 6:30am-4:15pm on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Emmanuel and Emma were such active and loving children. Everyone love them, Jenna was raised in a 2 parent home and seemed to have lived a good life. Well one day the daycare called her to rush and pick up Emmanuel. She got to the school and the police, ems and children services were already there greeting her. She stood puzzled "What's going on? as she began to panic, scared to ask what happened. 'Hi, my name is Ms. Flynn can we take a walk and talk. I am with social services', 'I want to know where is my children and whats going on?' the officer stepped in and responded, 'Your son is en-route to the nearest hospital and your daughter is asleep in her class.' 'I have to go can we please talk about this after I see my son PLEASE!!' Ms. Jenna the reason we called you is because the teacher said while she was changing your son she noticed blood from his rectum and discharge from his penis. Do you know what happened to him?' What are you talking about my son is loved and I don't have anyone around my children EVER! As Jenna paced back and fourth the officer responded and said, 'My name is Srgt. Batista and Ms. unless you can tell us the truth you are about to be arrested.' Jenna immediately freaked out. 'Charged, I bust my butt to make sure my children have the best of everything and even paid extra for the school to watch my babies last night until 8pm instead of 4pm. Now yuor telling me I would harm my children? Where is Mr. Watkins he watched them last night? she asked. My kids came home and my son cried and slept earlier than usual and I didn't see anything when I changed him. That man molested my CHILD! WHERE IS HE! The school director looked at her and the teacher and said Oh no! We let him go this morning because we found him laying in the classroom with the children clothes surrounding him. Immediately the officers turned to the school administration and began to follow up. Jenna broke down and rushed to her son and social services accompanied her. The social worker gave her contact information for SAFE HORIZON and they mentioned they would stay in touch if she needed anything.

Now the role the Faith Conquers play in this situaion would be different because,

1. Safe Horizon was designed for victims of Domestic Violence and Rape but not limited to any kind of abuse.

Faith Conquers is built to assist these special matters so the counsuling that Jenna would need to support and assist her child is not the same as a 17yr old who boyfriend beat her or 23yr old who was raped in her building. All these are unfortunate and sensitive matters. Which all should be handled as such! Society has labeled everything in one basket and one basic therapy. And some where in there is Incest if mentioned. You can get therapy for a relationship and in time let it go move on and get married etc. But what do you tell a child who may have been sexually molested by their cousin whom lives with them. Or uncle who is over every Sunday for dinner?


We need to build a organization to create shelter and awareness in families. And create safe havens for our youth if they finally speak out and seeking refuge. We will take them in and provide care and resources and shelter for them, But not under Domestic Violence and Rape but under it's catergory INCEST. This money is a small portion for a big beginning. We are about HOPE! We are about FAITH! We are about LOVE! So we urge you support the cause make it personal. Because it truly is personal it is intimate and it is OUR FAMILIES! We need your HELP!!
story_txt:
My name is Jessica, I am the founder of Faith Conquers.
Faith
After
Incest
The-Truth
Hurts

Courage
Over
Never
Questioning
Ur-self (your)
Eventually
Recognizing
Strength
This foundation is not just an ordinary non-profit. For some it will become their salvation and belief in a chance of change. For me it's therapy, it's my motivation and my passion. Faith Conquers is personal and intimate for me. I have gone through experiences and I understand the importance of having just 1 person believe you. Sometimes it can be as simple as just a listening ear without the shame or guilt.
There are many organizations and tons of issues and causes for help but for a minute I want you to think about this example;
First time mom Jenna sent her 3 year old set of twins to daycare while she went to work from 6:30am-4:15pm on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Emmanuel and Emma were such active and loving children. Everyone love them, Jenna was raised in a 2 parent home and seemed to have lived a good life. Well one day the daycare called her to rush and pick up Emmanuel. She got to the school and the police, ems and children services were already there greeting her. She stood puzzled "What's going on? as she began to panic, scared to ask what happened. 'Hi, my name is Ms. Flynn can we take a walk and talk. I am with social services', 'I want to know where is my children and whats going on?' the officer stepped in and responded, 'Your son is en-route to the nearest hospital and your daughter is asleep in her class.' 'I have to go can we please talk about this after I see my son PLEASE!!' Ms. Jenna the reason we called you is because the teacher said while she was changing your son she noticed blood from his rectum and discharge from his penis. Do you know what happened to him?' What are you talking about my son is loved and I don't have anyone around my children EVER! As Jenna paced back and fourth the officer responded and said, 'My name is Srgt. Batista and Ms. unless you can tell us the truth you are about to be arrested.' Jenna immediately freaked out. 'Charged, I bust my butt to make sure my children have the best of everything and even paid extra for the school to watch my babies last night until 8pm instead of 4pm. Now yuor telling me I would harm my children? Where is Mr. Watkins he watched them last night? she asked. My kids came home and my son cried and slept earlier than usual and I didn't see anything when I changed him. That man molested my CHILD! WHERE IS HE! The school director looked at her and the teacher and said Oh no! We let him go this morning because we found him laying in the classroom with the children clothes surrounding him. Immediately the officers turned to the school administration and began to follow up. Jenna broke down and rushed to her son and social services accompanied her. The social worker gave her contact information for SAFE HORIZON and they mentioned they would stay in touch if she needed anything.
Now the role the Faith Conquers play in this situaion would be different because,
1. Safe Horizon was designed for victims of Domestic Violence and Rape but not limited to any kind of abuse.
Faith Conquers is built to assist these special matters so the counsuling that Jenna would need to support and assist her child is not the same as a 17yr old who boyfriend beat her or 23yr old who was raped in her building. All these are unfortunate and sensitive matters. Which all should be handled as such! Society has labeled everything in one basket and one basic therapy. And some where in there is Incest if mentioned. You can get therapy for a relationship and in time let it go move on and get married etc. But what do you tell a child who may have been sexually molested by their cousin whom lives with them. Or uncle who is over every Sunday for dinner?

We need to build a organization to create shelter and awareness in families. And create safe havens for our youth if they finally speak out and seeking refuge. We will take them in and provide care and resources and shelter for them, But not under Domestic Violence and Rape but under it's catergory INCEST. This money is a small portion for a big beginning. We are about HOPE! We are about FAITH! We are about LOVE! So we urge you support the cause make it personal. Because it truly is personal it is intimate and it is OUR FAMILIES! We need your HELP!!

story:
Hello, 

My name is Miranda Currie. 

Please help fix the pain in my brain (and body)!

Money is the only thing standing between me and healing my brain.

I am gathering $5000 to go to Gaia Clinic, Canada's only brain mapping clinic. It is located in Canmore, Alberta. I believe Gaia Clinic has the technology and professional expertise to help me recover fully from my traumatic brain injury. I am desperate to get my life back on track!

Let's get rid of the obstacle of money together! 

Brain Injury Journey Thus Far....

On November 28th, 2011, I was kite skiing on the Great Slave Lake, and was lifted high in the air and dropped on my head. I wasn't wearing a helmet. I awoke some minutes later to my sled dog Kenzie, licking my face. After seeking medical attention, it was determined that I had suffered a significant concussion.

Only three weeks after my first concussion, I was getting out of a hot tub, fainted, and hit my head on an inconveniently placed rock. Two days later, as I was preparing my bike for a road trip, I became dizzy to the point of not being able to stand up and began to experience difficulty speaking.

I flew to my parents home in Ontario, but I was eager to return to the North. On January 18th, once back in Yellowknife, I sneezed and hit my head on a metal shelf. I was then hospitalized for a week. Three concussions in 3 months was bad news for my brain! 

On March 31st, 2012, I played a show at the famous Snow Castle in Yellowknife. As I left the stage, my body went into what some might explain as a conscious seizure. After another two week hospital stay, I finally began to accept that there was really something wrong and began the arduous task of recovery. 

My recovery thus far has involved many doctors, physiotherapists, neurologists and alternative medicine practitioners to whom I am grateful. I have been working hard, attempting to regain my ability to walk, talk and play music. I have experienced some success, but my life is still very different and much more challenging than my life pre- brain injury.

Financial Consequences

As a result of brain injury, I have not been able to work with any regularity for more than two years, though I always try to do the best I can. I have been on NWT Income Assistance, and CPP Disability for the last two years. Because of outstanding student loans, I was also forced to declare bankruptcy during that time. Obviously, that really sucked! But as The Beatles sang, "I'll get by with a little help from my friends!"     

Where I Am At Now

I sleep anywhere from 15-18 hours a day, I often tremor and shake throughout the day. I experience dizziness, nausea and vomiting on a regular basis. I have limited concentration, killer headaches and I have to walk with a cane. However, I also know, I have many people who love me and want me to get better!

I feel that I have exhausted all my options in the public health sector, so I am now turning to Gaia Collaborative Medicine, a private, functional medicine clinic, and Canada's only brain mapping clinic. I believe they have the tools and expertise to look deeper inside my brain, to figure out what is causing my debilitating symptoms. Using brain mapping technology, Dr. Tracy Thomson along with 14 other medical and alternative health practitioners will custom design a plan that will bring me back to optimum health.

I will be participating in the Brain Mapping and Scanning program, as well as The Restorative Health Week. These services cost $10,000. However, Gaia Clinic has generously agreed to sponsor half that amount in services if I can come up with the other half. If you are interested in their services, or learning more about cutting edge brain mapping technology, please check out their website at www.gaiaclinic.ca

What You Can Do To Help 

You can show your support by making a financial donation, or simply by spreading the word. I am also looking for a free place to stay while in Canmore - so if you have some friends with an extra bedroom, who would like a guest (June 29th - July 5th) - please feel free to let me know. 

So here is the fun part! I have also included a few perks to encourage your donation - from handmade thank you cards, to a private house concert by yours truly, and a lot of interesting perks in between. You just can't afford to miss out on the fun of donating! Check out the side column for more specifics.

I want you to know that your donation has the power to help me regain my ability to walk at a normal speed without a cane, and to reduce the frequency of tremors and headaches. You could help me be able to ride my bike again, or paddle a canoe - and well.... wouldn't that just be swell...?

Thank you for your thoughts, prayers, intentions and love. 

With Much Gratitude,

Love Miranda

story:
Hi

My name is Jessica, I am a 36 year old single mother of two and have been diagnosed with cancer for the second time.

The cancer is aggressive and my treatment options are limited to specialists and possibly experimental. I do not have health insurance and can no longer work.

I need to raise money for my treatment and to take care of my two girls. 

If needed I can provide medical records.

Any help anyone can give would be greatly appreciated.

story:
Hello,


My name is Dan Collins and I was struck with Graves Disease 8/2005 when thyroid storm put me into ICU for 3 days. I swallowed my RAI pill on my 40th birthday and life changed for me, like others, forever that day. Since then i have seen how this disease is Misdiagnosed, not understood and how us Patients of this disease close to 20 million + in US alone, deals with this on a daily basis. The way i felt when i came across others is why this project was launched.
My name is Britney Robinson and I was diagnosed with Graves' disease in late 2000. Before then I was diagnosed with all sorts of things, clinical depression, insomnia, blood pressure issues. In November of 2000 after not sleeping for almost a month they finally diagnosed me with hyperthyroidism/Graves' disease. Now after 13 years of feeling alone, I am collecting stories of other thyroid disease patients to get our complete experience down on paper.

Funding

We need to raise $12500 to put this in the forefront of the people that are suffering. This will be used for the deposit to begin planning the Thyroid Disease 101 Patient Symposium in Denver Spring 2015, as well as continued drip marketing to promote our weekly podcast and Facebook page.  Our rewards will vary from name on the wall as you enter the symposium to attending the banquet Saturday night.

    The Impact

    When i was first struck with this disease, I knew NOTHING about it. Being a man the chance of getting this is less than 3%. It was NOT until i found a group on Facebook, that i found that i was NOT alone, That others suffered that same things as I. As new people come into this disease , I still see the same bewilderment, the same confusion on what to do. We are trying to change this.

      2

      Risks & Challenges

      I have been in radio & marketing for over 30 years. I have built trade shows in other niches since 2001. The hurdle will be to get the Patient Symposium sold out with vendors to excite a crowd to come. I do truly believe that this is the biggest challenge. Our weekly podcast is beginning to attract other Medical Professionals that are concerned about the lack of New information regarding the thyroid esp. since the Thyroid controls  ALL of our hormones. This funding will make failure of the symposium very small. the hurdle will be to bring enough people to the event to make it an annual thing. 

      Britney and her husband Ray Robinson are in the final stages of their book ," Tales from the Graves" and bring experience to this project that enhances the finished event.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Come to the event. Listen to our show. Share this on your social media sites. We can Together

story:
Dear Friends,

This June, Susan and I are going on our 2nd Mission Trip to Haiti.  I will be the dentist in the group and will be treating what could be up to 300 patients during the week that we are there.  Susan will be my “right arm” and helping out wherever she is needed.

We are traveling there with a group called HART (The Haiti and Africa Relief Team) and will be at St. Jude Parish in Morne L’Hopital, Haiti. (http://www.h-a-r-t.org/)

We will be providing crucial medical and dental services, bringing food, working in orphanages and doing other projects to help the people who live there.  Many of the people we will serve have no access to a doctor or nurse, let alone a dentist, and will probably walk miles and wait for hours to be seen by us.

Already the poorest country in our half of the world, Haiti suffered a devastating earthquake in January 2010 which left millions homeless and hungry.  In the area we will be working with people who live on less than $1 a day.  They desperately need our help!

In addition to our time, we pay for our own airfare and lodging expenses and we will also be providing and hand carrying all of our medical and dental supplies.

Would you please consider helping us with this trip?

If you feel moved to help, we would gratefully appreciate any financial contribution that you are able to provide to help the people of Haiti.  Your donation will help offset the cost of providing dental supplies and much needed medicine. Take a look at our blog and pictures from our trip last year to see the work we accomplished in Haiti; https://hopelovehaiti.wordpress.com/.

We have never been in a situation that was so rewarding and gratifying, and yet so heartbreaking at the same time. In a country with so much despair, we just tried to focus one at a time, on each person we saw, in hope that we could bring them relief from their pain.  With your support, we look forward to providing care and relief for many more people this trip!

Thank you for reading this and considering a donation.

Gratefully,

Art and Susan

story:
Woax is designed as a hybrid of extreme fashion with a practical approach for people's convenience. It's both easy and quick to use and will change the way people communicate forever.  Sharp design with nice ‘n’ easy wear  - in a multitude of colors to please the most discerning fashion gurus represented in two color lines loud and invisible.






Woax is meant to make your impressions more vivid; it comes with 15 standard as well as 3 of our own uniquely designed functions.  We provide vast opportunities for developers to pitch in and broaden the diversity of voice functions.

Woax's shell is made of innovative non-allergen materials, so that when worn, it adapts to the shape of your ear and to your body temperature instantaneously.

Woax focuses on your voice. The moment Woax hears the words "Hey, Woax", it flips out of stand-by ready for action.



Start your day with the words "Hey, Woax!”, and receive your fast, timely and fresh information thanks to a wide variety of built-in functions and smart search techniques.


From simple phone calls, messages, time and weather to intuitive reminders, a smart system of breaking news, games, as well as posting on social networks, voice web surfing and creating voice stream, custom loops with people and what's more - God Mode.  

Prior to using Woax, you have to pass the voice initialization process once to allow voice recognition technology to tune only for your voice pattern. After the initialization process, you will be able to enjoy all Woax functions using your voice only. 


Woax is neither earphone nor headset. The basic version requires a pre-installed application as well as a Bluetooth connection. Our advanced version will have the UIM (User Identification Module) from the pre-installed mobile phone carrier, meaning the gadget will operate autonomously and be able to substitute smartphones in the near future.




This function allows the creation of your own stream mobile channel, which can be launched live in front of a global audience. Broadcast exclusive content and gain listeners. Join channels and become a listener yourself


Create an Account. Send Voice Messages. Get Listeners

One-way wireless voice transmission is intended to reach a wide audience. Just create and customize your ON AIR account and stream voice messages to your listeners. Get popular!


God Mode is our own unique development. It allows you to hear voices from all over the world or from specifically selected regions. You'll face the real human emotions, events, and experience; despite voices overlapping


Tell the World. Hear the World. All Woax users can communicate within one general stream all over the world. Have an idea? Pass it on to the world. Hear people sharing their thoughts! Be God



Create your own customized loops (or user groups) by adding people from your contact list, and stay in touch anytime, anywhere by sending short voice messages


You can also use Loop Mode to share moments, discuss or collaborate with friends, family, business, leisure, private etc.




Woax has custom embedded Artificial Intelligence (AI). Our software combines speech recognition technology with our own designed algorithms to execute a variety of absolutely unique and never before seen functions. Woax is a Voice Command Device that is controlled through the medium of the human voice. By removing the need to use buttons, dials and switches, consumers can easily operate appliances with their hands full or while doing other tasks.


Woax AI and our operational software use different algorithm groups and are specifically tailored to commands.



The main hardware component of a Woax device is CSR8610™ 4.0 Bluetooth chipset. CSR8610™ is a next generation Single-chip mono headset solution with advanced echo and bi-directional noise cancellation technology targeted for low-cost mono headsets.

Extra-low energy consumption is one of the main advantages that sets apart Bluetooth 4.0 core. This feature allows battery-operated devices to function without battery swapping over a long period of time, and also reduces the size of the target device.

When it’s time to charge Woax, you’ll hear the voice say “Battery Empty” from the device itself, while the indicator flashes red at the same time. Woax is charged through 4 bonding pads on the case. Place the device on the battery-charging station and power this station through USB cable or just AC/DC (Input: 10-240V ~ 50/60Hz – Output: 5V, 2A). Once Woax is successfully charged, the indicator turns green and the device is ready to go.


Bone conduction technology

The sound in a Woax device comes from the Bone Conduction Transducer (BCT) – the speaker found on the inside of the device.

Using Bone Conduction technology, we have developed our own custom engineering solution, which uses only one transducer to create vibrations and power sound to your inner ear, allowing it to reach the cochlea without even using the ear drum.

It allows you to hear the environment together with the sound of the device. Your ear is always open therefore you’re always in the know and more effective.




FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Is Woax stand alone or does it need to be connected to an app?

The original version will be connected to HeyWoax App. The advanced, later versions will be a standalone device utilizing built in UIM (User Identity Module)

How do I turn Woax on?

Simply pair Woax to HeyWoax App and then just say “Hey Woax!” to awaken Woax out of stand-by mode. The moment Woax hears these words, you are ready for action!

Will Woax gadget feature more applications than 15 standard + 3 specifically designed?

For sure, the engineering team plan to provide working space for third-party developers to enhance your experience with Woax. Our SDK will be launched within the year. There are huge revenue potential for voice apps

Is Woax comfortable? How will Woax adapt to my ear?

We have researched and tested many new and existing materials. The new Woax casing is constructed of non-allergenic, brushed silicone that immediately conforms to shape of your ear. ‘Forget it’s there’ wearable device that not only adapts to the ear are but your skin temperature too

Will it be confusing with dual sounds from the device and the noise from the environment?

With Woax advanced bone conduction technology, Not at all. You will hear both at corrected levels (needed from a safety perspective also). You can adjust the Woax volume to suite you and your surroundings

Can I only active Woax with “Hey Woax”?

Better to use ‘Hey Woax’ as you do not want to accidentally activate device. You can use Woax to perform lots of tasks for example search the web selfie, fb post, tweet, weather, radio, music, record and much, much more. All you need is to say the magic words "Hey Woax"

What is God Mode?

God Mode is our own unique development. It allows you listen into many conversation streams from all over the world or from specifically selected regions. Chose to just listen or take part in real life debates, face real human emotions, issues, events in a real world experience

What is I’m On Air?

This function allows the streaming of your own mobile channel, this can be launched live in front of a global audience. Broadcast exclusive content and reach millions of listeners. Join the channels available and become a listener yourself

What languages does WOAX support?

Woax supports English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, and Japanese with many more to follow…

How long does the battery last?

The battery lasts up to 5 hours

Why did WOAX choose to crowdfund?

Crowdfunding is a great way to promote our product as well as to accumulate enough funds to jump into the production

I accidentally ordered the wrong colour. Entered the wrong address, Need to upgrade my perk. What can do I do?

Don’t worry, please e-mail our customer service team support@woax.com you need to include your full name, address, Indiegogo account name. You will then receive a response with 12 hours.

I’m not able to use Paypal for payment, what can I do?

Email the Indiegogo customer service team at support@indiegogo.com. They will be more than happy to assist you

I pre-ordered WOAX, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact our customer service team at support@woax.com

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

If you live in the US or Canada, shipping is free. For all other, please add the extra $15 for shipping elsewhere. Local import tax could apply, please contact our customer service team for rates support@woax.com

When will WOAX ship?

Shipping will start 6 months after the crowdfunding campaign is finished

What are the challenges?

Our aim is to produce a world class product for you. Therefore during our manufacturing stage we closely work with our factory to make sure that everything is meeting and exceeding our high standards, we keep to our planned schedule and millstones. We will of course keep in close contact to ensure everyone is aware of our progress

How does WOAX respect my privacy?

We take your privacy very seriously. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and procedures to safeguard any sensitive data

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

As always any questions or issues please do not hesitate to contact us at the usual email address support@woax.com

It's both easy and quick to use and will change the way people communicate forever.  Sharp design with nice ‘n’ easy wear  - in a multitude of colors to please the most discerning fashion gurus represented in two color lines loud and invisible.












Woax is meant to make your impressions more vivid; it comes with 15 standard as well as 3 of our own uniquely designed functions.  We provide vast opportunities for developers to pitch in and broaden the diversity of voice functions.



Woax's shell is made of innovative non-allergen materials, so that when worn, it adapts to the shape of your ear and to your body temperature instantaneously.
Woax focuses on your voice. The moment Woax hears the words "Hey, Woax", it flips out of stand-by ready for action.


Start your day with the words "Hey, Woax!”, and receive your fast, timely and fresh information thanks to a wide variety of built-in functions and smart search techniques.






From simple phone calls, messages, time and weather to intuitive reminders, a smart system of breaking news, games, as well as posting on social networks, voice web surfing and creating voice stream, custom loops with people and what's more - God Mode.  

Prior to using Woax, you have to pass the voice initialization process once to allow voice recognition technology to tune only for your voice pattern. After the initialization process, you will be able to enjoy all Woax functions using your voice only. 




Woax is neither earphone nor headset. The basic version requires a pre-installed application as well as a Bluetooth connection. Our advanced version will have the UIM (User Identification Module) from the pre-installed mobile phone carrier, meaning the gadget will operate autonomously and be able to substitute smartphones in the near future.





This function allows the creation of your own stream mobile channel, which can be launched live in front of a global audience. Broadcast exclusive content and gain listeners. Join channels and become a listener yourself



Create an Account. Send Voice Messages. Get Listeners
One-way wireless voice transmission is intended to reach a wide audience. Just create and customize your ON AIR account and stream voice messages to your listeners. Get popular!

God Mode is our own unique development. It allows you to hear voices from all over the world or from specifically selected regions. You'll face the real human emotions, events, and experience; despite voices overlapping

Tell the World. Hear the World. All Woax users can communicate within one general stream all over the world. Have an idea? Pass it on to the world. Hear people sharing their thoughts! Be God



Create your own customized loops (or user groups) by adding people from your contact list, and stay in touch anytime, anywhere by sending short voice messages

You can also use Loop Mode to share moments, discuss or collaborate with friends, family, business, leisure, private etc.






Woax has custom embedded Artificial Intelligence (AI). Our software combines speech recognition technology with our own designed algorithms to execute a variety of absolutely unique and never before seen functions. Woax is a Voice Command Device that is controlled through the medium of the human voice. By removing the need to use buttons, dials and switches, consumers can easily operate appliances with their hands full or while doing other tasks.


Woax AI and our operational software use different algorithm groups and are specifically tailored to commands.






The main hardware component of a Woax device is CSR8610™ 4.0 Bluetooth chipset. CSR8610™ is a next generation Single-chip mono headset solution with advanced echo and bi-directional noise cancellation technology targeted for low-cost mono headsets.
Extra-low energy consumption is one of the main advantages that sets apart Bluetooth 4.0 core. This feature allows battery-operated devices to function without battery swapping over a long period of time, and also reduces the size of the target device. 
When it’s time to charge Woax, you’ll hear the voice say “Battery Empty” from the device itself, while the indicator flashes red at the same time. Woax is charged through 4 bonding pads on the case. Place the device on the battery-charging station and power this station through USB cable or just AC/DC (Input: 10-240V ~ 50/60Hz – Output: 5V, 2A). Once Woax is successfully charged, the indicator turns green and the device is ready to go.



Bone conduction technology
The sound in a Woax device comes from the Bone Conduction Transducer (BCT) – the
speaker found on the inside of the device. 
Using Bone Conduction technology, we have developed our own custom engineering
solution, which uses only one transducer to create vibrations and power sound
to your inner ear, allowing it to reach the cochlea without even using the ear
drum.
It allows you to hear the environment together with the sound of the device. Your
ear is always open therefore you’re always in the know and more effective.











FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Is Woax stand alone or does it need to be connected to an app?
The original version will be
connected to HeyWoax App. The advanced, later versions will be a standalone
device utilizing built in UIM (User Identity Module)

How do I turn Woax on?

Simply pair Woax to HeyWoax
App and then just say “Hey Woax!” to awaken Woax out of stand-by mode. The
moment Woax hears these words, you are ready for action!


Will Woax gadget feature more applications than 15 standard + 3 specifically designed?
For sure, the engineering team plan to provide working space for third-party developers to enhance your experience with Woax. Our SDK will be
launched within the year. There are huge revenue potential for voice apps
Is Woax comfortable? How will Woax adapt to my ear?
We have researched and tested many new and existing materials. The new Woax casing is constructed of non-allergenic, brushed silicone that immediately conforms to shape of your ear. ‘Forget it’s there’ wearable device that not only adapts to the ear are but your skin temperature too
Will it be confusing with dual sounds from the device and the noise from the environment?
With Woax advanced bone conduction technology, Not at all. You will hear both at corrected levels (needed from a safety perspective also). You can adjust the Woax volume to suite you and your surroundings

Can I only active Woax with “Hey Woax”?
Better to use ‘Hey Woax’ as you do not want to accidentally activate device. You can use Woax to perform lots of tasks for example search the web
selfie, fb post, tweet, weather, radio, music, record and much, much more. All
you need is to say the magic words "Hey Woax"

What is God Mode? 
God Mode is our own unique development. It allows you listen into many conversation streams from all over the world or from specifically selected regions. Chose to just listen or take part in real life debates, face real human emotions, issues, events in a real world experience

What is I’m On Air?
This function allows the streaming of your own mobile channel, this can be launched live in front of a global audience. Broadcast exclusive content and reach millions of listeners. Join the channels available and become a listener yourself
What languages does WOAX support? 
Woax supports English, German, Spanish, French,
Chinese, and Japanese with many more to follow…
How long does the battery last?
The battery lasts up to 5 hours
Why did WOAX choose to crowdfund?
Crowdfunding is a great way to promote our product as well as to accumulate enough funds to jump into the production

I accidentally ordered the wrong colour. Entered the wrong address, Need to upgrade my perk. What can do I do?

Don’t worry, please e-mail our customer service team support@woax.com you need to include your full name, address, Indiegogo account name. You will then receive a response with 12 hours.

I’m not able to use Paypal for payment, what can I do?
Email the Indiegogo customer service team at support@indiegogo.com. They will be more than happy to assist you

I pre-ordered WOAX, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?
Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact our customer service team at support@woax.com
Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

If you live in the US or Canada, shipping is free. For all other, please add the extra $15 for shipping elsewhere. Local import tax could apply, please contact our customer service team for rates support@woax.com
When will WOAX ship?
Shipping will start 6 months after the crowdfunding campaign is finished
What are the challenges?
Our aim is to produce a world class product for you. Therefore during our manufacturing stage we closely work with our factory to make sure that everything is meeting and exceeding our high standards, we keep to our planned schedule and millstones. We will of course keep in close contact to ensure everyone is aware of our progress
How does WOAX respect my privacy?
We take your privacy very seriously. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and procedures to safeguard any sensitive data
If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

As always any questions or issues please do not hesitate to contact us at the usual email
address support@woax.com

story:
Welcome to my Hoka Hey Challenge page.  For those that I haven’t met, my name is Mitchell W Matzek and I live in Harpers Ferry, WV, I am Married to Sara Matzek and have a wonderful 4 year old little girl Parker.

I am also an avid Harley-Davidson rider and have been riding since I was 16 years old.

 

And I currently am riding a 2008 FLHX Street Glide.

On June 20th, 2010 myself and 499 other riders left Key West Florida competing in the 1st Hoka Hey Challenge.

Hoka Hey translates roughly to "It is a good day to Die" and was the war cry of Chief Crazy Horse. 

The route took us on secondary roads from Key West Florida to Homer Alaska. A distance of approx. 9,100 miles. I arrived in Homer early on the afternoon of July 3rd, 13 days after leaving Key West.

We were required to sleep on the ground with our bikes and were not able to have any outside assistance, I have to say it was a very challenging route. But I was able to meet and help many riders along the way, I will never forget the camaraderie I found along the route. The prize for the 1st to cross the finish line in last years challenge was $500,000.00.  I was never really in it for the money, but for the experience of it all. I think one of the largest rewards was visiting one of the Hoka Hey riders that was injured in a serious accident along the route in the hospital in Canada. What it did for him that moment was worth far more than $500,000.

 

In 2010 I had 100’s of followers across the country watching me last year on my SPOT tracker device via the on line feed, keeping track and in spirit riding right along with me.  This year I’m going to do it again, taking you all with me again for the ride of a lifetime..

The experience I learned from the 2010 Hoka Hey is that I am viable competitor in this years Challenge; which will be starting in Phoenix Arizona and finishing in Glacier Bay Nova Scotia. A routed distance of approx 10,000 miles.

Different then last year when we were on our own with limited sponsorship, this year on Feb 15th 2011 Harley-Davidson Motor Company has signed on as a Sponsor of this years event! 

What I need is your help.  Whatever you feel you can contribute to take this ride along with me make a difference, even if it’s just a gallon of gas, a set of goggles, or a new set of tires – very bit will count and I will make you proud to be riding with me.


With the high profile sponsorship of Harley Davidson Motor Company this year the ride will made into a T.V. show and aired by HD Discovery, as I understand, which will allow you to see your donation at work.  As a second year competitor I will put all my experience, knowledge and passion into representing my family, my friends and good ole’ WV in the 2011 Hoka Hey and I hope you’ll help.  Just as I did last year,  I will have a GPS device on my bike and will ensure everyone has access to the website address so all that make a donation can follow my progress in real time from the comfort of you own home – or at the restaurant (The Q Company) along with Sara, where I’m sure she’d love your company while she watches along with you ;-).

 



Thank you in advance for your consideration.

Thank You

 

Mitchell W Matzek  


 Why I am looking for Donations

I am looking for donations so that I may compete in the 2011 Hoka Hey Challenge. No amount is to small or too large. Although I was able to do the ride last year with very little outside financial assistance, this year I need a bit of help.  Many of you know me personally, you know my passion for this ride, for ultra distance riding, you know that I’m dedicated and will put all I have into competing in this years Challenge.  Can you help buy a gallon of gas?

 

My commitment back to you, I will compete, I will put my heart and sole into riding this ride with integrity, following my biker code and never passing a brother or sister that need help, but making a run for the top finishers.  With your help I can do it!  Lastly, for all that commit to me I commit back, I will reimburse you your investment if I am able to finish in the money, I will pay back all moneys donated to me.

 

For any businesses that decide to commit to a donation, I will be mentioning all sponsors to any and all media outlets, and based on donation, display stickers/slogans on my bike for this years challenge.

story:
LONGER GOLF DRIVES AND GREATER ACCURACY GUARANTEED:

Patent Pending ACULONG Golf Tees give you longer golf drives - Guaranteed. Our tees have been proven using robotic testing to give you longer drives and better accuracy when driving the golf ball and conform to USGA rules.  Now that’s a hole-in-one!

 

IMPROVE YOUR GOLF GAME WHILE CREATING US JOBS:

My name is Andrew Spriegel. My business partner Rich Spencer and I have a very important goal: to help create jobs in the US and to help individuals become financially independent in this tough economy. I have a high success rate in commercializing products, both for companies and individuals. I own a patent law firm and several product development companies; for both of my business practices, helping individuals start their own business and escaping the stress of the corporate world is our number one priority.

 

IMPROVE YOU GOLF GAME AND CREATE INVENTOR INDEPENDENCE:

Rich Spencer is the primary inventor of these innovative golf tees, and I co-own MyTee Golf Products, LLC.  Rich wants to pursue his passion which is designing and commercializing patented products.  Crowd funding is a great way to raise money for products, especially when taking into consideration that most businesses fail due to lack of adequate funding.


This funding campaign will increase sales of our “Made in the USA, Patent Pending” golf tees; in fact, we have already created work for others in the US. By supporting our business, you’re also supporting the working population, strengthening the economy for all.   

With your help, we can increase sales by licensing college logos to print on our golf tee strips, attending tradeshows, increase marketing of the tees, and obtaining golf sponsors.    

We need $4,500 to further increase our marketing efforts. 

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?

First, you’ll receive a large discount on our strips of 10 revolutionary golf tees, based on the amount of money you give.

And that is where the reward really takes shape.  This tee is simply revolutionary; it will improve your golf game dramatically, and we’ve proved it with robotic testing.  I see a golf championship in someone’s future…

But wait…there’s more.  You also will get a huge amount of space to advertise your business, school, event or whatever else your heart desires! When people purchase these tees, they hang them on the outside of their bag, people ask about it. Regular business cards get put in someone's pocket and never see the light of day.  And in that way, the tees will pay for themselves. 

We will purchase as many collegiate licenses as we can with popular colleges/universities.  What better way is there to promote your alumni spirit than with your school logo clearly visible on your golf bag?

They make a great gift for friends, family, and customers.  College is one of the most memorable times in life, and this is a great ode to any alma mater.

Great stocking stuffers.

SUPPORT THE ENVIRONMENT BY USING THESE ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY TEES:

Our golf tees are more environmentally friendly than wooden tees.  They do not break like wooden tees, so they can be re-used on multiple holes.  They are made of Teslin, a non-toxic, non-cellulose, recyclable material that is 65% by weight inorganic filler (silica, derived from sand). Teslin is a printable, durable material that is not plastic (no petroleum pollution) and not paper (no trees destroyed).

Here are 10 ways you can help:

10. Trying the tees out, thus contributing to the creation of US jobs (100% Made in the USA)

9. Getting the word out about this campaign

8. Giving our golf tees as gifts to friends, family, clients and co-workers

7. Show you are an early adopter

6. Brand your business

5. Use the golf tees as a fundraiser

4. Tell your friends and family about our campaign

3. Use the tees for conversation starters

2. Help us get a golfer to endorse the tees

1. Help an inventor get out of the corporate grind!

story:
Our Cause

Camp Quality is a not for profit organization who are devoted to creating a better life for every child living with cancer in Australia. They whole heartedly believe that ‘laughter is the best medicine’ and are devoted to improving the quality of life for these children through unrelenting optimism and the healing power of laughter. With over 900 children affected with some form of cancer each year, Camp Quality depends on the generosity of the community. This year we, the Victoria University students are working in conjunction with Bendigo Bank and Victoria University on a mission to raise over $5,000 for Camp Quality. With your help we can make a difference to children and families affected by cancer.

 

How does Camp Quality help kids with cancer?

Camp quality is there for the whole journey, from diagnosis, through to treatment and remission. They believe that caring for children with cancer and their families go beyond treatment and medication. The building of optimistic and resilient behavior is fundamental psychosocial skills required for the cancer journey. They have structured program areas that focus on supporting the educational, financial, hospital and recreational needs of families.


Its purpose is to create a better life for every child living with cancer in Australia.

 

What can I do to help?

Camp quality depends on the generosity of the community to continue helping children and families affected by cancer. We ask that you consider supporting this cause by donating through this website, attending one of our events (see below) or posting this link on your Facebook page to create further awareness.The money raised from the campaign will go directly to Camp Quality and be used expand and enhance their existing programs for children in desperate need.

 

What are we doing to help?

To support Camp Quality this year we, the Victoria University students are hosting a charity BBQ held at Masters Northland on the 14th of September, and are also holding an exciting circus theme business breakfast and auction to be held at Campari House. All funds from ticket events will go directly to Camp Quality.

For details on these occasions please see our events below.

 

Our events

Sausage Sizzle

Location:              Masters Northland

Date:                   Friday 14th September 2012

Time:                  10:00am – 2:00pm

Address:              85 Chifley Drive

                          Preston VIC 3072

 

Business Breakfast/Auction

Location:              Campari House

Date:                   Tuesday 25th September 2012

Time:                   7:30am - 9:30 am

Cost:                    $60 per person     

Address:               23-25 Hardware Lane

                          Melbourne VIC 3000

 

 

There will be guest speakers, circus performances from the National Institution of Circus Arts and charitable auctions throughout the business breakfast.

 

For further details on any of these events please contact:

Andrew Chapman

Email:    andrew.chapman@medibank.com.au

 

Meng Ung

Email:    meng.ung1@live.vu.edu.au

 

Daniel Meilak

Email:   daniel.meilak2@live.vu.edu.au

 

Proudly sponsored by
 

  • Camp Quality
  • Bendigo Bank
  • Victoria University

 

Visit Camp Quality Website

‘Laughter is the best medicine”
http://www.campquality.org.au/public/home.aspx

story:
Friends and family,

 

Corah Brigit Hanlon will receive her father's kidney at Children's Hospital in Boston the weekend of July 27th. The stress Crystal and Jamie are about to face as they undergo the transplant and the medical bills that go along with expensive operations will be unbearable without your help. Watch the video and get to know Corah, spread the word, and give what you can.
story_txt:
Friends and family, 
 
Corah Brigit Hanlon will receive her father's kidney at Children's Hospital in Boston the weekend of July 27th. The stress Crystal and Jamie are about to face as they undergo the transplant and the medical bills that go along with expensive operations will be unbearable without your help. Watch the video and get to know Corah, spread the word, and give what you can.

story:
Our Teacher

Our teacher has been a passionate educator for the last 7 years!  A few weeks ago, just days before she was to return to the classroom, she found out she was suffering from serious health issues...the most problematic was that she had severe nerve damage in her right eye which will lead to blindness if left untreated.  Her doctor has taken her off of work, while she prepares for her upcoming surgery and gets treatment to improve her health!  She has been devastated by the fact that she not able to work with more amazing students this year, but is even overwhelmed by the impact that this is and will continue to have on her two amazing children.  With mounting medical bills, she fears how she will manage,  following the surgery and during her recovery!  She has given her heart and soul to so many and now we are reaching out to help her!

 

What We Need 

Her insurance will cover a marginal part of the cost of the surgery.  Since she is unable to work, we have been taking up small collections through fundraising activities to help with housing, food and childcare, while she recovers from her eye surgery.

 

The Impact

YOUR HELP will allow her to get the surgery she needs and keep her children living more stable at such a difficult time!  They are counting down the days to her surgery in November and seem more and more nervous each day!  To her students she is a ROCK...to her children, she is the WORLD!  Please support this project and spread the word!

Other Ways You Can Help

Your thoughts and well wishes are priceless!  There is so much healing power in a kind word, so if you can't contribute, send a message that we may pass on to her for encouragement!

story:
Jan Sullivan was our neighbor until last week when she had to move from her home due to great financial strain as a result of her wrongful termination after being shoved by an unruly customer on Black Friday.  Unfortunately we were not able to get the word out in time to help keep her in her home, but she desperately needs some help getting back on her feet.  We set up this fund in response to many requests from readers of the newspaper article written by John Woodrow Cox.  If you haven't already read the article, take time to read it now.  You'll be glad you did.

http://www.tampabay.com/features/humaninterest/article1237349.ece
