story:
Waking up tired, working all day and going to school all night, quality time with my daughter being our bus ride to school, as I rationalized that I was doing all of this, for us. 

This used to be my life. Misery. Stress.

Single moms are uber stressed in so many ways that I've adumbrated at KundaliniKreative.com. And this stress is literally toxic, causing heart disease, diabetes, high blood pressure, and so many other ailments. Even worse, the stress (and physical maladies) can often be felt by our children.

That was where I was, with a one year old daughter, stressed out and smoking a cigarette. I knew there had to be a better way!

YOGA literally saved my life.

Practicing in my bedroom after my daughter fell asleep, I'm empowered with yoga to make bold choices that lessen the stress and it's ill effects and the life of my daughter and me. Yoga has taught me how to be present and enjoy the moments I have with my daughter, the bearer of so much light.

How can we take a yoga class when this light is literally with us all the time?

Kundalini Kreative is my answer.

Kindalini Kreative will provide yoga classes targeted to single moms in Northern New Jersey, that provide simultaneous childcare.

Kundalini Kreative will also provide tools for practicing yoga, in a digital format.

The specific funds raised here are to invest in Kundalini Kreative through (1) Yoga Alliance Teacher Certification to lead single mother yoga classes, (2) complete legal incorporation of the entity as a non-profit organization in the state of New Jersey, and (3) the creation of our first ebook, Awakening the Gooddess Within: Yoga for Single Moms.

www.KundaliniKreative.com

story:
Help Me Make a Difference ...

When I lost my son to AIDS in 1994, it was a catalyst for me to make a positive difference in the world.  I founded RFHA (Rotarians for Family Health & AIDS Prevention, Inc.) and through amazing partnerships and contributions, we've been able to deliver free healthcare services to over 800,000 underserved citizens.  

Our program has been effective beyond my wildest dreams but there's more to do.  We have ambitious plans to broaden our reach and deliver healthcare screenings to 5 million people by 2020.  Given our trajectory of success and a solid network of volunteers and partners, this is an achievable goal.

How You Can Help

A little help from a lot of people will get us there.  Your $20 contribution will have an immediate and direct impact on our ability to bring positive change to thousands of lives.

The beneficiaries of these health screens are people who would otherwise fall through the cracks as they live in hard to reach dense urban slums or far out rural areas.  We screen for diseases such as HIV, TB, diabetes, cancer and more, as well as provide lifelong immunizations for the children.

A donation of $20.00 will cover one full round of tests and immunizations for each person in need.  Any support will be highly appreciated by our team and by the thousands whose lives you will help improve.

A Track Record of Success

Our model is proven.  We've built a coalition of partners including Centers for Disease Control, The Coca-Cola Africa Foundation, Delta Air Lines, FHI 360, Emory University School of Public Health, in-country Ministers of Health and others that have helped us lay a strong foundation to build this massive health campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

Your contribution is critical ... and so is sharing this with your friends, colleagues and others in your network.  Please send an email or share on Facebook and Twitter to help us make a difference in the lives of the underserved.

story:
-----


>> Hier klicken für DEUTSCHEN Text // Click here for text in GERMAN <<

Any questions? Feel free to contact us at +43 699 1 999 99 66 (standard mobile fees to Austria) or send us an e-mail!

Spread the word and get a FREE Locca Pack of your choice!
Click here to learn how!


Table of content:

1.What's Locca? 4.Locca app 7. What we have done
2.Fields of application 5.Coverage areas 8.Press/Team/FAQs
3.Key features 6.Perks and costs

Locca stands for the world’s smallest and most sophisticated tracking devices, which enables you to locate and communicate with everything and everyone that is equipped with this tiny device by using your smartphone/tablet (iOS/Android/Windows Phone) or web browser  -  internationally.

Locca can be used in many different fields. We did extensive market research and identified these 5 categories that matter most to many people.




When it comes to energy efficiency, Locca Locators are very intelligent, guaranteing a battery runtime of up to 1 month. So what’s our top secret to energy efficiency?  Thanks to our proprietary algorithm, Locca uses its advanced energy technology to offer exact locating and long battery runtime.

During the first roll-out phase we have special contracts with telecommunication operators of most European countries, USA and Canada. The Locca location service for those countries is included in every Locca Pack!
   
To use the Locca devices in other regions than Europe, USA and Canada, you can purchase our individual country packages. We are working on getting special contracts with more countries. The coverage of our Locca Packs will therefore increase throughout 2015 (details will follow as update on indiegogo, on our website and social media sites).

In 2014 and 2015, the Locca Packs cover the following countries:
Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Channel Islands, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Repulic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, French Guiana, Germany, Gibraltar, Greece, Guadeloupe, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Isle of Man, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Martinique, Monaco, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Réunion, Romania, Saint-Barthélemy, Saint-Martin (French part), San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, USA.


We created special packages for our indiegogo supporters, which include a LoccaMini or LoccaPhone device (depending on the pack), all accessories necessary for the specific field of application and the SIM card service fee for 6 months.

 
Click on the perk to proceed directly to the check-out:

All indiegogo perks include 6 months of service, i.e. we will charge you a monthly service fee only after the first 6 months of operation.
There are two different fees, depending on whether you have a pack including a LoccaMini or LoccaPhone. The costs for LoccaPhone are higher, since our service covers not only data but also voice traffic.

All supporters who want to buy more than 1 Locca Pack will get a special discount. The discount applies on your total monthly bill, no matter if you purchased only LoccaMinis, LoccaPhones or a combination of them.


You can easily pause the service with one click in the Locca app. You will not be charged when the service is on hold.

Locca subscription is pre-paid, there is no service contract, no hidden fees and you can cancel anytime.

All Locca devices have a built-in SIM card, similar to your mobile phone, because our world class location and communication services create data traffic (to use location service) for the LoccaMini and additional voice traffic (to make phone calls) for the LoccaPhone.

For this communication and locating service we have to charge you a small monthly fee.

The monthly fee is a flat rate service fee and includes unlimited locating service and up to 100 minutes of voice connection nationally. There are NO further roaming costs for data traffic!




For the last 2 years we have been working together with the best engineers, designers and software developers to create world class locators with an intuitive handling and that you can use for any field of application.

We have fully functional prototypes of the LoccaMini and the smartphone apps for iOS, Android and Windows Phone will be available in the App Store soon.


We are now ready for mass production of the LoccaMini (for pets, bike, stuff) and this requires us to raise money from the incredible IndieGoGo platform, which has helped many companies to successfully launch their products and services.

We need to raise a minimum of  €75,000 ($100,000) to manufacture the first production run of LoccaMini.

The LoccaPhone is not completely finished; as we focused our resources on LoccaMini during the last months, in order to quickly supply you with the first Locca products. Our engineers are currently working on the LoccaPhone prototype. 


Some of our media coverage:

  • Trendhunter (english)
  • Inventures (english)
  • Bild (german)
  • Welt (german)
  • Gründerszene (german)
  • Deutsche Startups (german)

Team (left to right): Julian Breitenecker, Felix Heuritsch, David Schalkhammer, Felix Kleinhenz, Albert Fellner

1.  Why is there a monthly fee? Other trackers offer a free service!
Many locating devices currently available on the market, are simple Bluetooth-trackers (work only within a 30-150 meters range) or pure GPS devices offering only medium accuracy.
 
The Locca locating devices combine the world’s best locating technologies that guarantees the most accurate positioning. Locca is more than just a passive GPS tracker. Locca communicates regularly with our server and thus creates data traffic. That is why we have to install a SIM-card. Similar to the operator of your smartphone, we need to charge you a small monthly fee to cover this service.
 
2.  How much does it cost to use Locca?
As indiegogo supporter, you have all service fees included for the first 6 months. After these first 6 months of operation, we will charge you a monthly service fee of € 9,90 for the LoccaMini (Stuff Pack, Pet Pack, Bike Pack) and € 14,90 for the LoccaPhone (Car Pack, Buddy Pack). The costs for LoccaPhone are higher, since our service covers not only data but also voice traffic.
 
3.  Where can I use the Locca devices?
During the first roll-out phase in 2014, we have special contracts with telecommunication operators of the following countries: Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Repulic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Mazedonia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, USA.
In 2014 we will add more countries to this list and will keep you posted regularly.
To use the Locca devices in other regions than Europe, USA and Canada, you can purchase our individual country packages (details will follow as update on indiegogo, on our website and social media sites).
 
4.  Can I order more than one tracker?
Yes, off course! If you are a company, individual or retailer and would like to purchase a minimum of 5+ devices, Please contact us to receive a special volume discount.
 
5.  When will you be shipping the devices?
We are still right in the middle of the testing phase and will soon be ready for mass production. We will ship the devices in 2015.

6. How much are the shipping costs?
Shipping to Germany, Austria and Switzerland is free. Please add €15 to the package price if you don’t live in Germany, Austria, or Switzerland.
When purchasing a Perk Tee or a Surprise package you don’t have to add any shipping costs!

7.  I don’t have a smartphone – can I still use Locca?
Yes! All features available in the Locca app are also available in the members area of our website. So Locca works perfectly on your laptop or desktop
 
8.  Can I use my own SIM-card?
No. When you get your Locca delivered, there is already a SIM card installed in the device. This special SIM card is necessary to offer you the worldwide connection.
 
9.  Does Locca work without mobile reception?
What works: Locca devices use 5 different locating technologies, therefore they can determine their exact position event without mobile reception (GSM)
What does not work: The locators need mobile reception to send the position data to the Locca server, i.e. without mobile reception you will not be able to see the locators’ position immediately. The position data will be saved on the device and will be transmitted to the server as soon as there is reception.

10. My question has not been answered!
We are looking forward to hearing from you!! Don't hesitate to send us a message in the updates section or contact us via email or just give us a call at +43 699 1 999 99 66.

Trendhunter (english)


Inventures (english)


Bild (german)


Welt (german)


Gründerszene (german)


Deutsche Startups (german)




Team (left to right): Julian Breitenecker, Felix Heuritsch, David Schalkhammer, Felix Kleinhenz, Albert Fellner
1.  Why is there a monthly fee? Other trackers offer a free service!Many locating devices currently available on the market, are simple Bluetooth-trackers (work only within a 30-150 meters range) or pure GPS devices offering only medium accuracy. The Locca locating devices combine the world’s best locating technologies that guarantees the most accurate positioning. Locca is more than just a passive GPS tracker. Locca communicates regularly with our server and thus creates data traffic. That is why we have to install a SIM-card. Similar to the operator of your smartphone, we need to charge you a small monthly fee to cover this service. 2.  How much does it cost to use Locca?As indiegogo supporter, you have all service fees included for the first 6 months. After these first 6 months of operation, we will charge you a monthly service fee of € 9,90 for the LoccaMini (Stuff Pack, Pet Pack, Bike Pack) and € 14,90 for the LoccaPhone (Car Pack, Buddy Pack). The costs for LoccaPhone are higher, since our service covers not only data but also voice traffic. 3.  Where can I use the Locca devices?During the first roll-out phase in 2014, we have special contracts with telecommunication operators of the following countries: Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Repulic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Mazedonia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, USA. In 2014 we will add more countries to this list and will keep you posted regularly. To use the Locca devices in other regions than Europe, USA and Canada, you can purchase our individual country packages (details will follow as update on indiegogo, on our website and social media sites). 4.  Can I order more than one tracker?Yes, off course! If you are a company, individual or retailer and would like to purchase a minimum of 5+ devices, Please contact us to receive a special volume discount. 5.  When will you be shipping the devices?We are still right in the middle of the testing phase and will soon be ready for mass production. We will ship the devices in 2015.6. How much are the shipping costs?Shipping to Germany, Austria and Switzerland is free. Please add €15 to the package price if you don’t live in Germany, Austria, or Switzerland. When purchasing a Perk Tee or a Surprise package you don’t have to add any shipping costs!7.  I don’t have a smartphone – can I still use Locca?Yes! All features available in the Locca app are also available in the members area of our website. So Locca works perfectly on your laptop or desktop 8.  Can I use my own SIM-card?No. When you get your Locca delivered, there is already a SIM card installed in the device. This special SIM card is necessary to offer you the worldwide connection. 9.  Does Locca work without mobile reception?What works: Locca devices use 5 different locating technologies, therefore they can determine their exact position event without mobile reception (GSM)What does not work: The locators need mobile reception to send the position data to the Locca server, i.e. without mobile reception you will not be able to see the locators’ position immediately. The position data will be saved on the device and will be transmitted to the server as soon as there is reception.10. My question has not been answered!We are looking forward to hearing from you!! Don't hesitate to send us a message in the updates section or contact us via email or just give us a call at +43 699 1 999 99 66.

story:
Thanks everyone for taking the time to look at this page! 

On April 6th 2014 I am running the Lincoln 10K in order to raise money for Camp Red Leaf (CRL). Anyone who knows me will be aware that I only started taking up running very recently and its not something that comes naturally to me!! However, I thought I would give it a go in order to raise money and awareness for something so special as CRL.

My Experience Working at CRL

In June 2012 having just finished my final year at University I flew across to the USA for the summer in order to work as a Camp Counsellor at Camp Red Leaf. Little did I know the impact it would have upon me and how it would make me appreciate the little things in life. For those of you who are not familiar with CRL it is a camp which has been set up to serve individuals ages 9 and upward with developmental disabilities, emotional and behavioural needs. 

During my time at camp I gained a lot of friendships with the campers and the staff. The staff work really hard to ensure that each and every camper has a great time during their stay and that they get involved with as many activities as possible. Activities include sports, drama, crafts and lots of swimming! 

I am raising money for CRL as I was hoping to return to work there this year but unfortunately due to work commitments I am unable to do so. Therefore I wanted to do as much as I could for the camp back home in the UK.

What We Need & What You Get

All I ask is for a small donation so that I can help raise awareness of Camp Red Leaf and raise money to see the camp continue for many years to come. All donations raised will be going to directly to Camp Red Leaf.

story:
We believe that having a support system is incredibly beneficial when it comes to health and fitness. In February 2013, the idea for an app that would provide a social network dedicated solely to health and fitness was born. World Fit was designed to not only provide this social aspect, but be the number one stop for the fitness minded. You can track your nutrition, share meal plans, and keep motivated.

Who are we? We are a trio of young adults that decided to team up to create an amazing health and fitness app. Our team is made up of fitness enthusiasts, business graduates, and technology lovers. We've put all our time, effort, and resources into this app. We hope to eventually reach millions of people and help them achieve their goals. We hope you help us get there.


What is World Fit?

World Fit is a fitness/calorie counter/social media app. The app offers three fitness plans: Fat Shredder, Toning, and Bulking.  Each plan will provide you with a suggested daily calorie intake as well as a protein, carbs, and fats ratio.

There are two social feeds on the app: FitShare which allows you to view posts of those you follow, and your plan feed. Its easy to share photos, advice, and the meals you eat with others.


Check out our walkthrough video to see the basic's of the World Fit app. 




What Users are Saying


Funding Breakdown

To get the app on the market, we had to sacrifice a lot. As it stands, the current version of the app is only about 60% of what it could be. With your help, we can reach the apps full potential.

The Bulk of our funding is needed for updates. There are a number of key features that we had to sacrifice to get the app onto the app store at all. Here's a breakdown of what we need.

  • $11,300: Priority Updates
  • $7,200: Server and maintenance Fees
With your help we can keep our app from being shut down and instead keep it growing. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? No problem! You can still help us out by spreading the word about our campaign. It's easy to share using the share tools located under our video at the top of the page. Know someone that would love World Fit? Let them know about our app through a tweet, message, email, or morse code; whatever works for you. We'll be eternally grateful!

Be sure to like us on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter!

story:
Welcome to Camp Lupine; the realization of a dream.

Here in historic Kingston, Ontario, Canada, we are surrounded by beautiful wilderness but there are surprisingly few programs for kids to get out into it, to have some fun and maybe get a little dirty! Combine this with the dreams of seasoned camp organiser, James Marrelli, and you get Camp Lupine: a good old-fashioned camp experience.

And now a word from our Pack Leader:

Hi there, I'm James, and I'd love to tell you a little bit about myself and Camp Lupine.

I have been working in recreation for over 15 years and I love it. Working in this setting has allowed me to combine my passion for recreation with my love of working with people; it has allowed me to help patrons in the pursuit of their interests and lead them to the discovery of new passions.  Now I want to seize the opportunity to pursue my own passion and build something I can be proud of.

What will my donation help you to achieve?

This campaign will help Camp Lupine become reality. It has been a dream of mine for many years to open my own camp. I want to build a place where kids can come have fun, feel safe and secure, and be willing to try new challenges. Your contributions will help start up a camp that will be able to accommodate a wide range of children and youth.  All kids will be welcome; Camp Lupine will offer staff to assist children with special needs, and we will work with lower income families to ensure their children can attend the camp and/or after school program. 


What will Camp Lupine be, exactly?

The camp will offer an affordable, structured children (7-12 years) and youth (13-16 years) after-school program as well as Winter-Break, March-Break and Summer Camps.

The After-School Program will run Monday to Friday, 3:30 PM to 7 PM, and will include: help with homework for all age groups, indoor and outdoor activities such as swimming, basketball, skating, field trips, nature hikes, arts and crafts, board games, monitored computer/internet access and movie nights. 

For the youth, there will also be resume, job search and interview preparation help available.  

The Winter-Break, March-Break and Summer Camps will run Monday to Friday,       9 AM to 4 PM, during the traditional school break periods, and will have extended hours available if needed. There will be a Leader-in-Training course available for youth that will allow them to build leadership skills, as well as gain some confidence and experience that can be applied in the work force. 

We will be starting out on a small scale, at a rented space within Kingston, but our five year goal is to have an out-in-the-woods, sleeping in cabins and singing around the campfire type of operation.



How much do you need?

I am looking for $10,000 in funding.  Money raised will go towards start-up costs such as rent and staff salaries for the first few months, as well as essentials like craft supplies, sports equipment and shirts for the campers. It will also help purchase board games, couches and a ping-pong table for the youth lounge and computers for the youth mentor-ship arm of our program.


Once the camp is up and running, we will re-donate the money raised to the registered charity Kids in Camp, an organization that gives low-income kids the chance to go to camp, so your donation will go twice as far! 

http://www.kidsincamp.com/


So that’s it?

In a nutshell. Organizing and running camps, seeing kids having fun and learning new skills has been my biggest joy in all the years of working in the field of recreation.  I have had the privilege of working as a camp counselor, head counselor, program leader and camp director. I know my stuff and I want to build something great!  If you can't donate, please help by spreading the word any way you can.

“A little nonsense now and then is cherished by the wisest people.”
― Roald Dahl, Charlie and the Great Glass Elevator

story:
“This is a good piece of gear, couple weeks in sleep quality has increased (SWS 30% improved, REM 40% improved. I monitor sleep with a WHOOP). Sleep is now fantastic. Consistently waking up at my desired 5:30 am time without an alarm feeling rested. Daily energy is fantastic and overall mood is greatly improved. I would highly recommend this product.” 
Charles Bilbo, US

   

"I started using it immediately and I use the Energy program every morning. This is the fastest I’ve ever overcome jet lag. So thank you for an excellent product." 
Danny Collins, US

 ​

"AYO is well built. Very impressed and worth the wait. I use it as soon as I wake up. It's great because I don't need an energy drink after wearing the device." 
Dionisio Morales III, US

 ​

"I usually use AYO during a day when I need to boost my energy level. So far, they’ve never let me down. They are just amazing!" 
Nejc Slovnik, Slovenia

 ​

"Every aspect of AYO, from the bottom-up, is seen as it was deeply thought about, designed, manufactured and delivered in the BEST possible way!"
Gal Schneor, Israel

 ​

​"The best about AYO is its immediate effect! I usually arrive around 10 pm after an 8-hour long-haul flight. AYO helps me get the sleep I need to kick start the day and "wow" my clients." 
Stoyan Petrov, UK

and many more...




The most innovative product to be sold on-board by Travel Blue and the Global Shopping Forum! AYO was internationally recognized by key influencers in the Travel Retail industry as a top innovation for solving the problem of jet lag.

 

With AYO you are three simple steps away from more energy, better sleep, and less jet lag.


AYO is simple to set up and use - after creating a user profile in the AYO app based on your sleep habits and lifestyle preferences, our sophisticated algorithms perform an in-depth analysis calculating critical points for your sleep/wake routine and activity levels.

By wearing AYO in as little as 20 minutes a day, the clinically-backed AYO light can help you wake up easier while feeling more energized as well as alleviate jet lag or make you more active in the dark and evening hours, depending on the program you choose.

Due to the innovative and user-friendly design, you can use AYO while brushing your teeth, making breakfast, watching TV, reading the newspaper, checking your emails, etc. - it does not distract your eyesight in any way.

Most of our customers experience positive effects of AYO immediately or shortly after a session and are able reach their goals in three to seven days.

Learn more about AYO and how it works on the video below! 

 

 

Do you keep snoozing the alarm? AYO can help you wake up naturally with a smile on your face. 

AYO sets your “biological alarm clock” so your body is "fully charged" at the start of a new day. AYO optimizes and adjusts your melatonin onset and offset to help you experience newfound energy and a natural & easy wake-up routine. 

AYO accomplishes this by finding out what your chronotype is (whether you are a morning person or an evening person) and helps you shift your body rhythm in the desired direction. 

Forget about pesky alarms, snoozing or tumbling in bed. AYO helps you actively optimize your sleep quality and habits. 

Find and set your natural sleep rhythm for brilliant, energizing sleep and a healthier, more productive time awake with AYO!

 

 

Traveling across 3 or more time zones? Then you are going to be jet lagged! As little as twenty minutes of “AYO” per day can help it go away!

Long-haul jet flights create jet lag: Tiredness and disorientation sometimes lasting for days after the flight, interfering with vacations or business trips.  

AYO helps our customers who are long-haul travelers adapt better to a new time zone by assessing their flight itinerary and sleep habits, and then providing guidance on the AYO usage.

On each trip, AYO customizes your AYO-wearing schedule, telling you when to wear the glasses to best adjust your internal body clock to the new time zone.  

No more sleepless nights, dozing off in meetings, stress or other jet lag symptoms. 

AYO is the long-distance traveler’s best friend and the technology behind AYO has been shown to help the long-distance travelers adapt to a new time zone 60% faster than usual. 

            

 

 

Forget the “power nap.” Take a 20-minute “power boost” instead!  

AYO boosts your energy and attention levels, enabling you to become more focused, rested and active. The unique blue light gently delivered by AYO to your eyes mimics the natural light of a sunny summer’s day, delivering extra bolts of energy along the way.  

When your energy dips anytime during the day or the night or winter season, take an “energy boost” with AYO.  For most, it’s a mood enhancer too!

 

AYO's proprietary technology is based on 20 years of Chronobiology research in leading universities around the world, including Harvard and Oxford.  

Chronobiology is the study of everyday human activities and bodily processes such as hormone release, metabolic changes, cardiovascular activity and other processes, related to the natural body rhythm.

The AYO light gently enters your eyes, just like sunlight, and triggers retinal ganglion cells that send signals to your brain. AYO can tell your brain to “turn on” or “turn off,” no matter what the wall clock or your body clock says about the hour, the day or the time zone.

The signals from AYO can order your brain to, among other things, suppress its melatonin release, the hormone that makes you sleepy. The result: you’re rapidly more awake and energized, wherever in the world you may be! 

To learn more about the science behind AYO, be sure to check out the video below and visit our science page:

http://goayo.com/how.html

 


 

AYO glasses are slim and minimalistic but also house a smart device that delivers insights you can use to enhance your energy and help you set your natural rhythm. 

Our easy-to-follow suggestions and simple steps help analyze your activity patterns and progress, enabling AYO to learn from your behavior, so each time you use AYO, the results progressively improve. 

Start with your current sleep and body rhythm. Adjust it to match your lifestyle. Then you’ll see the improvement you’re making with AYO.  The system makes things easy. It’s like having an “optimize” button for your brain!

AYO integrates sophisticated proprietary technology in circadian lighting into a wearable wellbeing tech, bundled in one great product with numerous amazing features!


 

 

 

 


What happens when you put a visionary and a technology aficionado – Branislav, together with a fitness and nature enthusiast – Aleksandar? Both of them are frequent flyers and go-getters who ended up in the Netherlands during a dark and gloomy winter, doing their Master's program of Entrepreneurship.  

The result was an outrageous and amazing idea: a breakthrough innovation that would boost their energy, help them wake up naturally in the morning and travel the world without jet lag! 

Add to the mix one brilliant and experienced technology wiz – Nikola, supplement it all with the incredible support from leading experts and scientists in the field of Chronobiology and many awesomely passionate team members from various backgrounds.

Expose this community to major entrepreneurial mentors from the Netherlands, the European Institute of Innovation and Technology, Kairos Society and Bob Dorf. Introduce them to the President of Philips Mr. Frans van Houten, Director of Innovation at KLM Mr. Rogier van Beugen, Dutch Prime minister Mr. Mark Rutte, Prince Constantijn of the Netherlands, Sonny Vu from MisFit wearables, World Tennis Player No.1 Novak Djokovic, Sir Richard Branson and many more game changers. 

Award them with cool international honors and provide them with guidance. Partner them up with a credible and experienced German product development and production company, and you will end up with AYO – a next generation visionary wearable.

AYO is the result of three years of development and wonderful support of experts and enthusiasts. We are very grateful that we managed to come this far and hope that with your help we can finish what we started and let you enjoy AYO in no time!

When we designed AYO, we put special attention to all the details. We are proud to say that we have spent thousands of hours on iterations and improvements that makes AYO an amazing device!

In the last 3 years, we have gone through numerous prototype versions of AYO. AYO's smart algorithm has been developed with close attention to in-depth knowledge of Chronobiology and light treatment, and we are especially pleased of its ability to make custom programs for each individual user, as well as being able to adapt over time and get better with continued usage.

We are already in production and have delivered the orders to the majority of our loyal backers! The remaining orders as well as the future ones are being delivered in May 2017. We are currently in the process of finalizing the deliveries to the rest of our backers and at the same time, we are warmly welcoming the invaluable feedback from our current users and customers who help us make AYO better and more awesome! 

 

                                                             

 

                                                   Aleksandar Dimitrov

                                   Co-Founder and Chief Marketing Officer

Energetic go-getter, with undying passion for entrepreneurship and getting things done. Aleksandar is also an avid rock climber, marathon runner and a nature enthusiast.

He is responsible for setting up the marketing strategy, external communication and business contacts.

                                                           

                                                     Branislav Nikolic 

                                  Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer

Creative problem solver and visionary with unchained passion for innovation. Branislav is also a new technologies aficionado, passionate traveler and an extreme sports fan.

He is responsible for the overall company vision, management and product direction.

                                                         

                                                      Nikola Vucinic 

                                 Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer 

Unstoppable tech wiz with a brilliant mind for complex problems. Nikola is also a former professional football player. 

He is responsible for the technical development and research.

                                                         

                                                  Milan Scepanovic 

                                             Chief Financial Officer

Faultless, analytical and financially savvy professional with double Masters’ degree in Finance and Accounting. Passionate swimmer.

                                                        

                                             Pelagiya Dragomirova

                                          Communications Advisor

Passionate and enthusiastic communications expert, responsible for communication strategy and approach. Keen yoga devotee.

                                                        

                                                    Petko Mishev

                                              UX/Visual Designer

 

True to the rules of design as a craft and inspired by bright new technologies. Passionate and opinionated, believes that justified design creates value for business. With a healthy appetite for bold adventures, strong coffee and basketball.

 

            

       

FIRST STRETCH GOAL of $ 100,000 COMPLETED - ChronoJump app feature will be included!

Our first stretch goal is reached! And ChronoJump app feature is now a fact. This smart addition to our AYO app can help you achieve a custom and fast temporary internal rhythm shift or make sure you are at your peak at the specific moment in time. For instance, you want to catch a live TV broadcast in the middle of the night or be at your top performance for a specific sport activity, etc. Basically by syncing your circadian rhythm you are jumping in the desired state for a day!

SURPRISE STRECH GOAL - Unlocked as a special Christmas gift - AYO wireless charging 

Our next generation wearable shouldn’t be hold back with messy wires and missing cables. Some of you have addressed those concerns and voiced the power-dock idea. Therefore, we have decided to give you all a special Christmas gift - wireless charging of AYO through the AYO case! The micro USB charging will be replaced and a wireless charging feature will be introduced instead! Charging wirelessly will make your Ayo more durable and much easier to use. 

SPECIAL GIFT - Hard Carry Case part of the standard AYO package

Our initial idea was to create a special hard carry case as part of our Stretch goals. 

During our user tests and following your comments we realized that a great carry case is essential and it should be an integral part of your AYO experience. With a thorough deliberation we decided to have a special carry case as a part of the standard AYO package – this means no extra cost for the backers and this feature is already unlocked! 

$200,000 STRETCH GOAL ACHIEVED - A power bank battery will be integrated in the already promised AYO hard carry case. That means you will be able to charge your AYO on the go! 

Have a look at it in the Gallery. 

                         

                             

Usage

When do I need to wear AYO?

AYO App will provide you with the specific time of usage that in most situations correspond to your mornings or evenings, depending on the program you have chosen.

Do I need to wear AYO with opened or closed eyes?

Use AYO with your eyes open and it will not interfere with your vision. Using AYO with open eyes  is completely safe.

How long do I need to wear AYO in order to feel an effect? 

It depends on the program you select and your desired effect. In case of the Energy program, you can start feeling the effect of AYO in as little as 20 minutes of usage.

Safety and the science behind AYO

How does it actually work? 

AYO uses sophisticated light treatment to optimize your master body clock based on an in-depth knowledge of Chronobiology. For more information please have a look at: http://goayo.com/benefits.html

Is it safe for the eyes? 

Yes, AYO is considered to be very safe for your eyes. Actually, it is safer than the light you get from the Sun everyday, as it does not use any of the harmful UV or Infrared lights.

Furthermore, AYO has been certified for photo biological safety by an international regulatory body.  

What are the clinical proofs behind the technology used in AYO?

AYO technology is based on proven and tested light treatment solutions and industry standards. Furthermore, we are in the process of conducting exciting clinical trials with AYO! 

General 

How long will it take until I notice the effect on my wellbeing?  

It usually takes around 3 to 7 days to feel the positive effects of AYO. However, some short-term effects can sometimes be felt right after the usage.

I have heard of light treatment before. How is AYO different? 

AYO innovates light treatment in a few key areas. AYO is the most sophisticated light treatment solution: it provides a personalized approach that is crucial for the efficiency. It is easy to use thanks to the AYO app and it minimizes glare while maintaining effectiveness. Last but not least, it’s packed with amazing features, never seen before in a light treatment solution.

What system will the AYO App support?

AYO App is available for downloading both on the App Store and Google Play. 

Product development and delivery

When will I get my AYO? 

 A good part of the AYOs to all our backers have already been delivered successfully. We are planning to finalize the deliveries to the rest of our current and new backers later this month and next month.  

What materials are the glasses made of? 

The AYO glasses are made of high-quality plastic materials.

Can I get it in different colors/materials? 

We currently plan to have AYO in one color pattern: white-blue.

Press & Media

We would love to talk to you or help in any way we can. For any inquiries, please contact Aleksandar Dimitrov at press@goayo.com

Additional Information?

In case you would like to learn more about AYO, feel free to reach out to us at support@goayo.com or explore our Help Center.
story_txt:
“This is a good piece of gear, couple weeks in sleep quality has increased (SWS 30% improved, REM 40% improved. I monitor sleep with a WHOOP). Sleep is now fantastic. Consistently waking up at my desired 5:30 am time without an alarm feeling rested. Daily energy is fantastic and overall mood is greatly improved. I would highly recommend this product.” Charles Bilbo, US   "I started using it immediately and I use the Energy program every morning. This is the fastest I’ve ever overcome jet lag. So thank you for an excellent product." Danny Collins, US ​"AYO is well built. Very impressed and worth the wait. I use it as soon as I wake up. It's great because I don't need an energy drink after wearing the device." Dionisio Morales III, US ​"I usually use AYO during a day when I need to boost my energy level. So far, they’ve never let me down. They are just amazing!" Nejc Slovnik, Slovenia ​"Every aspect of AYO, from the bottom-up, is seen as it was deeply thought about, designed, manufactured and delivered in the BEST possible way!" Gal Schneor, Israel ​​"The best about AYO is its immediate effect! I usually arrive around 10 pm after an 8-hour long-haul flight. AYO helps me get the sleep I need to kick start the day and "wow" my clients." Stoyan Petrov, UKand many more...The most innovative product to be sold on-board by Travel Blue and the Global Shopping Forum! AYO was internationally recognized by key influencers in the Travel Retail industry as a top innovation for solving the problem of jet lag. 



With AYO you are three simple steps away from more energy, better sleep, and less jet lag.


AYO is simple to set up and use - after creating a user profile in the AYO app based on your sleep habits and lifestyle preferences, our sophisticated algorithms perform an in-depth analysis calculating critical points for your sleep/wake routine and activity levels.
By wearing AYO in as little as 20 minutes a day, the clinically-backed AYO light can help you wake up easier while feeling more energized as well as alleviate jet lag or make you more active in the dark and evening hours, depending on the program you choose.
Due to the innovative and user-friendly design, you can use AYO while brushing your teeth, making breakfast, watching TV, reading the newspaper, checking your emails, etc. - it does not distract your eyesight in any way.
Most of our customers experience positive effects of AYO immediately or shortly after a session and are able reach their goals in three to seven days.Learn more about AYO and how it works on the video below! 
 

 
Do you keep snoozing the alarm? AYO can help you wake up naturally with a smile on your face. 
AYO sets your “biological alarm clock” so your body is "fully charged" at the start of a new day. AYO optimizes and adjusts your melatonin onset and offset to help you experience newfound energy and a natural & easy wake-up routine. 
AYO accomplishes this by finding out what your chronotype is (whether you are a morning person or an evening person) and helps you shift your body rhythm in the desired direction. 
Forget about pesky alarms, snoozing or tumbling in bed. AYO helps you actively optimize your sleep quality and habits. 
Find and set your natural sleep rhythm for brilliant, energizing sleep and a healthier, more productive time awake with AYO!
 

 
Traveling across 3 or more time zones? Then you are going to be jet lagged! As little as twenty minutes of “AYO” per day can help it go away!
Long-haul jet flights create jet lag: Tiredness and disorientation sometimes lasting for days after the flight, interfering with vacations or business trips.  
AYO helps our customers who are long-haul travelers adapt better to a new time zone by assessing their flight itinerary and sleep habits, and then providing guidance on the AYO usage.
On each trip, AYO customizes your AYO-wearing schedule, telling you when to wear the glasses to best adjust your internal body clock to the new time zone.  
No more sleepless nights, dozing off in meetings, stress or other jet lag symptoms. 
AYO is the long-distance traveler’s best friend and the technology behind AYO has been shown to help the long-distance travelers adapt to a new time zone 60% faster than usual. 
            
 

 
Forget the “power nap.” Take a 20-minute “power boost” instead!  
AYO boosts your energy and attention levels, enabling you to become more focused, rested and active. The unique blue light gently delivered by AYO to your eyes mimics the natural light of a sunny summer’s day, delivering extra bolts of energy along the way.  
When your energy dips anytime during the day or the night or winter season, take an “energy boost” with AYO.  For most, it’s a mood enhancer too!
 

AYO's proprietary technology is based on 20 years of Chronobiology research in leading universities around the world, including Harvard and Oxford.  
Chronobiology is the study of everyday human activities and bodily processes such as hormone release, metabolic changes, cardiovascular activity and other processes, related to the natural body rhythm.
The AYO light gently enters your eyes, just like sunlight, and triggers retinal ganglion cells that send signals to your brain. AYO can tell your brain to “turn on” or “turn off,” no matter what the wall clock or your body clock says about the hour, the day or the time zone.
The signals from AYO can order your brain to, among other things, suppress its melatonin release, the hormone that makes you sleepy. The result: you’re rapidly more awake and energized, wherever in the world you may be! 
To learn more about the science behind AYO, be sure to check out the video below and visit our science page:
http://goayo.com/how.html


 
 

AYO glasses are slim and minimalistic but also house a smart device that delivers insights you can use to enhance your energy and help you set your natural rhythm. 
Our easy-to-follow suggestions and simple steps help analyze your activity patterns and progress, enabling AYO to learn from your behavior, so each time you use AYO, the results progressively improve. 
Start with your current sleep and body rhythm. Adjust it to match your lifestyle. Then you’ll see the improvement you’re making with AYO.  The system makes things easy. It’s like having an “optimize” button for your brain!
AYO integrates sophisticated proprietary technology in circadian lighting into a wearable wellbeing tech, bundled in one great product with numerous amazing features! 
 

  



What happens when you put a visionary and a technology aficionado – Branislav, together with a fitness and nature enthusiast – Aleksandar? Both of them are frequent flyers and go-getters who ended up in the Netherlands during a dark and gloomy winter, doing their Master's program of Entrepreneurship.  
The result was an outrageous and amazing idea: a breakthrough innovation that would boost their energy, help them wake up naturally in the morning and travel the world without jet lag! 
Add to the mix one brilliant and experienced technology wiz – Nikola, supplement it all with the incredible support from leading experts and scientists in the field of Chronobiology and many awesomely passionate team members from various backgrounds.
Expose this community to major entrepreneurial mentors from the Netherlands, the European Institute of Innovation and Technology, Kairos Society and Bob Dorf. Introduce them to the President of Philips Mr. Frans van Houten, Director of Innovation at KLM Mr. Rogier van Beugen, Dutch Prime minister Mr. Mark Rutte, Prince Constantijn of the Netherlands, Sonny Vu from MisFit wearables, World Tennis Player No.1 Novak Djokovic, Sir Richard Branson and many more game changers. 
Award them with cool international honors and provide them with guidance. Partner them up with a credible and experienced German product development and production company, and you will end up with AYO – a next generation visionary wearable.
AYO is the result of three years of development and wonderful support of experts and enthusiasts. We are very grateful that we managed to come this far and hope that with your help we can finish what we started and let you enjoy AYO in no time!


When we designed AYO, we put special attention to all the details. We are proud to say that we have spent thousands of hours on iterations and improvements that makes AYO an amazing device!
In the last 3 years, we have gone through numerous prototype versions of AYO. AYO's smart algorithm has been developed with close attention to in-depth knowledge of Chronobiology and light treatment, and we are especially pleased of its ability to make custom programs for each individual user, as well as being able to adapt over time and get better with continued usage.
We are already in production and have delivered the orders to the majority of our loyal backers! The remaining orders as well as the future ones are being delivered in May 2017. We are currently in the process of finalizing the deliveries to the rest of our backers and at the same time, we are warmly welcoming the invaluable feedback from our current users and customers who help us make AYO better and more awesome! 


 
                                                             
 
                                                   Aleksandar Dimitrov
                                   Co-Founder and Chief Marketing Officer
Energetic go-getter, with undying passion for entrepreneurship and getting things done. Aleksandar is also an avid rock climber, marathon runner and a nature enthusiast.
He is responsible for setting up the marketing strategy, external communication and business contacts.                                                                                                                Branislav Nikolic 
                                  Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer
Creative problem solver and visionary with unchained passion for innovation. Branislav is also a new technologies aficionado, passionate traveler and an extreme sports fan.
He is responsible for the overall company vision, management and product direction.                                                                                                               Nikola Vucinic 
                                 Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer 
Unstoppable tech wiz with a brilliant mind for complex problems. Nikola is also a former professional football player. 
He is responsible for the technical development and research.
                                                         
                                                  Milan Scepanovic 
                                             Chief Financial Officer
Faultless, analytical and financially savvy professional with double Masters’ degree in Finance and Accounting. Passionate swimmer.                                                                                                     Pelagiya Dragomirova
                                          Communications Advisor
Passionate and enthusiastic communications expert, responsible for communication strategy and approach. Keen yoga devotee.                                                                                                            Petko Mishev
                                              UX/Visual Designer
 
True to the rules of design as a craft and inspired by bright new technologies. Passionate and opinionated, believes that justified design creates value for business. With a healthy appetite for bold adventures, strong coffee and basketball.
 

            
       FIRST STRETCH GOAL of $ 100,000 COMPLETED - ChronoJump app feature will be included!Our first stretch goal is reached! And ChronoJump app feature is now a fact. This smart addition to our AYO app can help you achieve a custom and fast temporary internal rhythm shift or make sure you are at your peak at the specific moment in time. For instance, you want to catch a live TV broadcast in the middle of the night or be at your top performance for a specific sport activity, etc. Basically by syncing your circadian rhythm you are jumping in the desired state for a day!
SURPRISE STRECH GOAL - Unlocked as a special Christmas gift - AYO wireless charging 
Our next generation wearable shouldn’t be hold back with messy wires and missing cables. Some of you have addressed those concerns and voiced the power-dock idea. Therefore, we have decided to give you all a special Christmas gift - wireless charging of AYO through the AYO case! The micro USB charging will be replaced and a wireless charging feature will be introduced instead! Charging wirelessly will make your Ayo more durable and much easier to use. 
SPECIAL GIFT - Hard Carry Case part of the standard AYO package
Our initial idea was to create a special hard carry case as part of our Stretch goals. 
During our user tests and following your comments we realized that a great carry case is essential and it should be an integral part of your AYO experience. With a thorough deliberation we decided to have a special carry case as a part of the standard AYO package – this means no extra cost for the backers and this feature is already unlocked!

story:
(Waxing + Fitness ) 

 Hi my name is Kelly. I have had a successful waxing business in Folsom for the last 5 years specializing in brazilian wax. I have an amazing new vision and it's time to bring it home! We have lived in Rancho Cordova for almost two years and I have quickly realized the local area needs a fun new business. Opening a beautiful studio on Sunrise Blvd will bring two of my favorite passions together, Waxing + Fitness!

On Point Body will provide premium body waxing as well as unique group fitness classes. Classes will include two of the hottest new workouts, SURFSET Fitness and Barre. We also plan to offer fun fitness classes for kids! It's my dream to create a community of people who want to live healthy and confident lives. I know On Point Body will be that place.

Child care. YAY!!! As a mother of a sweet 2 year old boy, I know the difficulty that comes with going to a place where you can invest in yourself. That's why On Point Body will offer free, fun child care during select times. That way you can pop in and take advantage of either service with convenience and peace of mind. Child care will be just one of the amazing perks you will receive when coming to On Point Body.

Time Line

Rancho Cordova needs a go-to place for premium waxing and drop in fitness that provides a fresh new spin on exercise (plus has awesome child care!) Let's work together and get this amazing new spot open soon. 

We plan to get the keys to our new building in early March. After spending a little time getting it beautiful and ready, we intend to open our doors to all of you wonderful people in late April 2016. That is just right around the corner and the perfect time to get your body on point for the summer.

What's in store!

SURFSET Fitness classes-SURFSET is all about getting away from the traditional static workout and challenging your body in new ways. Every exercise on the board is designed to engage your core & stabilizer muscles and shock the system to create real change inside & out. SURFSET is super fun and something that this area has not yet experienced. SURFSET is designed to combine the benefits of cardio training, strength training & balance training into one workout. This means improved aerobic conditioning, lean muscle build, increased core strength, agility, power, stability, flexibility & balance.

Barre Fitness classes-  Barre is a complete body workout fusing ballet barre conditioning, pilates and yoga. You will feel every muscle worked in a 50 minute tone and lifting workout. Creating long lean muscles with low impact moves to help you feel and look On Point! (no dance experience necessary) Set to upbeat music and fun moves you will love coming to barre class.

Waxing- Premium high quality full body waxing (excluding male bikini- sorry gents) by our experienced wax specialists. Waxing is great for people who want to remove hair without the hassle of shaving or tweezing. Once the hair is removed with our high quality wax it takes 2-4 weeks to see new growth, and the hair returns softer and thinner.  Always be beach ready with On Point Body's wax services.

These amazing services will get your body on point.  

Where your funding will go. 

This amazing new studio will feature-

  • Its own 1100sf fitness studio 
  • 2 Beautiful waxing rooms
  • Refreshment bar (coffee, tea,  and flavored water)
  • Fun child care area-for the littles in your life
  • Comfortable seating and beautiful lobby area
 We have found the perfect spot on Sunrise in the Sun Rock Center near Costco, but we need your help to bring it to life. It will cost $ 20,000 to create the look and feel that everyone will love. 
  • New flooring and baseboards all around $4000
  • A fresh new coat of paint $1000
  • Wall mirrors, lighting, storage, and sound system for the studio $3000
  • 10 Awesome RSX surfboards for our SURFSET classes, Barre equipment setup,  fitness mats, weights and exercise balls $6000
  • Wax room supplies (beds, counters, wax pots, trashcans, and wall decor) $2000
  • Inviting fun play area for kids. (play kitchen, toys, table, and teepee,) $1000
  • Beautiful new sign on the building. $1000
  • Decorations, lighting, seating, and front desk. $2000
We want this place to feel amazing the second you walk in the door. The building is picked and we just need the funds to make the full vision come to life.

By pre-purchasing your fitness classes, waxing, and gear, you are guaranteeing this awesome new business will be open soon (late April). You will receive great discounts on our amazing services, Alo Leggings (featured by me in the video) and be the first to come and experience On Point Body!

Great for Kids!
By offering kids classes in a group fitness setting on the SURFSET Boards, we are teaching kids at a young age the benefits of being active and staying healthy. With obesity on the rise in children it's our job to show them the way to take care of their bodies. At On Point Body our focus will be to educate and have fun, which is something I know parents will get behind. We plan to offer 2 classes a week for kids.
Great for the community!
Our local area truly needs a business like this. I know this studio will build relationships, have a community feel, and be a comfortable place to re-energize your body and mind. Upbeat music and a clean stylish atmosphere will make this spot a place everyone will want to come and experience.
Your support is going to make my dream of helping people feel and look their best come to life!
Other Ways You Can Help 

 You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please help spread the word to all of your friends, family, and neighbors.

  • Share our campaign on your social media
  • Email it to your contacts.
  • Talk to your friends and neighbors     
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! (easiest way to get the word out)

Thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign, we hope to see you at On Point Body soon.

Email it to your contacts.
Talk to your friends and neighbors     
Use the Indiegogo share tools! (easiest way to get the word out)   Thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign, we hope to see you at On Point Body soon.

story:
Finally! 

Vapor Soothers® give you discreet, drug-free, long-lasting nasal congestion relief. How? by delivering a steady stream of soothing, scented vapors to your nasal passages. You can’t see ‘em, can’t feel ‘em, and each clip lasts 12 hours at a time. You just read that again, didn't you? Don’t worry, you read right. Vapor Soothers will change the way you breathe. Read on, friend.

      

Using patented technology, Vapor Soothers deliver a gentle, consistent flow of mentholated vapors to soothe the nasal passages while the clip gently presses on the columella (that's the middle bit in your nose that divides between the nostrils), increasing airflow to your nose to provide comfortable, effective relief from nasal congestion.

 

 

Did you know that the main reason for congestion is not mucus, but rather inflammation of the sinuses? The inflammation constricts airways and makes it more difficult to breathe easy.

 

 

With Vapor Soothers, soothing mentholated vapors provide fast relief from nasal congestion by delivering a consistent flow of therapeutic vapors from essential oils to the cavities of your sinuses. This provides a pleasant, cooling sensation, helps to reduce inflammation and allows your sinuses to clear themselves way more easily!

 

 

It's simple, it's quick, it's easy, and it's super-comfortable.

 

 

It's not just a fancy word. Essential oils are renowned for their therapeutic properties, and hailed around the world for their mood-tweaking effect. So apart from relieving your nasal congestion, you can maximize your pleasure and pick and choose your Vapor Soothers scent to suit your needs!

 

Vapor Soothers are so discreet and comfortable, you can wear them anywhere! Whether your lounging about at home or hard at work in the office, just inhale and FEEL THE VAPORS!

 

So now, I bet you're wondering, can Vapor Soothers be worn at PLAY, while being active and participating in your favorite SPORT...

Uhmm, click the video below and you tell us ;)....

 

 

We found a simple and genius way of making Vapor Soothers stay fresh and be easy to use at the same time: Blister packaging! Just pop one out of the package and straight into your nose. Each clip will stay fresh and keep its potency for the maximum time until you decide to use it.

 

Oh, did we mention Vapor Soothers has a THREE YEAR SHELF LIFE? Not that we think it'll sit in your bathroom cabinet that long, but hey, it's nice to know that you can stock up, right?

 

What? Vapor Soothers can help snoring as well? You guessed it! The same benefits that relieve congestion caused by colds, flu, and allergies are also perfect for that nighttime snore! Lavender is clinically proven to promote healthy sleep and reduce stress and anxiety. Exactly what you need when you hit that pillow...

 

 

 

The environment is just as important as our noses (maybe even more...?) So we made sure Vapor Soothers are made from 100% recyclable materials. Also, all essential oils are 100% organic. No preservatives, drugs, or any other kind of unnatural materials were used in the process of creating Vapor Soothers. And best of all, no furry friends were harmed either!

 

 

We sneeze and itch and suffer from allergies because the sensitive lining of our noses and sinuses are irritated by free-floating allergens that come from our animal and plant environment. Vapor Soothers help soothe those sensitive linings from the inside and allow you to pet your best friends and sniff those flowers happily.Your pets will thank you for not sneezing on them!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our first Indiegogo campaign, but we are not novices at product launches. We have been designing and manufacturing innovative products for years. Fortunately, we have been working on refining the production process for months, and are actually ready for production.

We are ready to roll! We have reliable factory partners and material suppliers that are as excited as we are to get you Vapor Soothers. If any issues come up we promise to be transparent and keep you updated as we find solutions.

We plan to ship worldwide. We sincerely appreciate you backing our campaign and we will do everything we can to get you your order on or before our deadline.

story:
LIGHT - Social Highlighting

My name is Steve Scott. I am the founder of LIGHT and Carbogenetics

Currently there are many users of LIGHT and a lot of people find it beneficial. LIGHT is a social search engine designed to allow people to find the best parts of the internet. The focus on this project is to make this tool into a premiere research tool for health and wellness. And also to introduce the social aspect which really gives the tool it's power. Collectively finding the best research and organizing it to make it much more useful and easy to find.

Here is how the LIGHT search engine currently works

 

 

Funding Level 1: Convert Ray Peat Newsletters to Digital (Total Backed: $2,000)

There is approximately 35 years of newsletters which have not been put in digital format. Each newsletter is on average 6 pages. It is estimated to about around 1,200 pages. So we will convert each newsletter to text and triple check the content. Each newsletter will be delivered back to Ray Peat in HTML and PDF format. Also each article will be indexed into the LIGHT search engine. Dr Ray Peat will be sending me the newsletters.

Funding Level 2: Bud Weiss Interviews with Ray Peat (Total Backed: $7,000)

Over many years Bud Weiss has conducted approximately 40 hours of interviews with Ray Peat. Once he is done editing them he will post on Youtube and send to me for transcribing. Each word will be time-stamped and indexed to the search engine to find easily.

These interviews are chock full of great information about CO2 and other health related information that have not been made public before.

Funding Level 3: Generative Energy Podcasts by Danny Roddy (Total Backed: $10,000)

There are approximately 31 hours of podcast material which will be transcribed, triple checked, and time-stamped. It will then be indexed to the LIGHT search engine to make it easy to find. 

These interviews are a great source of health and physiological information including interviews with Ray Peat, Georgi, Karen Mcc and more.  

Funding Level 4: Giving Back to Ray Peat (Total Backed: $12,000)

For all the work Dr Peat has done and the graciousness in which he makes his work available to everyone, I want to give back to him. We will give him a CO2 Breathing Machine, CO2 Therapy Bath, Capnometer and a Red Light Man device. 

Funding Level 5: Improve LIGHT Features (Total Backed: $17,000)

Currently you can highlight material as you are reading it. The new features will allow you to highlight multiple parts of the page at the same time and have it indexed into the search engine all at once. We will also be adding better sharing features for highlights, text, audio and videos. It will allow you to choose the text font, background image and more when sharing.

We come across so much health information each day that it's hard to find and organize the best we come across. You will be able to find and organize your own highlights as well as those from others. You can create groups of like minded individuals as well as create projects within groups to help find the best information from a collectively united group of people.

Funding Level 6: LIGHT RESEARCH (Total Backed: $27,000)

LIGHT RESEARCH is a social research engine allowing users to create Statements and provide studies that support or do not support the statement. Users will be enabled to vote if the study supports or does not support. Additionally comments will be allowed under each study to discuss. All studies will be classified by type of study and if animal or human. 

This will allow people to search for virtually any topic and see what research has been done on it and find it all in one place.  You can also see which statements are supported by individual studies and also see what other studies the authors have conducted. 

In the search above you can see all studies regarding "emodin". You can filter between human and animal studies as well. 

Funding Level 7: LIGHT SOCIAL (Total Backed: $47,000)

Level 7 is what brings it all together. People will be able to create pages and groups. With your user account you will be able to create your own profile page. You will be able to comment on studies, create your own highlights associated with your account, mark if a study supports the statement or does not.

Additionally you'll be able to create Groups. Groups allows like minded individuals to come together and find information together. You will also be able to create projects around certain topics. All information highlighted by Groups and Individuals is publicly available to search. The advantage is that you are able to filter by Users and Groups. So if you want to follow a group or individual and see what they are highlighting you are able to.

Levels of Financing

All levels of financing will produce something unique valuable. No matter how much is financed, part of the project will be completed and you will find it tremendously valuable. 

If more money is raised than the $47,000 then that money will go into transcribing, time-stamping every word, and indexing other popular health podcasts. Every $ raised will add valuable to an already valuable search platform. Health blogger and research Danny Roddy has said:

Steven Scott's Ray Peat search engine is pretty phenomenal. The ability to search Ray's audio interviews for interesting keywords is one of the most useful research tools I've come across.

Bud Weiss, founder of Buteyko New York City has said:

"Wow. I'm absolutely overwhelmed both by your incredible dedication to bringing this work forward and making it so much more researchable and to your extraordinary generosity. You deserve so much recognition for doing this and making research and teaching with this a kind of dream all of us who are serious about it would wish for and here you are doing it. There are just no adequate thanks for all of this. WOW” ​

Our Experience

Myself and my team of engineers have great experience in search. In 2009 we created a search engine for PPC ads which had tremendous amount of data. I had the person who developed the current search infrastructure for Facebook and Twitter on my team helping us out as there was a tremendous amount of data across dozens of servers. 

What Backers Receive

You can learn more about each individual product here:

  • Carboxy Gel - https://www.carbogenetics.com/product/carboxy-gel-anti-aging-face-mask
  • Hypothyroidism Revolution by Tom Brimeyer - http://www.hypothyroidismrevolution.com
  • How to Heal Your Metabolism by Kate Deering - http://www.amazon.com/How-Heal-Your-Metabolism-Happiness/dp/1511585625/
  • Facial Moisturizer - https://www.carbogenetics.com/product/facial-moisturizer/
  • SmartCapno - https://www.carbogenetics.com/product/capnometer/
  • Carbogen Generator - https://www.carbogenetics.com/product/carbogen-generator/ 
  • CO2 Therapy Bath - https://www.carbogenetics.com/product/rejuvemate/ 

Support LIGHT today and receive extraordinary products to help your health. Help create a revolution in the we organize health research to make it easily accessible and organized for all to create new connections and knowledge.

story:
Brux·ism [bruk' sizm] noun - the involuntary or habitual clenching of the jaw and grinding of teeth, typically during sleep. Some of the leading factors that cause bruxism include: stress/anxiety, abnormal bite and/or crooked teeth, sleep apnea, and heredity.

Common symptoms of bruxism include tooth wear and sensitivity, as well as jaw pain. Most people who “brux” are unaware of the problem because the symptoms are not understood to be associated with clenching and grinding. The symptoms of bruxism are usually most intense immediately after waking. Some of the symptoms of bruxism can also occur during stressful times while awake, and slowly get worse throughout the day.

The average American’s annual out-of-pocket dental care cost is $600. Over a lifetime, this total is compounded by a patient’s age, quality of healthcare and personal hygiene habits. Taking initiative to introduce effective preventative habits into one's daily routine is something we should all be able to afford. Our direct-to-consumer model makes preventative dental care affordable and easier than ever.

 

The OTIS Night Guard

Order our impression kit and take your teeth impressions in the comfort and privacy of your home. Once our dental lab receives your impressions, we'll make your custom night guard and ship it to your mailbox within 7-10 business days. Easy Peasy!

Each OTIS Night Guard is made from ISO-certified plastics that are BPA-free and non-allergenic, making them ideal for those who are allergic to acrylics or metals. Designed with a 1mm soft internal surface and 1mmm hard outer surface, you're getting a Night Guard that rests comfortably and protects your teeth throughout the night.

                                                                        

 

Our Health & Hygiene Mission

OTIS is a transparent, eco-friendly oral care company that is committed to delivering custom dental products to your mailbox, in the easiest way imaginable. Here’s what gets us out of bed in the morning:

 

From The Lab to Your Mouth (So to Speak)

OTIS Night Guards are made with the same premium quality materials and methods as any dentist recommended night guard. In fact, there’s a good chance it comes from the same manufacturer.

 

The Future of OTIS

We believe that dental products should be effective, easy to access, good for you, and good for the earth. Unfortunately, many aren't. We plan to change this.

We're starting out with custom night guards, but we've got big plans to become your go-to for optimal oral health. We're developing whitening kits that come with custom trays and professional-strength whitening gels, and hygiene kits that include all-natural, eco-friendly hygiene products to promote beautiful, healthy smiles.

We’re a group of licensed dental professionals who carry over 50 years of combined experience in general dentistry, dental hygiene and engineering. We created OTIS because we’re tired of the status quo of inconvenient, high-priced dentistry. We’re passionate about preventative dental care and want to make it accessible to everyone. When you purchase an OTIS product, you’re getting quality, convenience and affordability.

Want in? Email us at investors@hellootis.com

 

Why OTIS? 

 

Acknowledgements

The OTIS campaign would not be possible without supportive friends and family who have been there every step of the way. They’ve contributed financially, morally and creatively. The grace of God has enriched me with the knowledge and determination to be in this position. I am truly humbled and grateful to have you all in my life. Thank you.  - Andrew

Immigrant Creative: Kyle Wai Lin, Bernadette Aguirre, Nate Fong + Aran Yeo, Constantine Pitsilos, Josephine Wai Lin, Kit Friday, Jenn Schmukler, Jennilee Gomez, Chris Sithi, Timothy Tsang Lyla Jeltycheva, Michelle Moran, Tina Huang

 

Risks and Challenges

We have partnered with some of the best manufacturers in the industry to prepare production way in advance. With that, we feel confident in our ability to deliver high quality night guards to our customers.

If something out of the ordinary does happen, and delay is the result, we’ll make sure to update you every step of the way!
